1a1(dkon brtsegs): (nga) @#/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2(dkon brtsegs): (黃) 大寶積經第四部
1b1(dkon brtsegs): @##/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs
1b2(dkon brtsegs): le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu drug pa ste/ 'phags pa yab dang sras
1b3(dkon brtsegs): mjal ba zhes bya ba de kho na nges par bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/
1b4(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya pi tA pu tra sa mA ga ma nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yab
1b5(dkon brtsegs): dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang
1b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
1b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
1b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/
2a1(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi ba zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgal ba rgal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ thang
2a2(dkon brtsegs): la phyin pa thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa
2a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor
2a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rig pa can rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus byas pa khrus byas pa'i 'khor dang
2a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ sgrogs pa po sgrogs pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par bsal pa yan lag lnga rnam
2a6(dkon brtsegs): par bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yid rnam par dang ba yid rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan
2a7(dkon brtsegs): lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen bsring dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i
2a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor
2b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spangs pa btsal ba spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa
2b2(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ kun tu
2b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du
2b4(dkon brtsegs): byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sems
2b5(dkon brtsegs): shin du rnam par grol ba sems shin du rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags
2b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lcug ma dang / shun phrags kyi skyon dang bral ba/ dag pa/ snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul na ser
2b7(dkon brtsegs): skye'i gnas/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na lnga sde dang / grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / 'od srungs chen po
2b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra
3a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/
3a2(dkon brtsegs): glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam
3a3(dkon brtsegs): par grol pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
3a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ bla gab med pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar thams cad dang ldan pa'i
3a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gang gis
3a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
3a7(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
3a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko Di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
3b1(dkon brtsegs): kau Di n+ya khyod ni bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig /de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags byin dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung
3b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di
3b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal pa/ mong gal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du
3b5(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi
3b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing dge slong 'char ka
3b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste 'di lta ste/ dper na khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta
3b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi brtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs
4a1(dkon brtsegs): pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen
4a2(dkon brtsegs): po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod
4a3(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong 'char kas rgyas po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ltar yin gyis/ /khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang
4a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad pa skyed cig / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud
4a5(dkon brtsegs): gal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya bar shin du dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs ni lhag par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba
4a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing khur bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ shing khur brgya
4a7(dkon brtsegs): yang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing skam la lo mang du lon pa zhig yod la de la mi la la zhig gis me btang na me'i phung po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar
4a8(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis gtor na me'i phung po de bas ches che bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin du dka'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal
4b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin du
4b2(dkon brtsegs): dka'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud
4b3(dkon brtsegs): gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang ma/
4b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
4b5(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma/
4b6(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed do zhes dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig /de ci'i phyir
4b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang na ngas dad par bya yi/ yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o/ /'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di ltar
4b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos/ /
5a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni rigs dad byed mchog rab yin gyis/ /shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' ba skyed pa yi/ /rgyal po'i dam pa rab tu dad par byos/ /rgyal po'i rab de dad par byas na ni/ /
5a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs bu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis/ /mi yi dam pa myur du dad par byos/ /da lta na ni shAkya'i bdag po de/ /mngon pa'i
5a3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams/ /ri yi ngos nas rbab 'dril ji bzhin du/ /brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad btang ste gnas/ /dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed
5a4(dkon brtsegs): pas/ /yid la gnod gyur sems dad yid kyang stor/ /dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag /rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin/ /lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos
5a5(dkon brtsegs): shing / /lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing / /rgyal po bde nyams snying rje smre sngags 'don/ /nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang / /
5a6(dkon brtsegs): mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang / /longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing / /sa bdag de ni snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis/ /
5a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mi zhig yongs su non gyur na/ /bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes ltar/ /sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no/ /ti se'i gangs gyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na/ ji ltar mi dag
5a8(dkon brtsegs): blta bya mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na/ /rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo / /gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos 'gyur ba'i/ /mis ni rang gi
5b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang mi shes te/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas/ /rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so/ /dper na khyim thab shi bas myos pa yi/ /bud med snying rjer smre
5b2(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'don byed pa/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas/ /rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni
5b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dad par gyis/ /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis/ /'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi/ /'gro ba dag na
5b4(dkon brtsegs): skal 'thun spyad med pas/ /rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dad bya bar/ /gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med/ /'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni/ /'das pa'i dus na sa yi
5b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag po zhig / ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste/ /sa skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung / /de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams
5b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod/ /rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni/ /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs/ /grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nyi zhing / /bza' shing 'bras bu me tog
5b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pas gang / /'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes/ /sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang / /dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste/ /sdong dum tsher ma rtswa shing ngan pa med/ /
5b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras/ /chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan/ /drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste/ /skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs/ /
6a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad/ /de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod/ /rgyal po de la bu dag yod pa ni/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste/ /
6a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can/ /yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan/ /ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste/ /srogs chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /'dod
6a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can/ /mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'/ /rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des/ /lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir/ /na chung
6a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te/ /'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras/ /bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas/ /'dod pa rnams
6a5(dkon brtsegs): la khyod yid ci yi phyir/ /ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smros/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas gyis te/ /bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba skyed/ /bud med rin chen 'khor
6a6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'grogs gyis te/ /yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis/ dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag /de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na/ /dka' thub btang zhing
6a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/ /'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs/ /de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/ /da dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun/ /rnam thos bu yi gnas
6a8(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba yi/ /gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod/ 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing / /lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa/ /rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang
6b1(dkon brtsegs): glu la mkhas/ /bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog /mig ni pad ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste/ /bim ba'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid du 'ong / /so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med
6b2(dkon brtsegs): cing bzang / /dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug /brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra/ /phrag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan/ /lag dang rkang ba'i mthil ni zangs
6b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdog / sor mo byin pa phra bar legs dang ldan/ /lce ni zangs mdog 'dra ba srab cing dag /tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan/ /so ni thags bzang so rnams rang rong
6b4(dkon brtsegs): med/ /mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan/ /lto ba phyang der 'dug cing lte ba sdug /sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra/ /byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing / /mda' rgyu snying po
6b5(dkon brtsegs): legs par skyes pa bzhin/ /dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan/ gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta/ /rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan/ /gzhon nu snying rje
6b6(dkon brtsegs): ltos la brtse bar byos/ /bu cig khyod dang bu med 'di dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang / /shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin ltung gis/ /nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsten par
6b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ blo gros snying po ldan des smre ba yi/ /pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras/ /yab cig khyod ni mad par gsung ba lags/ /gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad mad/ /
6b8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig /bsams te gtan la bab la rgyal po gson/ /ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag /sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson/ /
7a1(dkon brtsegs): sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni/ /mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te/ /mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag
7a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dmang / /long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis/ /long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid/ /thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na/ /mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa
7a3(dkon brtsegs): skyed/ /grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi/ /tshig gis btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid/ /sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na/ /nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /
7a4(dkon brtsegs): sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing / /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba/ /long ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang / /nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam
7a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid/ /mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin/ /bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags/ /khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags/ /bdag ni 'dod pa rnams las rnam
7a6(dkon brtsegs): par smod/ /'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin/ /sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste/ /rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/ /me yi phung po shin du 'bar ba bzhin/ /
7a7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du/ /smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras/ /rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par/ /rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu
7a8(dkon brtsegs): byung / /sbrul gyi lpags rnying rjes pa ci 'dra dang / /ngar snabs brngubs pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te/ /blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par/ /sdig dang rnam par bral te
7b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung / /gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ /blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba/ /ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste/ /blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung / /gzhon
7b2(dkon brtsegs): nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni/ /grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga/ /ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur/ /
7b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na/ /mi yi seng ge de ni 'dod khams nas/ /tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas/ /de ltar
7b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na/ /pha de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang / /zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas/ /legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji
7b5(dkon brtsegs): snyam sems/ /de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam 'am/ /nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /
7b6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ /mi bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe/ /rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /rjes
7b7(dkon brtsegs): su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam 'am/ /khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni/ /bden pa 'phel ba dang bar byed pa yin/ /de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
7b8(dkon brtsegs): dad pa mngon skyed cig / sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na/ /skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bar khas
8a1(dkon brtsegs): blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
8a2(dkon brtsegs): chen por song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dang / /dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang
8a3(dkon brtsegs): mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing / /ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon
8a4(dkon brtsegs): nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so/ /gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos mtha' bzhir rnam par
8a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang /
8a6(dkon brtsegs): rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no/ /de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi
8a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig /des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba
8a8(dkon brtsegs): med la mnyam ste/ mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang mthun pas legs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los
8b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing rim gro byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig na da ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo/ /des de snyam du bsams nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la
8b3(dkon brtsegs): blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su yang ma 'gro shig /la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do/ /de'i tshe shAkya'i bu
8b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba
8b5(dkon brtsegs): der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
8b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar
8b7(dkon brtsegs): byon tam/ shin du ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma rgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
8b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar
9a1(dkon brtsegs): byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /shAkya'i bu shin du legs par sad kyis kyang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan
9a2(dkon brtsegs): cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur
9a3(dkon brtsegs): spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan
9a4(dkon brtsegs): nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin du ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal
9a5(dkon brtsegs): tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin du legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shin du legs par sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi
9a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /
9a7(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin du legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas tshe dang
9a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
9b1(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/
9b2(dkon brtsegs): de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin du ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
9b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu mya ngan med pa dang / mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mya ngan med pa dang / mya ngan bral bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde
9b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
9b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang /
9b6(dkon brtsegs): shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na bdag cag
9b7(dkon brtsegs): gis de ltar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas nga'i bu la blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro shig /la la zhig de la blta
9b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad do zhes bka' stsal to/ /de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i
10a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di
10a2(dkon brtsegs): ni shin du yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'on tang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul
10a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la steng gi bar snang la skyil mo dkrung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
10a4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa des nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la skyil mo dkrung
10a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te rdzu 'phrul
10a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis bar snang la skyil mo dkrung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ /khyod la ci dgos myur du
10a7(dkon brtsegs): smra bar byos/ /khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin/ /brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin du dka'/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang
10a8(dkon brtsegs): ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/ /bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te/ bde bar
10b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bskur ro/ /yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba/ /khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob/ /gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/ /
10b2(dkon brtsegs): ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra/ /ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /ye shes mnga'
10b3(dkon brtsegs): bas phyogs rnams kun du snang / /ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na/ /srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang / /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /mu stegs gzhan
10b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs/ /ji ltar nyi mas zil non skar ma rnams/ /nyin bar 'od stor lam mer mi rung ba/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis/ /zil gyis mnan
10b5(dkon brtsegs): pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang / /ji ltar nyi ma'i zil non zla ba ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'od stor nyid mi snang / /de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams/ /nyi ma'i
10b6(dkon brtsegs): zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med/ /seng ge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams/ /shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra
10b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas/ /stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'/ /de bzhin rgyal po drang srong chen po'i gsung / /bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos
10b8(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang / /gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la/ /
11a1(dkon brtsegs): spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal/ /snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar/ /bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan/ /lam dang
11a2(dkon brtsegs): gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan/ /lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud/ /'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la bton/ /ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni/ /sgang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms
11a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /'gro ba lha bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad/ /ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags/ /rtswa dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang / /'khri shing
11a4(dkon brtsegs): sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis sa mdzes pa/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang / /ma 'dres bcwo brgyad chos mnga'i sdong po la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me
11a5(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / /'bras bus spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri/ /lha'i gnas gyur mi sgul rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /dge sbyong rgya
11a6(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes/ /bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po/ /lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /
11a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te/ /thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng rir ldan pas/ /dran pa nyer gzhag char rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te/ /rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs/ /yongs
11a8(dkon brtsegs): dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi gzir/ /ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'jom zhing / /ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skems/ /rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes/ /ting nge 'dzin dang tshul
11b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims gzings dang gru chen te/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i nor bu rin chen tshogs/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs/ /thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya/ /
11b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug /ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab/ /byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong / /bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po sten/ /tshul khrims nags mtha'
11b3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i stobs chen po/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas/ /stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras/ /thub pa mi gnas gnas pa rnam par ston/ /
11b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas/ /byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te/ /khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin/ /tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan/ /bsam
11b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang po'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs/ /ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad/ /dge ba yongs su bzung bas sdig bcom ste/ /nyon mongs zhi mdzad
11b6(dkon brtsegs): dge bsten bka' stsol pas/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes/ /tshul khrims mchog sprin blo gros glog 'byin cing / /yan lag brgyad lam
11b7(dkon brtsegs): char chen rlan gyis slebs/ /thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol/ /khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci/ /bsod snyoms rgyu
11b8(dkon brtsegs): bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam/ /de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam/ /thang gnas ud pa la bzhin ma rnyis sam/ /'char kas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /dgyes shing
12a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te/ /thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas/ /gser gyi pad ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyis/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing / /
12a2(dkon brtsegs): gling bu'i sgra rnyan nga ros bskul byas te/ /bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang nas/ /da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam/ /'char kas smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can/ /
12a3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste/ /mnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na/ /sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog
12a4(dkon brtsegs): bshams pa la/ /me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te/ /bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na/ /da ltar mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs/ /'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa
12a5(dkon brtsegs): gzims mal gzims pa ni/ /byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs/ /dga' ba'i gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na/ /srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'/ /rgyal pos
12a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ shAkya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar/ /bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te/ /gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na/ /nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'/ /'char
12a7(dkon brtsegs): kas smras pa/ chos kyis byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis/ /zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar/ /zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba bsten mdzad pas/ /ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so/ /
12a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/ /yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te/ /rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na/ /nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru/ /
12b1(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste/ /thub pa des bkrus gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad/ /sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog /rang yang rgal la skye bo phal cher sgrol/ /
12b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas brgyan/ /rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang po gyon/ /tsan dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris/ /nags chen de gseb thub pa su
12b3(dkon brtsegs): yis brgyan/ /'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan/ /khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan rgyan/ /mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku/ /rnam grol gzi
12b4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i/ /dpa' bo g.yul du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te/ /bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dgab dgab pa/ /
12b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrung / /'char kas smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te/ /de dpung ye shes nyan thos zhabs 'bring g.yog /yon tan tshogs
12b6(dkon brtsegs): la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'/ /stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes/ /rgyas pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras/ /chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thos/ /
12b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyang zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po ltar 'gro'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen
12b8(dkon brtsegs): po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon/ tshogs kyi mchog /dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na dge sbyong gi rgyal po lam me
13a1(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /rgyal po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcwa lnga la zla ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni lam me lhan ne
13a2(dkon brtsegs): lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma ni ston ka'i dus na shin du lam me
13a3(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na shin du lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug
13a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzang
13a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mdun sa na gnas na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab
13a6(dkon brtsegs): bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
13a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin
13a8(dkon brtsegs): du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems
13b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa
13b2(dkon brtsegs): drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem/ 'ur
13b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa
13b4(dkon brtsegs): bdun bor ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung pa dang / steng gi bar snang
13b5(dkon brtsegs): las lha'i gdugs dang / rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang
13b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa med pa/ rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ slu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gi tshe bla na
13b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur
13b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcas pa 'di dag smras so/ /blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltam ma thag /nor ba med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de/ /gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba/ /
14a1(dkon brtsegs): de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du/ /'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes/ /mgon pos mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa/ /de la
14a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /su zhig rmid lam rmi ba'i dus na yang / /brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te/ /ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi
14a3(dkon brtsegs): ches/ /gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis/ /gang zhig chags par bya bar ma nus shing / /gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /mtshon
14a4(dkon brtsegs): rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis/ /gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing / /zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs
14a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas/ /gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te/ /shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang / /longs spyod dag
14a6(dkon brtsegs): la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis/ /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /rmad du byung ba rnam par brgyad dag gis/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug nam yang ma nus te/ /
14a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal stug ldan zhing rtag tu mi dam pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang / /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma
14a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang / /chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de yis gsung la su
14b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid mi ches/ / dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa/ /gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ /dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /
14b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su/ /'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /byang chub dam pa mngon par
14b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhed pa'i phyir/ /zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis/ /lo drug bar du dka' thub drag spyad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /byang chub dam pa
14b4(dkon brtsegs): don du gnyer ba na/ /lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshod khu gsol/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brengs te glags btsal kyang / /de la
14b5(dkon brtsegs): glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing / /su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la/ /'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa/ /de
14b6(dkon brtsegs): yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par/ /rtogs par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi/ /byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi
14b7(dkon brtsegs): ches/ /gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi tshig gsan te/ /nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig bdag la
14b8(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse don gyi phyir/ /shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byon gyur te/ /shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis/ /
15a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de/ /bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /de dus da bab de ltar dus mkhyen pas/ /bcom ldan
15a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de yi dus mkhyen te/ /'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa po/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la/ /blta ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes/ /rgyal po des
15a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rang gi sems kyis su/ /de snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig tu rjes su bsams nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos/
15a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam byas te/ /khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs/ /
15a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na/ /skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong / /stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan/ /drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa/ /'dir byon rgyal po
15a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs dang skyed cig dang / /khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung / /khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste/ /stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba/ /chu khrod pad ma ji bzhin chags med
15a7(dkon brtsegs): par/ /stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad/ /srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las rgal gyur nas/ /'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis/ /'dren
15a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te/ /sman pa'i gtso bo skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byin/ /gso ba byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /
15b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pham mdzad de/ /nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur gyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /'gro ba dgrol zhing
15b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang bstan pa dang / /'chi med zhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes/ /mi dbang la ni lha dbang gsol 'debs kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te/ /
15b3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sems can bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag /mun pa rab rib stug pos
15b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs pa yi/ /mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la/ /rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing / /
15b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi med gnas su sems can 'don mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /me chen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /mes tshig sa la sprin cher char pa bzhin/ /bzhi
15b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /dri gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon gsal te/ /dri ma gsum las skye bo 'grol mdzad cing / /stobs bcu rnam
15b7(dkon brtsegs): par snang ba skyed mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /skye dgu kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas/ /stobs bcu thugs rjes mnga' ba byams par dgongs/ /thugs rje thugs brtses
15b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'grol mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul/ /thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad cing / /rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs zhi
16a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad kyis/ / 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems/ /rgya mtsho las ni lha bus ji lta bar/ /stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa
16a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /tshad myed yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/ /thugs rje chen po dad pa'i thugs kyis spyod/ /yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dad mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad
16a3(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed/ /nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba skye bo dang bar spyod mdzad cing / /mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs
16a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/ /rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/ /'jig rten gtso la dad pa thob gyur na/ lha dang mi
16a5(dkon brtsegs): dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor/ /srid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog tu 'dong / /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings la mkha'
16a6(dkon brtsegs): lding rjes bzhin te/ /bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang
16a7(dkon brtsegs): thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon du mthong / sngon bdag rgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /zhes dam
16a8(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa yang rjes su dran nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to/ /de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong khyod ni
16b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na/ khyod bdag zan zo la bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song shig /nga yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
16b2(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
16b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni dge slong 'char kas dad par byas te/ deng skye bo phal po che'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te/ bcom
16b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char
16b5(dkon brtsegs): ka legs so legs so/ /de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
16b6(dkon brtsegs): dag de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la/ gal te gzugs shig yod na ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
16b7(dkon brtsegs): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams gyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu med do// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom
16b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bshos gsol nas phyag bcabs lhung bzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu'i mdzad pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin
17a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa 'am/ brkyang pa las bskum
17a2(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
17a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /
17a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan
17a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la dri za'i bum tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing
17a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par
17a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs logs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
17a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du
17b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal
17b2(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su
17b3(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang /
17b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che dang / gnas
17b5(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
17b6(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po
17b7(dkon brtsegs): thags zangs ris kyang lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug bcu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis lha
17b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
18a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /bya'i rgyal po mdab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
18a2(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu
18a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khams tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu yang 'dug par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha'i yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du/ ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba
18a4(dkon brtsegs): yis/ /skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /nam mkhar zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes/ /zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba/ /mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'jom/ /
18a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa/ /ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing / /lha min
18a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /nyi ma de ni pad ma'i kha yang 'byed/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas/ /stong gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes
18a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / /nyan thos pad ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed/ /lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni/ /'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor pa/ /lha yi 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /
18a8(dkon brtsegs): bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes/ /rkang gnyis dbang po dpal stug stobs bcu yang / /dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na/ /rtog ge'i tshogs rnams zil gyis
18b1(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas ni/ /dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /lha yi dbang po 'thab bral dbang byed pa/ /'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa/ /'thab bral bzang po lha tshogs nang bzhugs te/ /
18b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes/ /gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang / /lam ngan ngan 'gror 'dong ba zil mnan nas/ /yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing / /stobs
18b3(dkon brtsegs): bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes/ /lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de/ /dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor/ /lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /sngon gyi
18b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas/ /'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /skyes bu seng ge dam pa
18b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mdzes/ /lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni/ /lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su/ /rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na/ /gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam
18b6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzes/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing / /stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po/ /ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang / /skye bo zil gyi mnan nas rnam
18b7(dkon brtsegs): par mdzes/ /lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur byed pa ni/ /lha gnas 'dug cing lha mchog zil mnan te/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du/ /
18b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag /sngan chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /rgyal po de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i
19a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang / /tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te/ /shin du snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag /yongs su rjod par byed cing mngon du mdzes/ /de
19a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar rgyal ba'i tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa/ /dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis/ /mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing / /'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon par mdzes/ /nyan
19a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang / /lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi/ /gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston par mdzad/ /bya lam
19a4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid/ /rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid/ /ri rab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so/ /rgyal po
19a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/
19a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang 'di dmar ring 'char ba'o/ /dmar reng shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so/ /grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad
19a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/ dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no/ /grogs po dag de lta bas na bzhon pa'i mchog rnams
19a8(dkon brtsegs): stod de sta gon gyis shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de lta zhing 'dong ngo / /lha legs so zhes gsol nas shAkya rnams kyis rgyal
19b1(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstad do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i
19b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing bye ma gtsang ma bdal du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba dang / me tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs
19b3(dkon brtsegs): su gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / gyad dang / bum rnga thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / glu'i cha spyad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po
19b4(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang bcas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der
19b5(dkon brtsegs): song ngo / /de'i tshe shAkya la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad sngo la rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing / /rgyan rnams kyang sngo la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
19b6(dkon brtsegs): bas brgyan pa/ 'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / ral gri dang / thod dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lha ma rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras
19b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon po gyon zhing rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta ba rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lcag thogs pa dang / khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/
19b8(dkon brtsegs): shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to/ /shAkya la la'i bzhon pa rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du dmar ba dang /
20a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du bkra ba dang / shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du
20a2(dkon brtsegs): yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang / gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che
20a3(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to/ /glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu
20a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yer ka brgyus pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgyang ring po nas
20a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang dag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis shAkya ser skya'i gnas
20a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su 'thun
20a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa nas/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de/ /'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'ong gyur pa/ /de ltar bstan gyis khyed
20a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams de nyon cig / shing rta brgya stong mchog dang bcas pas dag /legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas/ /mi yi dbang po dam pa
20b1(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur/ /shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang / rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo/ /lcag kyang sngo zhing thag
20b2(dkon brtsegs): srang rnams kyang sngo/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni sngon po gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta ser zhing rgyan
20b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ser ba dang / rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser/ /lcag kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang
20b4(dkon brtsegs): ser/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan gser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang / /
20b5(dkon brtsegs): rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar/ /lcag kyang dmar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dmar/ /dril
20b6(dkon brtsegs): bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang /
20b7(dkon brtsegs): rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar/ /lcag kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dkar/ /
20b8(dkon brtsegs): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta bkra zhing rgyan kyang bkra ba dang / /
21a1(dkon brtsegs): rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra/ /lcag kyang bkra zhing thag srang rnams kyang bkra/ /
21a2(dkon brtsegs): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du/ /glang
21a3(dkon brtsegs): po brgyad khri tshang bar bshams pa ni/ /gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ /glang chen rnams ni gser gyis chal par brgyan/ /de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun
21a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ /khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /shing rta rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams/ /de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad
21a5(dkon brtsegs): bcu yang / /rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyi dga' bar brgyan/ /rgyal po'i chas gos rgyal po 'cham stabs can/ /glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'brang / /rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga
21a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram/ /dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres/ /bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/ /glu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang
21a7(dkon brtsegs): gyad rnams dang / /bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas/ /rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang / /rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang / /rgyal po
21a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // // // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang
21b1(dkon brtsegs): dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
21b2(dkon brtsegs): r gyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs
21b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhabs 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ /g.yon
21b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhabs 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zhabs 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang /
21b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab
21b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis g.yob par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog
21b7(dkon brtsegs): ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
21b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
22a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
22a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
22a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mud dang / pad ma dkar po dang /
22a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag
22a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /m-i'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang stong gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to/ /sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to/ /
22a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas lha dang mi rnams kyang
22a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong / lha'i rin
22a8(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo
22b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
22b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang m-i'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor
22b3(dkon brtsegs): can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang m-i'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
22b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de/
22b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/ /nga ni 'jig rten na mchog /nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo/ nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes
22b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas 'dzam bu'i
22b7(dkon brtsegs): grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur
22b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so/ /nga yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
23a1(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas/ /sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de/ /nga ni 'jig rten na ni mchog ces gsungs/ /de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /
23a2(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud tshe/ /'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing / /lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur pa/ /de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /nga yang 'di dang khyod
23a3(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum du/ /thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos/ /mtshan ni don grub lags
23a4(dkon brtsegs): shes sngon brjod pa/ /pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags/ /khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na/ /don grub lags par bdag gis da gdod 'tshal/ /de nas 'dod pa
23a5(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i
23a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bus yog par bting ngo / steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla res bres so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chag sa de
23a7(dkon brtsegs): nas babs te/ gang na khri bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
23a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/ /'di la 'di ni
23b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /ser skya zhes bya grong khyer dam pa yi/ /n+ya gro d+hA yi ra ba nyams dga' bar/ /rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe/ /'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe/ /skye bo
23b2(dkon brtsegs): mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te/ /lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang / klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po
23b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dus te/ /mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang mi rnams dang / /de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha/ /rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su
23b4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa yi/ /tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang / /'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang / /'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus/ /dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin
23b5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang / /spyod pa can dang kun du rgyu dag dang / /gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po/ /log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis/ /
23b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yis sems/ /yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir/ /de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur/ /sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i/ /tshig gis
23b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad/ /da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la/ /rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ /gzhon nu khyod ni
23b8(dkon brtsegs): sa bdag chen po yi/ /rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyis/ /khab nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol pa/ /gling bzhir dbang pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba
24a1(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ /chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste/ /gling bzhi dbang
24a2(dkon brtsegs): bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur/ /mi yi bdag dang mi yi mchod par 'ong / /lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab/ /de nas de tshe byang chub sems dpa' des/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag
24a3(dkon brtsegs): khrig dpag med nas/ /bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyis/ /rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs/ /'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis/ /bdag la slu ba mdzad par
24a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhed pas na/ /de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod/ /bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re/ /rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis ru sbal gcig cig 'phangs/ /
24a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa dang / /ru sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung / /de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gang nas 'dir 'ongs kwa'e/ /nga yi the tshom skyes pa bcad pa'i
24a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ /myur du nga la smros shes de skad smras/ /khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal de nyid la/ /rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo chen des smras pa/ /nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te/ /khron pa 'dir ni de ring
24a7(dkon brtsegs): bor bar 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song / /nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te/ /nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na/ /ru sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha'o/ /de la khron pa'i
24a8(dkon brtsegs): nang gi ru sbal gyis/ /rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am/ /'on te khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig /dris lan nga la myur du smros shes smras/ /rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo rgya chen po des/ /khron pa'i ru
24b1(dkon brtsegs): sbal de la tshig smras pa/ /khron pa'i ru sbal khyod ni byis pa ste/ /blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan/ /nga ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas/ /yun ring dus na de na skye skye yang / /rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par
24b2(dkon brtsegs): ma nus na/ /dbus lta shes pa ga la nus shes smras/ /de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang / /bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de/ /gling gzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ /khyod kyis bdag la
24b3(dkon brtsegs): slu ba mdzad par bzhed/ /bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /chad pas mi gcad mtshon chas mda' med par/ /stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das
24b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas/ /de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang / /sems can rnams la thugs
24b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis dgongs pa mdzad/ /rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir/ /thugs kyis yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang / /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par/ /de yi tshe na der ni 'dus
24b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i
24b7(dkon brtsegs): sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug bcu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug
24b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che'i rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
25a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir phul lo/ /rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod par phul lo/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing
25a2(dkon brtsegs): rta khrag khrig phrag drug bcu yang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu mngon par sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can la
25a3(dkon brtsegs): rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i 'phyar mdab can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ /
25a4(dkon brtsegs): rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor
25a5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dong na ni rjes su 'dong / shing rta de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha stag go/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de
25a6(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sbyangs so/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par
25a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul to/ /shing rta'i rgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol
25a8(dkon brtsegs): mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas sgra phyung na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan na bde bar 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de
25b1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur to/ /shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad drug bcu
25b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to/ /shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /shing rta de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad
25b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan dkrol/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni tsan dan dang ud
25b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni a ka ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni mA na dA ra ba dang / mA na dA ra
25b5(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po dang / man dzuSha ka dang / man dzuSha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra
25b6(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog dang / bai dUr+ya'i
