25b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ro/ la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la
25b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni na bza' dang / rgyan 'bul lo/ /la la ni sku rags dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang /
26a1(dkon brtsegs): dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to/ /
26a2(dkon brtsegs): la la ni tsong tsong gshibs pa/ la la ni mgo rgyan/ la la ni rna cha gdub kor/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/ la la ni gser gyi
26a3(dkon brtsegs): dra ba/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs so/ /la la ni gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bA+ai dUr+ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs
26a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha
26a5(dkon brtsegs): dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po thogs so/ /la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to/ /la la ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par
26a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod la do zla yong ma mchis/ /'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye
26a7(dkon brtsegs): shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyod
26a8(dkon brtsegs): dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'/ /brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid/ /
26b1(dkon brtsegs): nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu yang mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i pho brang
26b2(dkon brtsegs): gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /bzhugs sa de dag re re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can
26b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par
26b4(dkon brtsegs): sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /de la gser gyi khyams
26b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdung phyam ni dngul/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dUr+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni spug /ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ /
26b6(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni gser/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dU r+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni spug /ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can
26b7(dkon brtsegs): sha stag go/ /bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni shel/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa dag kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni spug /ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i
26b8(dkon brtsegs): snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ /shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni bai dUr+ya/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni spug them pa dang kha khyer ni rdo'i snying po/ ka ba ni gser/ ka zhu ni dngul/
27a1(dkon brtsegs): sa gzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ /spug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni rdo'i snying po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni mu tig dmar po/ them pa kha khyer ni gser/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): ka ba ni dngul/ ka zhu ni shel/ sa gzhi ni bai dU r+ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ /mu tig dmar po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni spug /gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni rdo'i snying po/ them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/
27a3(dkon brtsegs): ka ba ni gser/ ka zhu ni bai dUr+ya/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni mu tig dmar po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa
27a4(dkon brtsegs): dang kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni bai dUr+ya/ ka zhu ni ke ke ru/ sa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin can sha stag go/ /khyams de dag tu yang seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can lha ma yin gyi
27a5(dkon brtsegs): lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ ka tsa li na de'i steng g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /seng ge'i khri de
27a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin du phra ba dang / srin bal las byas pa shin du phra ba dang / zar ma'i
27a7(dkon brtsegs): shun pa las byas pa shin du phra ba dang / shin lpags las byas pa shin du phra ba dang / ka shi ka las byas pa shin du phra ba bye ba phrag drug drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to/ /seng ge'i khri de dag re re'i
27a8(dkon brtsegs): ngos gnyis su yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng ge'i khri de dag
27b1(dkon brtsegs): la lha ma yin gyi bu mo gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo/ /khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /khyams de dag
27b2(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /de la gser gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sngon po la yu ba ser po shel gyis spus pa dag btsug /
27b3(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar po la yu ba ser po shel gyis spus pa dag gtsugs/
27b4(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai dUr+ya gser gyis spras pa dag gtsugs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai dUr+yas spras pa dag
27b5(dkon brtsegs): btsugs so/ /de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni me tog gser po rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po/ rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni
27b6(dkon brtsegs): tog dmar po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun sha stag go/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das
27b7(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to/ /de 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi glang po sa srung gi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
27b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mos tshal yongs 'du sa brtol du nye bar 'jog go/ /de bzhin pho brang gi rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bar byed do/ /
28a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang / ba gam de dag dang / bzhugs sa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de dag dang / seng ge'i khri de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal
28a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i char 'bab par gyur to/ /me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / na n+yu Sha ka chen po dang /
28a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi char yang mngon par 'bab
28a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / yid
28a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus lha ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char 'bab par 'dod pa de dang de dag las mngon
28a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /
28a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po yang mi 'greng
28a8(dkon brtsegs): bdun tsam du me tog man dA ra bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des
28b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab gyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
28b2(dkon brtsegs): ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni smos kyang mi dgos so/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
28b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa bdag gis mngon par bstod pa/ /byang chub dam pa don du gnyer slad du/ /skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi sgul ba/ /lhar bcas
28b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na/ /log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar
28b5(dkon brtsegs): mchi/ /dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing / /mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la/ /'dren pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ /
28b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /rga dang 'chi bas nyen par gyur pa yi/ /lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gang la skyabs song phyis kyang mi skye ba/ /
28b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe rta'i
28b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyan de dag dang / shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan de dag dang / bla re dang dril bu g.yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa
29a1(dkon brtsegs): las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no/ /de ltar lha ma yin
29a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char mngon
29a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'bab par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi spos kyi phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka
29a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya
29a5(dkon brtsegs): snar khro bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab bo/ /steng gi bar snang las gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel
29a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par 'bab bo/ /
29a7(dkon brtsegs): spos chu'i char de bab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chu'i rdzab tu gyur to/ /spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong
29a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
29b1(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag
29b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo / /sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra
29b3(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das
29b4(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni glu len/
29b5(dkon brtsegs): la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha'i me tog man dA ra ba
29b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu Sha ka dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar po dang / mdog dkar po chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar
29b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / be+e dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang /
29b8(dkon brtsegs): rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang / sku rags dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang /
30a1(dkon brtsegs): gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gis phreng ba dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul
30a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub khor dang / tshong tshong gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang / phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi
30a3(dkon brtsegs): bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re dag thogs so/ /la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor
30a4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /la la ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang / la la ni gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ /gang brten gang la gnas
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas nas/ /gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur pa/ /de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang / /rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog /lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha
30a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
30a7(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur ba
30a8(dkon brtsegs): po/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthar phyin thar gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal
30b1(dkon brtsegs): lo/ /'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga' zhing / /'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te/ pad ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po/ /blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag
30b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyi stong nyid mkhyen/ /rnam pa kun du mtshan ma thams cad bshig /khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yod mi mnga'/ /mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal
30b3(dkon brtsegs): lo/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/
30b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /sa dang bar snang dang ni lha'i yul na'ang /
30b5(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis/ /mtshan mar bzung na phyin ci log zhugs pa'i/ /'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /'di na byed pa tshor ba sems can med/ /
30b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med/ /chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben/ /rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan/ /su zhig bder gshegs bstan pa'i 'dir mos te/ /chos kun
30b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste/ /ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod/ /rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes te/ /ji ltar
30b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir/ /'gro ba'i rtsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ // bam po gsum pa/ lha ma yin
31a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la
31a2(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum skor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha rol rnams rgal ba/ /rgal nas
31a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing / /bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jig pa med 'jog pa/ /spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtug /blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams
31a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kun du mkhyen/ /phyin ci log lta thibs por rab zhen blo ldan te/ /'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad/ /mi mchog
31a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang / /smyig rgyu 'dra zhing smyig yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan/ /thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyis sras mchog bskyed/ /srid pa gsum po dag ni mi chags
31a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod/ /dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang / /gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmyi lam dag lta bur/ /mi dbang khyod kyis sras kyis
31a7(dkon brtsegs): tshal na spyad pa spyod/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon
31a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /mi mchog khyod kyi sku yi ni/ /lhar
31b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan/ /ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang / /rgya mtshos ba rjes chu bzhin no/ /gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang / /gzugs
31b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan/ /dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis/ /sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me myin/ /nyi mas me
31b3(dkon brtsegs): khyer zil brlag bzhin/ /ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/ /'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po
31b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang / /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la len
31b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po/ /zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi/ /
31b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad/ /char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin/ /'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad/ /glugs sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no/ /nags btang nags mes shing sreg ltar/ /
31b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba sreg /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jom mdzad de/ /bdud rtsis lus byugs dug bzhin no/ /mun pa mun
31b8(dkon brtsegs): gnag sel mdzad de/ /mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/ /chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de/ /nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin
32a1(dkon brtsegs): du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing
32a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis btul/ /g.yul la dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin/ /
32a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu tshar bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad/ /thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom/ /gang du 'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba bsnyes/ /khyod ni nyon
32a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs/ /rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom/ /mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te/ /khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam/ /thub pa khyod
32a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can blo gros bshig / 'gro ba kun du khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'/ /shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams/ /shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag /chos rnams kun
32a6(dkon brtsegs): la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/ /thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs
32a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang / /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po sna bdun gyi shi rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang phul nas tshigs su
32a8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni/ /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang / /de ni brdar btags
32b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig tu zad/ /chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so/ /gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang / /de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs/ /ming ni ming gis dben pa ste/ /mtshan nyid kyang ni de
32b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad/ /rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang / /bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te/ /gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing / /su la 'ang
32b3(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa ma mchis so/ /khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams/ /chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni/ /chos rnams la yang mi chags par/ /rnam par spyad do thub pa che/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po
32b4(dkon brtsegs): mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan
32b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do/ /
32b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs/ /de ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis/ /khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na/ /
32b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag /tshul khrims stobs
32b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis khyod ni mi bskyod do/ /skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang / /khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thug kyang dag /mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor/ /shes rab stobs kyi khyod mtshungs
33a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' ma mchis/ /de na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas/ /'khor du seng ge lta bur sgra bsgrags te/ /rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig
33a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/
33a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /thub pa chen po skye bo'i tshogs
33a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di/ /dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /
33a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyis gsung de de ltar 'byung / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /'khor gyis
33a6(dkon brtsegs): tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing / /'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du 'ang 'tshal/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni/ /gcig la 'jog gi gzhan
33a7(dkon brtsegs): ni dgag par mdzad/ /'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtog par mdzad/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du
33a8(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang zung gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing mu tig dmar
33b1(dkon brtsegs): pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang / /yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs
33b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ /glo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te/ /mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras/ /chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /rmi lam dga' ba thams
33b3(dkon brtsegs): cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra/ /rmyi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis/ /de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/ /ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu'i zla
33b4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dra/ /byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyi/ /gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi
33b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang / /mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yong mi mchi/ /chos rnams thams cad rmyi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas/ /yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par
33b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ /de nas thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyi tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu
33b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skye te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin
33b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid
34a1(dkon brtsegs): de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang /
34a2(dkon brtsegs): leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
34a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan
34a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par/ /mi yi seng ge 'dzum
34a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mdzad na/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /skyes bus mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas/ /'jig rten pha na bzhed khyod ni
34a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad na/ /lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol/ /de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems/ /'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed
34a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig gu/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su/ /mi yi mchog la dang ba gang
34a8(dkon brtsegs): gis bskyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /'di ltar bde gshegs
34b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di/ /su'i dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes/ /'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi gcad du gsol/ /
34b2(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi/ /the tshom smyur te legs par bcad du gsol/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
34b3(dkon brtsegs): slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa/ /de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya/ /bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /
34b4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te/ /de dag sems ni ci la 'ang chags med pas/ /nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin/ /lha min
34b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis dang ba'i yid byas te/ /de dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas/ /blo can de dag lha min ris bor te/ /mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi seng ge/ gang gA'i
34b6(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed/ /bsnyen bkur byas nas yi 'ong bskal pa la/ de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i rnams/ /'jig rten sgron ma
34b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs su grags pa ste/ /de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing / /shin tu yangs shing snyigs
34b8(dkon brtsegs): ma med par 'gyur/ /de tshe khrag khrig drug cur tshangs pa yi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur/ /de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad/ /de dag zhing der dga' bar
35a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'gyur/ /brten pa de dag mi khom thams cad sbyong / /bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur/ /de dag tshe yi tshad du gyur pa ni/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang / /rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho
35a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad/ /thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi dam chos
35a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul/ /dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan 'thun 'gyur/ /zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba 'ang 'thun/ /
35a4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi/ /skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de/ /bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin/ /rgyal bas lha min de dag lung
35a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas/ /yi rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/
35a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
35a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba ci lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/ de'i tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pas bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing
35a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
35b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos
35b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyams du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang
35b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang
35b4(dkon brtsegs): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang de dag gis thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi nus so snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang dang
35b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ /thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi/ /thugs bskyed pa ni re re la 'ang / /lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis/ /cha tsam mi
35b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod mi'i seng ge/ de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te/ /lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa/ /tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam/ /mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os/ /mi yi seng ge khyod la ni/ /gang gA'i bye
35b7(dkon brtsegs): ma ches mang ba'i/ /rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi/ /spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os/ /yon tan chen po mnga' ba la/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog /khor yug
35b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po mnyam mchod 'os/ /rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba/ /mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam/ /'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi/ /mar me rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ /mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur/ /yon tan
36a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os/ /mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba/ /rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis/ /bskal pa khrag
36a2(dkon brtsegs): khrig rnams su yang / /sems can mchog la mchod par 'os/ /yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod/ /rin po che yi rgyal mtshan gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste/ /bskal pa
36a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas mchod par 'os/ /mi yi seng ge khyod la ni/ /bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par/ /gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /ba dan tshogs kyis mchod par 'os/ /drang srong chen po smra ba'i
36a4(dkon brtsegs): stag / lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang / /gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa/ /brtag bzung dpe la gsan du gsol/ /gal te gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /
36a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su/ /mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la/ /de dag re re'i mgo bo yang / /gang gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te/ /mgo bo de dag re re zhing / /de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la/ /
36a6(dkon brtsegs): kha rnams de dag re re zhing / /lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /bskal par bstod par bgyis kyang ni/ /rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas/ /khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin/ /
36a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi/ pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /dge slong dag legs so legs so/ /nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur
36a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /ye shes dang ldan bar gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dpang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong
36b1(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
36b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan
36b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang gA'i
36b4(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams kyang bsam par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
36b5(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa'i tshe sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo /
36b6(dkon brtsegs): /sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi
36b7(dkon brtsegs): khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du skyes pas sems can
36b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
37a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
37a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/
37a3(dkon brtsegs): bgrang du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
37a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
37a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la
37a6(dkon brtsegs): phan par dgongs par gyur te don kyang mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/
37a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag cing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yong med par gyur to/ /lta ba'i
37a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa yong med par gyur to/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yong med par gyur to/ /lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yong med par gyur to/ /ngan song gi rgyur
37b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing gtams te rjes su bstan cing bslabs
37b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i
37b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni bla na med pa
37b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la/ bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la
37b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa yang med
37b6(dkon brtsegs): do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha
37b7(dkon brtsegs): stag la yongs su spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
37b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog ste dge ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin par dbang med par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong med de/
38a1(dkon brtsegs): de ma bsag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo / /de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang
38a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'du ma byas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa de mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa
38a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro/ /rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo / /char nyams
38a4(dkon brtsegs): su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can de dag la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa mngon du 'gro zhing shes
38a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan pa de thos nas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa mngon du 'gro zhing shes
38a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin/
38a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do/ /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa yang med do/ /
38a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des gtams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos
38b1(dkon brtsegs): pas zhen pa yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du 'greng pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang
38b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la ya nga ba ma spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir ya nga ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo / /yang dag pa'i spang pa yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/
38b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/ /sems can de dag 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir
38b4(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /de dag mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug
38b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i
38b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang med do/ /sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste/
38b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe des gsungs pa'i
38b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag de la ji snyam du
39a1(dkon brtsegs): sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /
39a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsams pa 'am/ bde ba
39a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/
39a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ sems zhan pa dang / sems dma' ba nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can
39a5(dkon brtsegs): de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde bar bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal pa 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/
39a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas nyes par
39a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa
39a8(dkon brtsegs): nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes bar bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan
39b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nas nyes bar bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas
39b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'o/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
39b3(dkon brtsegs): slog dag legs so legs so/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab
39b4(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung
39b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nyes bar bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde bar bsgrubs pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar
39b6(dkon brtsegs): thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so/ /dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
39b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
39b8(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
40a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
40a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis/ bcom ldan
40a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur
40a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
40a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang pa las bskum
40a6(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dir gnas par gyur to/ /
40a7(dkon brtsegs): des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
40a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni bcom ldan 'das
40b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can
40b2(dkon brtsegs): yangs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi
40b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso bo/ rgyal ba dam pa/ rgyal ba rgya rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par brjod pas yang
40b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par brjod do/ /de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing /
40b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul/ /bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang / /da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal/ /byang chub mchog tu
40b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyang 'jug / stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas/ /ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal/ /da dung dang po thugs bskyed par/ /de dang
40b7(dkon brtsegs): der ni yongs bstan te/ /da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'/ /
40b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi gang yang mkhyen mdzad de/ /brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /la lar bdud kyis cha byad kyis/ /sems can rnams kyis don mdzad de/ /'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus/ /bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad/ /dud 'gro'i skye
41a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas rnams na 'ang gda'/ /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/ /pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi/ 'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad/ /des na skye dgu 'di dag rnams/ /gdugs
41a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod/ /la lar bltam pa yongs su bstan/ /la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /la la na ni 'khor lo bskor/ /la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad/ /sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du/ /dgyes shing mgur len rol pa
41a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ /bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad/ /sems can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal/ /'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar/ /sems can rnam par gdul don du/ /'dren
41a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ /rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te/ /byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis/ /sems can rnam par gdul slad du/ /'dren pa rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ /smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul/ /
41a5(dkon brtsegs): zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar/ /rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad/ /de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /
41a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig /sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bya ba'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag mchod pa yang mthong /
41a7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun
41a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin du bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to/ /lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po
41b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang /
41b2(dkon brtsegs): dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel lo/ /gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdang bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba
41b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni gser/ bai dUr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu ni bai dUr+ya/ /shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o/ /
41b4(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang /
41b5(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang /
41b6(dkon brtsegs): bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to/ /gdugs bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par
41b7(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go/ /rgyal mtshan bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan
41b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/
42a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po can sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur to/ /bla re bkra ba/
42a2(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur te/ bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang / dngul skud kyi bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying
42a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go/ /de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad
42a4(dkon brtsegs): khri drug stong po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
42a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol du gzhog go/ /de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de
42a6(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed par gyur to/ /de nas 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug
42a7(dkon brtsegs): stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
42a8(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang 'chi las rnam bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rga dang 'chi las rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis
42b1(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa 'ang ma mchis so/ /bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus ldan zhing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar gyur
42b2(dkon brtsegs): par shog / bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing / /mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te/ /spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing / /'gro ba rnams spyod mya ngan zlo bar shog /bdag cag tshul khrims
42b3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing / /shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur par shog /de ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur/ /skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par shog /'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur/ /bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu
42b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / /ma 'dres bcwa brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing / /'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog /bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang / /rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang / /brag cha nam mkha' 'dra bar ston
42b5(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / /ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das
42b6(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa/ /'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs/ /
42b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dab bzangs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te/ /bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed/ /rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad
42b8(dkon brtsegs): thal mo rab sbyar cing / /dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod/ /mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal/ /rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ /mi mchog khyod la khong dag mchi ba ni/ /
43a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi/ /'khor 'dir 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /yongs
43a2(dkon brtsegs): su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal nas/ /rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste/ /slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol/ /rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa
43a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzod/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyis/ /rang 'byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/
43a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden/ /rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsungs dbyangs kyis/ /mdab bzangs 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul
43a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis dri pa legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa/ /de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyi nyon/ /the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing / /stobs
43a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis/ /'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir/ /mdab chags dbang pos nga la mchod legs byas/ /ma 'dres bcwa brgyad chos ni smra ba yi/ /sred med bu lus shin
43a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'khregs pa dang / /sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /yongs su btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas/ /rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang / /gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang / /
43a8(dkon brtsegs): phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba/ /'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas/ /de dag nga la dga' bas mchod byas pas/ /dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas/ /lha dang brtul zhugs 'thun par
43b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'dong / /'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin/ /bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing / /rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas/ /de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de
43b2(dkon brtsegs): dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste/ /mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med/ /rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun du mdzes/ /ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rang 'byung 'gyur/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi bgrangs par/ /
43b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs/ /'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas/ /lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur/ /skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs
43b4(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad cur 'gyur/ /de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi/ /shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung / /'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i nga bsal phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ /mi dag de ltar
43b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnams nga rgyal che/ /mdab bzangs lus su gyur nas stobs po che/ /'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na/ /drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste/ /
43b6(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub spyod de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis/ /dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur/ /tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab tu/ /tshe zad shi 'phos
43b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te lus kyang zhig / nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes/ /tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems
43b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskyed/ /nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // bam po bzhi pa/ de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
44a1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dag dga' mgu yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de dag
44a2(dkon brtsegs): gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bai dUr+ya'i dra ba lda ldir bkye ba mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba/ gser gyi yu ba can/ bai dUr+ya'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/ rin po che'i chun po spyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
44a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul to/ /rta sngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ bai dUr+ya'i srab kyis bsrabs pa/ bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /
44a4(dkon brtsegs): nor bu skar mdog gi bla re kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod la/ des 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa cig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to/ /de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba mig tu mdzes
44a5(dkon brtsegs): pa blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa drug bres par mngon par sprul to/ /bla re de'i khor khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung
44a6(dkon brtsegs): rkang dag mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te/
44a7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' las 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag dkrol cing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed pa lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/
44a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ud pa la dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/
44b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so/ /de nas de dag gis rol mo
44b2(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang
44b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /nor bu skar mdog gi bla re dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa
44b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la de lta bur yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to/ /sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong
44b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas
44b6(dkon brtsegs): klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te/ me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go/ /
44b7(dkon brtsegs): spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
44b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis
45a1(dkon brtsegs): gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang
45a2(dkon brtsegs): gi nam mkha' la 'khor de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod
45a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /klu'i bu mo mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/ /byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing shAkya thub pa de ring mchod pa chen po byas/ /rgyan gyis
45a4(dkon brtsegs): legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral/ /rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon
45a5(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/ /kha dog sngo zhing rgyan yang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan/ /de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub la rta yis mchod pa byed/ /klu'i bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag
45a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis/ /mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas/ /sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams
45a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum grag / sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba
45a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad khebs par gyur/ /nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal/ /klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas/ /gzhal du med pa'i sems
45b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing / /'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog /ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grol ba ltar/ /chos
45b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol/ /chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu blta bur nyam chung la/ /char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med/ /
45b3(dkon brtsegs): me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni/ /'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi/ sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ /
45b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa/ /byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs/ /de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams
45b5(dkon brtsegs): la bstan/ /ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang / /yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis/ /de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid/ /
45b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ /yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod sten pas/ /des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur/ /
45b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi sras rnams chos gyis yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra/ /'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang / /de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon/ /skyabs dang
45b8(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchis/ /gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod/ /sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid
46a1(dkon brtsegs): par shog / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten na
46a2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad/ /dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yongs ma mthong / /mi'i dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs/ /de thos lha
46a3(dkon brtsegs): mi lha min tshogs dang klu'i bu mo gsang ba pa/ /dri za rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /rgyal bas chos
46a4(dkon brtsegs): gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yong ma mchis/ /de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur/ /thub pa bde
46a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi/ /'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan gyur/ /bde gshegs
46a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba/ /
46a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol/ /drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsal the tshom khum/ /rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom
46a8(dkon brtsegs): thul/ /su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /'di ni su'i mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol/ /thos nas bdag cag yi rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes
46b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bde bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /'dzum rgyu dga' ba skyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol/ /des thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis
46b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul la legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa
46b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni legs par dris/ /klu yi bu mos mchod tshe 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /de yi 'bras bu bstan kyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon/ /gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi
46b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig la nyon/ /klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam bshig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas/ /'di na byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po
46b5(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ /chos rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong
46b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing bdag po med mthong legs/ /mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra/ /byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong / /nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de
46b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang 'gro ba stong shes pas/ /klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas/ /ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha
46b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha'i gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /lhar gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de na tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i
47a1(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang / /dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dag de na lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /pad ma chus
47a2(dkon brtsegs): mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /skyob pa rnams kyi dran brdol brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/ /de dag
47a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod nas ni/ /tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te/ /mi
47a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshad bar tu gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni/ /mkhas pa tshe zad blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas/ /'dren pa bsam pa
47a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can/ /chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs
47a6(dkon brtsegs): ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs/ /bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
47a7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas/ /der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag bskal par tshangs gnas 'thun par
47a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang / /thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed/ /mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med/ /bsam gtan
47b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po bzhin/ /kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan/ /mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan
47b2(dkon brtsegs): sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba/ /tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas/ /kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir/ /rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum
47b3(dkon brtsegs): lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston/ /tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang 'byung bsam pa des 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan
47b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la/ /ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston/ /de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir/ /phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag
47b5(dkon brtsegs): khrig mang po byang chub bkod/ /rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha dang mi dang klu dang mdab bzangs dag dang
47b6(dkon brtsegs): lha min bcas pa dang / /dri za grul bum mi 'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyis stobs rnyed pa/ /de dag thams cad yi rangs thal sbyar
47b7(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas
47b8(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa
48a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ rims nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/
48a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o/ /'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ rgod pa/ mi brtan pa/
48a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa / drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ 'thun par zhugs pa/
