48a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bud med du gyur ba 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mi zad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
48a5(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so/ /
48a6(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
48a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mos nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar
48a8(dkon brtsegs): byas so/ /n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches tshal bar bkang ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par
48b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang
48b2(dkon brtsegs): bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur to/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum
48b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa lan di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'das bar 'gyur ba/ mi dang lha rnams kyi
48b4(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas nor bu la la las ni me 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de la la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung /
48b5(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / /la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i
48b6(dkon brtsegs): yod byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung / la la ni snum gyi bya ba byed/ la la ni me long gi bya ba byed de 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji
48b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i chos 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos
48b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ /rgyal mtshan rnam pa
49a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna
49a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang / me tog brtseg ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'
49a3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du dkri ste rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/
49a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du
49a5(dkon brtsegs): bab par 'gyur to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/
49a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod
49a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos phrag pa
49a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su
49b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ /mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/ /dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can/ /rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te/ bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer
49b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung / /lo drug bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang / /bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur/ /thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad/ /ji ltar
49b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod/ /'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de/ /'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang / /byang chub
49b4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni ji ltar bsgrub mdzad pa/ /bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe ka ling rgyal pos bzod smra ba'i/ /zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te/ /
49b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma btang ste/ /gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gcal gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang
49b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ste/ /bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che/ /bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci zhe na/ /bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyid pa/ /ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi/ /
49b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang / /bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyod bde bka' stsal
49b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/ /thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson/ /ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhin spyod 'gyur pa/ /de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan
50a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thob 'chal zhing / /klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa skom par gnas/ /'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur pa'i/ /brtul zhugs spyod bde bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ /
50a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang
50a3(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
50a4(dkon brtsegs): tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa'i rnams/ /rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dren pa bde
50a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba/ /mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni/ /'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis/ /
50a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa the tshom rnam par bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub/ /de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'/ /gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te/ /rmongs par bgyis nas yid mi dga' bar
50a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis/ /bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /shAkya seng ge bka' stsol the tshom khum/ /sor bcu thal mo
50a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing / /'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du lta/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal du gsol/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar gyur te/ /rgyal bas
50b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na/ /gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad
50b2(dkon brtsegs): de slar bka' stsal pa/ /thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis/ /tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis/ /rta thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis/ /
50b3(dkon brtsegs): klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te/ /'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas/ /skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol/ /snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi/ /
50b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten/ /'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la/ /'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur/ /zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs/ /mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon
50b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ /rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su/ /shin tu yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro/ /'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/ /gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas/ /mnyam pa'i
50b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang byams dang snying rje thob/ /'gro ba snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can/ /'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral
50b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing / /'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste/ /de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob/ de na bdud med mu
50b8(dkon brtsegs): stegs tshogs kyang med/ /'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi/ /rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/ /bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang / /bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos
51a1(dkon brtsegs): byed 'gyur/ /srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing / /rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur/ /mtshungs med thob pa bde bar myur du yang / /yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur/ /
51a2(dkon brtsegs): thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur/ /skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan/ /'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur/ /phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin ming de
51a3(dkon brtsegs): dag / rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag kun du chos rtogs dran dang ldan/ /bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med 'thob par 'gyur/ /de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni/ /bstan pa de la mi
51a4(dkon brtsegs): dgar 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yin/ /'gro ba 'chi med yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs/ /rga ba dang ni nad dang 'chi ba dang / /mya ngan smre sngags
51a5(dkon brtsegs): 'don las yongs su 'grol/ /tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur/ /klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la/ /yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams/ /gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi/ /ye
51a6(dkon brtsegs): shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan/ /klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste/ /de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i
51a7(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su song / /klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// // de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyi lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu
51a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams chos kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skye nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin
51b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' ba chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya
51b2(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan
51b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du mi dgongs
51b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam mo/ /de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi
51b5(dkon brtsegs): bla re bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i
51b6(dkon brtsegs): bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go/ /rin po che'i bla re de dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams
51b7(dkon brtsegs): la ni dngul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai dUr+ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i
51b8(dkon brtsegs): lda ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la ni bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi
52a1(dkon brtsegs): bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyang
52a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgyad pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai dUr+ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad mngon par sprul to/ /
52a3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs de dag la yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gyi me tog gi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / klu'i nor
52a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go/ /mu tig dmar po'i 'dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi gzungs byas so/ /grul bum gyi rol mo'i sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /
52a5(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla re dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byed cing /
52a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/ /bskor nas shi rta de dag la babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
52a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can/ /thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste/ /ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i ri 'dra ba/ /mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang / tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa
52a8(dkon brtsegs): chags mi mnga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas/ /shes rab ldan la dregs pa yod mi mnga'/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen/ /rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dga' 'dra dang / /chu zla nam mkha'i smyig rgyu lta bur ni/ /bde bar gshegs
52b1(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs/ /dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang / /grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med/ /gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste/ /de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs/ /mchod pa 'di kun brag ca ji
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/ /shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang / /me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/ /brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'/ /'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang / /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog /
52b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis/ /rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi/ /na dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i/ /skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / /byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas/ /gang thos
52b4(dkon brtsegs): grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par bgyi/ /bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi/ /thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab ston pa/ /mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par
52b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi
52b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/ /rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'/ /ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na/ /'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsol nyan par 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom
52b7(dkon brtsegs): som nyi 'tshal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur/ /de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong / /deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i
52b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bgyi/ /mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas/ /gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom/ /gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas/ /rnam dag thugs mnga'
53a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ /thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par bgyis/ /'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur/ /the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/ /'dzum mdzad de yi don
53a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyan slad du/ /'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas/ /'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom sol/ /rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka'
53a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na/ /'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par gyur/ /de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /grul bum mchog kyis nga la mchod byas te/ /zhi ba'i chos la
53a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag yid kyang bzhag / mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngom gyur te/ /zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de/ /zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang / /lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing / /bsam pa thag
53a5(dkon brtsegs): pas snying rje chen po bskyed/ /snying rje bas na nga la mchod pa byas/ /rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams/ /mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na/ /grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzang / /brgya byin lha yi drung du
53a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dong par 'gyur/ /thugs rje byams don mdzad skyob drung du 'ang 'dong / /de ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te/ /phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur/ /de dag bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/ /zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing / /bdag nyid chen
53a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos la mchod pa byed/ /go cha chen po rab du bgos yid kyis/ /de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams/ /khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te/ /ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal
53a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba/ /der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes/ /de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na/ /ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol byed/ /rgyal ba ngo mtshar med par zhing sbyong zhing / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
53b1(dkon brtsegs): bla med zhi ba 'tshol/ /de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te/ /'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro/ /de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing / /bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te/ /grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thos nas/ /'gro ba the
53b2(dkon brtsegs): tshom bsal te dga' bar gyur/ /grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyis mchod pa yang mthong /
53b3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rang nas rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med par yang yang dag par bka' stsal pa/ bya ba rnams kyang
53b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i
53b5(dkon brtsegs): sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bya ba phrag gsum
53b6(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug /so re re la yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad ma bdun bdun/ pad ma
53b7(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / 'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pad ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na
53b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag gi mgo bo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bras pa'i
54a1(dkon brtsegs): bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa
54a2(dkon brtsegs): drug po de dag la zhon te/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang /
54a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu Sha ka dang / man dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon
54a4(dkon brtsegs): par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /spos kyi bla re de dag
54a5(dkon brtsegs): las spos kyi ngad 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go/ /lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo/ /spos chu'i char de mngon par 'bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus
54a6(dkon brtsegs): rjab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo'i sil snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
54a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po che sa srung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so/ /
54a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor/ la la ni me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po nas/ skya snar khra bo dang /
54b1(dkon brtsegs): skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che snyim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni
54b2(dkon brtsegs): na bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rags dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo/ /la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan kha dog
54b3(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po
54b4(dkon brtsegs): sa srung gi bu de dag la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skor ba byed byed pa las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs
54b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa/ srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad/ khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te/
54b6(dkon brtsegs): khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'/ mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du/ grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan/ 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la/ dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod/ /
54b7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ brjed pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis/ tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis/ 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyong / /
54b8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ong med dang / gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang / chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan/ chos rnams
55a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis/ /'jig rten gtso bos bya ba 'ang yongs su bstan/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan/ /
55a2(dkon brtsegs): shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag /bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang / /shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /
55a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ni chos la yongs su skul mi bgyid/ /chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis/ /chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te/ /chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis/ /'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon
55a4(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs/ /kun rdzob de yang de na ma mchis te/ /'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs/ /mig gi rang bzhin gang na 'ang ma mchis la/ /
55a5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par gzhag /chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na/ /'jig rten mkhas pas shin du ngo mtshar mdzad/ /de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te/ /
55a6(dkon brtsegs): nor pa'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams/ /chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar/ /'dren pa bde
55a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas/ bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /nga rgyal
55a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgyad ldan yongs su dgrol/ /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba
55b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la/ /g.yo yi zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong / /yongs 'thom spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol/ /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba mi
55b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas mig dang bral ba yi/ /lha tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing / /bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chud gzon dgrol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug po de dag gi
55b3(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas
55b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na/ /bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs/ /nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi
55b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mthong nas/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par 'gyur/ /'dzum ba'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal/ /thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig
55b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs/ /the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/ /su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul
55b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ /blo gros rtogs pa tshul bzhin gnas par gyur/ /gang gis blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang
55b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ /bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dga'/ /sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing / /dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta/ /nyon mongs bral zhing myang na rab spangs pa/ /
56a1(dkon brtsegs): dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig /'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
56a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste/ /'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pas/ /
56a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan kyis/ /bstan pa de la dga'
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes snyegs shing / /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas/ /chos nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste/ /chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba
56a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang med pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas/ /rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur/ /gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba/ /des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs
56a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas/ /rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /byang chub rgyu med 'chi med tshol byed cing / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do/ /nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje
56a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos/ /'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas/ /dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te/ /blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul pa/
56a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa/ /bye ba khrag khrig mngal mchod byed 'gyur/ /zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing / /de dag la ni mkhas pa
56b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang nyan/ /de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongs su sbyong / /de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni/ /khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston/ /'gro ba 'di dag
56b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong rig nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa/ /rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni
56b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i/ /bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston/ /rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa
56b4(dkon brtsegs): yis/ /de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan/ /rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa/ /dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad/ /dri za lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'/ /der ni bde
56b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas/ /shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dod/ /dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // 'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ de nas
56b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgya bcus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ /rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
56b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos pas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes
56b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ de dag gi bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas
57a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ /tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /mngon shes stobs ni kun du mtha' yas te/ /rgya mtsho chu 'dzin pas ma 'tshal dang 'dra/
57a2(dkon brtsegs): de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/ /mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod/ /ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'/ /gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'/ /shes rab mchog mnga' bde
57a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs ye shes stobs/ /tshad gzung dpag par nus pa yod ma mchis/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud/ /skye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa/ /de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen/ /de bas
57a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas/ /de dag ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang / /de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang / /de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /
57a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod/ /mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen/ /phrag dog rnam pa 'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste/ /de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas/ /'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud
57a6(dkon brtsegs): gar 'khyams pa/ /de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ye shes rgyun tu rab 'byung bas/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs/ /
57a7(dkon brtsegs): chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing / /byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa/ /de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing / /ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg
57a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur dang / /lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chad pa rnams/ /de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang / /gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar/ /gang la rten cing las rnams
57b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste/ /rnam par thar ba'i sgo ni gang zhig gis/ /ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod
57b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/ /rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yis/ /bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /'jig rten
57b3(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas/ /dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang / /ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /gang dag rgyal ba rnams la
57b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bskyed de/ /rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing / /chos kun stong pa nyid du rab brtags nas/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /'gro rgyud kun du smon pa rnam spangs te/ /lus
57b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas/ /phung po brag cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur te/ /byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs/ /mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /mtshungs med khyod kyis
57b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thugs chud pa/ /de yis bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag
57b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /mi yi
57b8(dkon brtsegs): zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol/ /ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal
58a1(dkon brtsegs): mgon pos de dag the tshom bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur/ /de ring su zhig rgyal la dang ba skyed/ /gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs/ /gang gis sems ni mi sgul
58a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol/ /de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing / /kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdong / /ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur pa/ /de ltar dpa' bos
58a3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags/ /gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'dir bstan lags/ /gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis gyur/ /de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal
58a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bsal gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /
58a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas/ /rang byung 'dzum mdzad
58a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ni dris pas na/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs par mthong / /de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par byas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas/ /'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /
58a7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de/ /'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas/ /rang byung
58a8(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang / /chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang / /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'gro ba kun du smon pa rnams spangs shing / /byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang / /
58b1(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnam shig cing / /kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te/ /srid pa kun du chu la pad mo bzhin/ /byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang / /de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur pa/ /stong
58b2(dkon brtsegs): par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa/ /de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste/ /byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes/ /skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste/ /de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin/ /dngos
58b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas/ /zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /
58b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min/ /ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te/ /shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas/ /shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur nas/ /byang chub lam la de
58b5(dkon brtsegs): dag spyod ces bya/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya/ /mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis ston/ /smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /de ltar spyod na gzhin min spyod pa yin/ /
58b6(dkon brtsegs): de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur/ /rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te/ /zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur/ /gnod sbyin tshogs
58b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ded mos yid gyur te/ /'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas pas/ /gnod sbyin rgyu nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams/ /mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /
58b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing du dod zhing skad cig gcig la yang / /blo chen de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod/ /de dag gzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston/ /de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /mtshan ma med par
59a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing 'dong 'gyur te/ /'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas/ /'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod/ /de ltar brtan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas/ /byang chub bla med de yang thob 'gyur
59a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ /de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can/ /de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya/ /zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal
59a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gi/ tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur/ /de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni/ /rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs snyed de/ /kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas
59a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la sdug bsngal med/ /de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten dag /rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol/ /ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te/ /kun kyang brtson
59a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur/ /gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ /bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod
59a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dang / /gnod sbyin gyis mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas shin du ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur te/ khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmyigs la srog dang / skye ba po dang / shing las
59a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang / bdag gi yang gang yang med la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs
59a8(dkon brtsegs): las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmyigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ /sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs/ /'on kyang bcom ldan
59b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do/ /ci zhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung
59b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa mdzad/ /ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing gi bkod pa dang / der skye zhing yongs
59b3(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas
59b4(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di
59b5(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig
59b6(dkon brtsegs): las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom
59b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/ /shes rab
59b8(dkon brtsegs): che mnga' bdag dogs skyes/ /stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bde gshegs bdag gis de ma 'tshal/ /gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings/ /'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang / /rang bzhin med gsung ji
60a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu/ /mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchog /skye ba 'ang ma mchis byang chub tu/ /sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu/ /skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i/ /ldem po gang de bdag ma 'chal/ /mi dbang bdag
60a2(dkon brtsegs): po ji ltar na/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung / /de ni yang dag lung bstan pas/ /thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye zhes/ /gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag
60a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal/ /gnas pa 'ang mchis pa ma lags la/ /dge bshes bsten gsung ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal/ /g.yo ba 'ang
60a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal/ /rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /rtogs shes mgon gsung
60a5(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu/ /the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes/ /shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal/ /zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa/ /chos kun nyid gsungs ji lta bu/ /mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag /bdag la rnam par bstan
60a6(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ /sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams/ /nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu/ /chos ni rab tu spang bgyis na/ /mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu/ /brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang / /'gro ba gzhan
60a7(dkon brtsegs): yang gsungs pa dang / /las de bgyid pa ma mchis la/ /rang las can gsung ji lta bu/ /bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang / /zil gyis mi non bdag ma 'tshal/ /mgon po de la bdag dogs na/ /bde
60a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol/ /dge ba'i tshogs gyur ma mchis la/ /byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs/ /dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul/ /de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal/ /
60b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la/ /spong byed las ni zad bstan pa/ /tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang / /bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal/ /yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal pa/ /ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan
60b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /'di yang rab rib bral ba yi/ /spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol/ /thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di/ /sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/ /
60b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar
60b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ /stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na/ /rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung / /ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bur/ /rang gi rang bzhin
60b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas gyur na/ /'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste/ /de la 'phel med 'grib pa med/ /me long shin tu yongs dag la/ /ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du/ /ljon pa chos
60b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes par gyis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na/ /mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes/ /yan lag rnams la brtag byos la/ /ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod/ /chos dbyings rnam pa
60b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du/ /'gyur mang skye bo mkhas pas rtogs/ /byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/ /blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes/ /skye ba 'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed/ /de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /
60b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba'i rnams/ /'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa/ /logs pa'i sems dang 'du shes can/ /
61a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /de dag sngon cad ma thos pa'i/ /sems med chos ni ngas bshad na/ /byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams/ /'di la kun du rmongs par 'gyur/ /byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang / /
61a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas/ /zil gyis ma non rang byung sems/ /rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba/ /de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan
61a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la/ /'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med/ /dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces / /bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lhar
61a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba/ /ji lta bu zhe dgos gyur pa/ /mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang / /skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad/ /gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la/ /dge bshes bsten ces gang smras pa/ /gnas dang bral
61a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bya ba'i phyir/ /gnas pa med pa'i dge bshes bsten/ /g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa/ /shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang / /shing rta'i bya ba gzhan du rtogs/ /
61a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gang bdag yod khas len cing / /bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa/ /de dag la ni bya ba dang / /g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad/ /rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /rtogs shes nga yis gang
61a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ /byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams/ /rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa/ /de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston/ /kun du rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed/ /yang
61a8(dkon brtsegs): dag ma yin rtog pas bcings/ /zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang / /zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni/ /mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis/ /kun du rtog las sred pa ste/ /skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la/ /
61b1(dkon brtsegs): kun rtog pas skom pa skye/ /mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu/ /yod pa min la log par brtags/ /chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang / /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin yongs su rtog pas bkrugs/ /sdug pa min
61b2(dkon brtsegs): la sdug par rtog / byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag /sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis/ /sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te/ /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med/ /gzugs med sdug
61b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin na/ /byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can/ /sdug par rtog pas bcings par 'gyur/ /chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang / /spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa/ /med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa/ /mi
61b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na/ /bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa/ /de dag stong zhes thos gyur nas/ /bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye/ /de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te/ /nam
61b5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la ni mdud bor nas/ /stong pa gya nom spong byed de/ /mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung / /mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang / /skye bo'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang / /las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te/ byed
61b6(dkon brtsegs): pa po ni rab tu bkrag / yang dag tu ni 'gro ba dag /rmi 'drar bshad pa shes par gyis/ /rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med/ /log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen/ /ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan/ /byed po phyogs bcu
61b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams na med/ /shing rnams rlung gis bsgul pa las/ /me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no/ /bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes/ /rlung dang shing la sems pa med/ /lon kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar/ /lag kyi byed po
61b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no/ /bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la/ /byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang / /legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni/ /de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos/ /mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste/ /de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi/ /
62a1(dkon brtsegs): lo la phung por spungs pa med/ /sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs/ /zad pa med ces gang smras pa/ /las zad ces ni ngas smras pa/ /stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med/ /tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan/ /yang dag mtha' ni
62a2(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad pa/ /phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'/ /log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams/ /yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de/ /mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi/ /ye shes lam du zhugs
62a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi/ /nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig /yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi/ /byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan/ /chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /de ltar spyod pa byed
62a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ /mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te/ /'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa/ /a yis chos la 'jug par bstan/ /a yi
62a5(dkon brtsegs): sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa/ /de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs/ /chos kun 'gyur ba med pa yang / /a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan/ /a yi
62a6(dkon brtsegs): sgo yi gzungs 'di dag / ljon pa 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /mi zad pa dang zad smras pa/ /chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis/ /mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /
62a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la sgo med de/ /de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung / /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces/ /yang dag ji bzhin bde
62a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos kun lus med byang chub ces/ /blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la
62b1(dkon brtsegs): brten nas 'dug par bya/ /chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste/ /med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med/ /'di yang gzugs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste/ /med pas de dag gdags pa med/ /
62b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste/ /med pas de dag rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /
62b3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo mo nga las nyon/ /chon kun yid la bya ba med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa/ /'di
62b4(dkon brtsegs): yang gzugs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas shes par bya/ /chos kun thogs pa med pa ste/ /thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams
62b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma skyes par/ /mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya/ /chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa/ /de dag ming med shes par bya/ /chos rnams yang dag ma yin te/ /de dag ma lus rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs
62b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas shes par bya/ /gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba/ /de dag mthong med bstan par bya/ /lta ba po ni med pa dang / /de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro/ /chos kun mnyam med de bas na/ /mtshan nyid gcig cing
62b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gzhi med/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/ /chos kun yod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar lhag med chad pa med/ /mnyam bzhag med cing gnyis su med/ /gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med/ /blta ba'i lam min med
62b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ /drang po ma yin yod po min/ /mun pa ma yin snang ba min/ /mthong ba med cing thos med de/ /med pas gzugs su shes par gyis/ /g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste/ /chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba
63a1(dkon brtsegs): med/ /'khrug pa med cing khro ba med/ /ci yang mi byang nyer zhi med/ /sgyel ba med cing gnas kyang med/ /'gro med ldog med 'gro sems med/ /nyal ba med cing mi nyal med/ /sad pa med par shes
63a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyis/ /mig can ma yin long ba min/ /lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min/ /sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min/ /dul ba ma yin ma dul min/ /rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min/ /'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bden
63a3(dkon brtsegs): min brdzun min de lta bur/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis/ /'jig rten gdul ba'i don phyir gyi/ /'di la the tshom gang yang med/ /gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom med/ /dam pa'i don du byung ba med/ /de nas
63a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa lung bstan pa dang / /gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ khang
63a5(dkon brtsegs): pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang / pad ma la rten pa dang / ri la rten pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan
63a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes
63a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/ /de mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la lan
63a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs
63b1(dkon brtsegs): te rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rnam
63b2(dkon brtsegs): pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
63b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /
63b4(dkon brtsegs): lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal/ /zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du/ /smra ba'i zla
63b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i zhal du lta/ /bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig /gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes/ /bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol/ /bde gshegs gang gis chos
63b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid la/ /dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das/ /ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum/ /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis/ /bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing / /
63b7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad/ / ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur/ /de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /the tshom bcad slad ljon pa dang / /mi ci
63b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du/ /sangs rgyas yon tan sten 'gyur ba/ /
64a1(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris/ /ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa/ /bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can/ /de khyod dang ba'i yid byos la/ /skyo med yid kyis nga
64a2(dkon brtsegs): la nyon/ /'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa/ /de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas/ /the tshom gcad pa nga las nyon/ /ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci/ /bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa/ /
64a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga la mchod byas nas/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der/ /lha mi'i nang du 'khor bar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas/ /sems la dbang sgyur dbang
64a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'gyur/ /mi yi seng ge de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/ /sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas na/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang / /de dag lha
64a5(dkon brtsegs): mir 'khor 'khor nas/ /rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su/ /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la/ /mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon/ /chags med ye shes mthong
64a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag yas/ /stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur/ /de dag zhing du sems can gang / /yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye/ /nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba/ /kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa/ /mi yi seng
64a7(dkon brtsegs): ge'i zhing der ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba/ /de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste/ /mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams/ /bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas
64a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes/ /de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs/ /sems can rlabs chen de dag ni/ /smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /bsam pas rang zhing rnam par
64b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong / /nyon mongs 'jom pa de dag gi/ zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni/ /dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams/ /ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag /de dag zhing du rnam kun du/ /mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /zhing rnams
64b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs sbyangs de dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren/ /de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad/ /lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams/ /kun kyang yi ni rangs par 'gyur/ /mi 'am
64b3(dkon brtsegs): ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas lha phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu
64b4(dkon brtsegs): la yi rangs te/ /rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong
64b5(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug bcu tshun chad me tog mAn dA ra bas pus nub tsam du gang bar byas so/ /de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
64b6(dkon brtsegs): nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can/ /'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag /
64b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi/ /'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par/ /zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan pa/ /thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe/ /mi rnams
64b8(dkon brtsegs): zla ba phyag 'tshal ba/ /de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta/ /dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa/ /dpag yas ye shes phung po ldan/ /gzi brjid dpag yas phung
65a1(dkon brtsegs): po can/ /blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stug pa/ /bden bzhi mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel/ /rgyal ba'i bcwa brgyad chos dang ldan/ /the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i
65a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog / sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs/ /bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/ /
65a3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa/ /ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can/ /bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags/ /ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa/ /ser sna mi mangs nyan thos btul/ /zhi ba'i thugs
65a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis spyod mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul/ /skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs khyod/ /gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi/ /chos rnams 'dir ni thob
65a5(dkon brtsegs): par shog / ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi/ /bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du/ /'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang / /lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /
65a6(dkon brtsegs): snying brtser nye bar bzung nas ni/ /'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba/ /srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi/ /bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig /'gro ba
65a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa/ /srid pa'i rgyu las dgrol bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas
65a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i/ /
65b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba dang bgyis byung mthong nas/ /'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /'dzum pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal/ /don chen 'dzum pa mdzad
65b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don/ /bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa'i mchog /dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod/ /the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par bgyis/ /gang gis deng mchog bla med gyis/ /
65b3(dkon brtsegs): su zhig de ring gting thob gyur/ /bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum/ /de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas/ /dkrugs g.yengs kun du 'khrugs par bgyis/ /deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga'
65b4(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan par gyis/ /rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston/ /'gro ba'i the tshom myur du khum/ /de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams/ /kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
65b5(dkon brtsegs): bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ /phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pas/ /des na 'gro ba mang po yi/ /don chen shin du deng byas 'gyur/ /stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris
65b6(dkon brtsegs): par/ /sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston/ /de ni 'gro ba mang don du/ /de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus/ /phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis/ /nga la sems dang nga mchod pas/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu/ /
65b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /'thun par mi yi nang skyes ste/ /rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la/ /me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/ /kun du bde bar gshegs kyi
65b8(dkon brtsegs): sems/ /skye par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur/ /rang byung mi yi seng ge la/ /tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis/ /rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang / /me tog
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis/ /mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te/ /de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing / /mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la/ /rnam par 'dren par
66a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'byung / /grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba/ /brgyad khri po rnams de dag kun/ /bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur/ /me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya/ /de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang / /ngan
66a3(dkon brtsegs): song gshin rje'i 'jig rten ming / /zhing de na ni lha min med/ /mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom/ /phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/ /ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i tshe tshad
66a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med/ /de tshi mi dge sgra mi grag /mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos/ /de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi/ /skye bo rnams kyi chos can 'gyur/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag /gang gA'i bye ma rab
66a5(dkon brtsegs): mang snyed/ /grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /grags pa ma smad de dag gi/ ring srel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur/ /de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel
66a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'ang / /rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi/ /rang bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang / /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
66a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi/ /lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa/ /thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang / /de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'/ /phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i
66a8(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / // de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas
66b1(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de 'di lta ste/ dper na kham pa'i gru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su
66b2(dkon brtsegs): p hyin na gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pha rol du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes pa de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi
66b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan
66b4(dkon brtsegs): cig tu rin po che'i bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to/ /de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang / skar mdog dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ /lha'i rol mo
66b5(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas rol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la
66b6(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu shaka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis
66b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
66b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi/ /lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag /'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na/ /thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis/ /rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis/ /'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod
67a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis pa/ /rkang gnyis mchod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum/ /mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sred pa'i phur pa rab tu phyung / /
67a2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal/ /khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste/ /rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs/ /khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste/ /'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams sos/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs thams
67a3(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs/ /'ching ba dag ni thams cad bcad/ /sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste/ /thub pa chags pa kun las 'das/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ /bcom ldan khyod la
67a4(dkon brtsegs): smon pa yang / /rnam pa kun du ming mnga'o/ /khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyang / /ma rig pas ni thugs kyang phyung / /rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci log /rnam pa kun du yongs su spangs/ /gang du
67a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mi chud de/ /ri dwags rngon pas ji bzhin du/ /'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yin/ /yang dag mtha' ni khyos kyis gzigs/ /sems can 'jig tshogs ltar lhung ste/ /stod pa
67a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni ma 'tshal bas/ /ma rig pa'i mun pas gtibs/ /'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyid/ /khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du/ /'gro de chad pa stong 'drar gzigs/ /gang gis rnam dag mig
67a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i/ /ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan/ /phung po stong par rnam par bshig /ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing / /khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag /bdag med stong par rnam par
67a8(dkon brtsegs): bshig / chos gang dang ni ming gang gis/ /chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba/ /chos de chos des stong pa ste/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen
67b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon sprul na/ /de la sems can gdams ma mchis/ /srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar/ /de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang / /dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang / /yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes/ /skyes bu dam pas
67b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa mdzad/ /ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis/ /bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing / /mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang / /lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang / /byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste/ /de la mi mnyam
67b3(dkon brtsegs): ci ma mchis/ /de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na/ /byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs/ /gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la/ /legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du/ /de ni kun
67b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen khyod kyis bstan/ /shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni/ /ye shes sgron ma rab bus te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sems can rnams la chos bstan pa/ /de ltar bdag cag myur du ni/ /
67b5(dkon brtsegs): bla med byang chub zhi thob ste/ /ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ /'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu/ /'khyams par gyur ba'i sems can la/ /ji ltar 'dren pas
67b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas
67b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu/ /dpa'
67b8(dkon brtsegs): bo chen pos lung bstan gsol/ /skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag /bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas ni/ /yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te/ /kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /de ring su yis
68a1(dkon brtsegs): bdud pham bgyis/ /nem nur gang gis bcad par gyur/ /su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur/ /skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol/ /de ring khyod la su yis mchod/ /ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /
68a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro kun nem nur 'tshal gyur na/ /rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol/ /ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis/ /lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na/ /'gro ba the tshom 'chad 'gyur ba/ /'dren pas de ltar lung
68a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan gsol/ /ci nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams/ /myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta
68a4(dkon brtsegs): thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la/ /'dzum pa rgyu rnams dri bya zhes/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs/ /'jig rten
68a5(dkon brtsegs): kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing / /nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis/ /dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis/ /dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu/ /de ring
68a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /shin du dang ba'i yid kyis byas/ /sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas/ /stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur/ /chos rnams la ni nges pa rnyed/ /nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas/ /sngon yang sangs rgyas
68a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag / brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod/ /ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni/ /bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur/ /'dren pa de dag ji srid du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing / /bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa/ /
68a8(dkon brtsegs): de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/ /de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na/ /kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/ /mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang ba ste/ /'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi/ /nyan
68b1(dkon brtsegs): thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni/ /blo yi mchog dang ldan pa dag /'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi/ mi rnams de yi dus kyi tshe/ /lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham/ /srog gi dbang po gnas par
68b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi/ /nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams/ /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dag bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i/ /'jig rten mgon po
68b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal ldan rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang / /shin du rgya cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas
68b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/ /mchod rten de dag thams cad la/ /srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas/ /byang chub
68b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/ /rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba/ /lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag /brgyad cu tshang bar gnas
68b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis/ /bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas/ /'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /shAkya yongs su smin mdzad phyir/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la/ /
68b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad/ /de thos nas ni skye bo kun/ /kun du dga' zhing rab dga' ste/ /sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas/ /ston pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
68b8(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / // bam po drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus lha ma yin dag dang / /nam
69a1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi'am ci dag dang / phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /
69a2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa yang thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas yid byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
69a3(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gi rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / be+e dUr+ya'i phreng bas
69a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu ren po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgyad dang / ba gam dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa/ gdugs
69a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo
69a6(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to/ /rta cang shes kyis drad pa'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par
69a7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man dA ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de
69a8(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rgyas par gang par byas so/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bye ba phrag brgyad bcu brgyad cu/ glang po che sa srung
69b1(dkon brtsegs): gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug / so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad ma de dag re re zhing yang mdab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/ 'dab ma
69b2(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo mdun mdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/ dbus su glang po
69b3(dkon brtsegs): che sa srung gi bu dag btsud nas phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so/ /rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ud pa la dang /
69b4(dkon brtsegs): ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser phye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / mnya dzu sha ka dang / mnya dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha
69b5(dkon brtsegs): ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang /
69b6(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul skyur zhing lha
69b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drang pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad bcu la zhon te/ bcom ldan
69b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to/ /lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad bcu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /shing
