70a1(dkon brtsegs): rta bye ba phrag brgyad bcu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad bcu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul
70a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so/ /de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed
70a3(dkon brtsegs): pa las ni chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sems
70a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas chos la the tshom med pa thob par 'gyur to/ /de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
70a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing bdag cag kyang sprul ba dang 'dra bar
70a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul ba dang 'dra bar yang dag par
70a7(dkon brtsegs): shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba shes nas the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod ngo /
70a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang / /sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang / /lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ /de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid/ 'dren pas chos kun
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa gang lags dang / /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang / /'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes/ /de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes/ /bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin
70b2(dkon brtsegs): du/ /ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste/ /rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas/ /'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas/ /byis
70b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa/ /de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no/ /slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang / /bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob
70b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra/ /bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing / /bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs/ /de dag rnams kyang sprul
70b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bcom ldan 'das/ /bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag
70b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra/ /bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog /stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/ /ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag /
70b7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs/ /'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa/ /gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing / /sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa/ /
70b8(dkon brtsegs): de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang / /sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis/ /gang tshe gau ta ma'i bstan pa 'di/ /bdag cag rtogs nas
71a1(dkon brtsegs): the tshom thams cad spangs/ /sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas/ /bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams/ /the tshom ma mchis rang byung
71a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
71a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal yas grags mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can/ /bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad
71a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ /rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshigs gsungs the tshom khum/ /rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di/ /byung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/ /'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du gsol/ /'gro
71a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu yid dga' bas/ /rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod/ /bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka'
71a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal gsol/ /zla ltar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi/ /ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas/ /mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dga' 'gyur bar/ /rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol/ /
71a7(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun/ /sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur nas/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsol te/ /rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral
71a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/ /rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te/ /dgongs pa rig nas rgya chen rtsom par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de
71b1(dkon brtsegs): slar bka' stsal pa/ /lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas/ /rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig /smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/ /'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to/ /lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa/ /
71b2(dkon brtsegs): des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas/ /'dzum mdzad pa yi rgyu de ngas bstan gyis/ /dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas/ /
71b3(dkon brtsegs): chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing / /rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe/ /mi yi gtso bo gang gA'i bye snyed mchod/ /srid rgyun de na 'di dag thub pa las/ /
71b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo / /'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir byas pas/ /chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong / /bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/ /chus zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod
71b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te/ /chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas/ /bskal pa pad ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe/ /smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /khyu mchog ldan
71b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni/ /bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po/ /chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing / /'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs de dag
71b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan la bag yod pa/ /chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems/ /zhig nas de la su sten bag yod pa/ /myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi 'thob/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga
71b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / // de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/
72a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na ma shes pa 'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/
72a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rtogs pa 'am/ mngon du ma byas pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don
72a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen/ legs par mngon du mdzad pas de'i phyir thams cad
72a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /de kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs
72a5(dkon brtsegs): su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma brtags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/
72a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ nye bar ma bsten pa/ ma bor ba/ ma bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/
72a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/
72a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba med pa 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar
72b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /
72b2(dkon brtsegs): reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus
72b3(dkon brtsegs): te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi
72b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang /
72b5(dkon brtsegs): chu dang / me dang rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
72b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dag dang / de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga'
72b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin na de byis pa so so skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams
72b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de dag na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi
73a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de dag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan
73a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
73a3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs/ /khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/ dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag /kun kyang thub pa
73a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa gnyis yin te/ /khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs/ /de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste/ /bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /
73a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/ /bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/ /'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to/ /sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang
73a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dags dang / /lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams/ /mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad/ /rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang / /phyug po'i khyim
73a7(dkon brtsegs): dang dbul po'i khyim dag dang / /bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs/ /bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang / /'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung / /mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /
73a8(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/ /'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to/ /de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na/ /'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste/ /thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang / /
73b1(dkon brtsegs): bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo/ /thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed/ /ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/ /gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya/ /nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/ /kun rdzob
73b2(dkon brtsegs): de la don dam su smra ba/ /de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya/ /mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / /bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang / /mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing / /de la dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa/ /
73b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na/ /'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar 'gyur/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong / /de dag tshul min bde ba tshol
73b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyang / /sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis/ /ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na/ /sbrul gyi lpags pa rnying ltar rab spangs te/ /srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi
73b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/ /gang gis thos nas dga' ba bskyed 'gyur ba/ /de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs
73b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos/ /de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ /de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/ /byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams/ /skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du
73b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i
73b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des/ /khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /mi mchog 'dzum
74a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'khor 'dir rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na/ /'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la/ /bde
74a2(dkon brtsegs): bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te/ /drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod/ /'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu bar mdzad slad du/ /snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol/ /
74a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na/ /skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na/ /mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur/ /mi yi dam pa smra ba'i
74a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis 'dir/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par sol/ /'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdong / /lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol/ /kun kyang rim gror gus par rna
74a5(dkon brtsegs): blags te/ /khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la/ /sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/ /'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs
74a6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na/ /skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du
74a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing / /'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang / /tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang / /gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur/ /gang rnams rgyal bas
74a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan la dga' ba dang / /gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang / /gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag /de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'gro ba gdon zin mthong gyur te/ /mi yi
74b1(dkon brtsegs): seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos nas/ /ud pal phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur/ /nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur pa/ /sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon
74b2(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di/ /me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta/ /'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la/ /bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste/ /nyon mongs dmad cing sangs rgyas
74b3(dkon brtsegs): blo ldan 'gyur/ /snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan/ /rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang gA yi/ /bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas/ /byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing / /dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis
74b4(dkon brtsegs): byas/ /sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje skyed/ /de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la/ /chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par 'gyur/ /gang thos
74b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni rnam par 'dren 'gyur ba/ /rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas/ /de dag rnams la rgya chen mos kyang 'chad/ /rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag /
74b6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad/ /de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/ /cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong / /rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med
74b7(dkon brtsegs): pa smra/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas/ /de dag nga la mchod pa rgya chen byas/ /bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/ /skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal
74b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dam pa la/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur / /bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag /nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ /blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/ sems can bsam yas yongs
75a1(dkon brtsegs): su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams/ /rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa/ /rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis/ /lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag la/ /'thab bral ba
75a2(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/
75a3(dkon brtsegs): gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig cig gzugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba 'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis
75a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
75a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na ji ltar ma skyes pas ma
75a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
75a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/
75a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/
75b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa rnam par shes pa'i bar yang
75b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par
75b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
75b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi
75b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
75b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya
75b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi cha'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las de nyal ba las sang na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran par mi rnyed cing de ltar
75b8(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro
76a1(dkon brtsegs): ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams can ni rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to/ /chos de
76a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin na de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i
76a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo yang dmigs su med/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
76a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang
76a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do/ /bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos
76a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas de dag 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
76a7(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
76a8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa/ /de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed gyur pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul
76b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te/ /sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/ /chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags/ /mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes/ /skyes bu
76b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi/ byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis/ /phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan/ /de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing / /
76b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smod de/ /dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par/ /bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs/ /de la
76b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/ /yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing / /mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod/ /gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad
76b5(dkon brtsegs): rab spangs te/ /srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon/ /dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid/ /phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing / /lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la/ /byang chub sems dpa'
76b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang ma skyes/ /de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis/ /skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams/ /de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/ /mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba/ /de ni khyod sras
76b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni de yi yab/ /gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing / /khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos/ /byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa/ /bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang / /
76b8(dkon brtsegs): gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na/ /de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /phung po skye mched dag dang khams
77a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras mi g.yo bar/ /gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyas sras te/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags/ /phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang / /khams dang byang chub rgyal
77a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rgyal sras dang / /lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par/ /gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste/ /khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang / /byang chub dang
77a3(dkon brtsegs): ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang / /phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang / /skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang / /lung bstan spros pa med par gang
77a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing / /de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te/ /mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags/ /'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags/ /
77a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing / /ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la/ /de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing / /'dren pa 'khor dang bcas
77a6(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur lags/ /rnam par 'dren pa bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi/ /dge ba de yis 'gro ba rab 'byung ba/ /rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan pa grub par
77a7(dkon brtsegs): shog / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
77a8(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa/ 'dren pa rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis/ /stobs bcu brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar
77b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal 'gyur te/ /nyan par 'tshal zhig gzhan du mi sems par/ /kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta/ /'di ltar dper na nad pa nad
77b2(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba/ /sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa/ /de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing / /rkang gnyis dbang po de gshegs zhal du lta/ /'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dgongs
77b3(dkon brtsegs): la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan/ /rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te/ /kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdong / /de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing / /ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dgar 'gyur dang / /
77b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bar/ /ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol/ /mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas
77b5(dkon brtsegs): slar sdo'i sgra ni mi mnga' na/ /rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad
77b6(dkon brtsegs): la/ /'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan/ /de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na/ /de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes
77b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i/ /dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad/ /'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong / /rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyed par gyur/ /gang la 'gro ba
77b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rmongs gyur ba'i/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas/ /bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus/ /de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms/ /
78a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing / /skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas/ /stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pa/ /de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin du byas/ /
78a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du/ /byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang / /gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang / /byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med/ /'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ba/ /de shes byang chub thob par
78a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes/ /lha rnams gang yang de la the tshom med/ /byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod/ /de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du/ /lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te/ /mkhas pa 'di dag nem
78a4(dkon brtsegs): nur med pas na/ /de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur/ /gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas/ /g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med/ /'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa/ /de la 'ang lha rnams the tshom yod
78a5(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang / /thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /de la 'ang lha rnams the tshom rnam par dag /blo mchog
78a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams / /kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te/ /de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /rang 'byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'dren pas skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal
78a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la/ /'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grel par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni/ /rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o/ /de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi/ /bsam pa
78a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa/ /de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang / /yi rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par 'gyur/ /dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe
78b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun bcus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs
78b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
78b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal lo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na chos thams
78b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o/ /
78b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes
78b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /
78b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang
78b8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par
79a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ /tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa
79a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pas de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang
79a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i rang bzhin no/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das gang
79a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni mya ngan las 'da' ba yang btsal bar 'gyur na/
79a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na ni de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
79a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la bdag cag som nyi ma mchis the tshom ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom ma mchis na de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
79a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul
79a8(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa/ 'phrul dga' ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun bcu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
79b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te/ /rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang / /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
79b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas/ /khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa/ /mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /khyod kyis
79b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na/ /'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub slad du/ /de dag lam mchog shin du rnam dag 'gyur/ /the tshom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang / /
79b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste/ /the tshom som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams/ /byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag /sdig pa yongs spangs
79b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dang ldan/ /lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na/ /rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /de bas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing / /the tshom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /
79b6(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing / /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /ngas ni 'jig rten
79b7(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa/ /lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par/ /bstan par ngas byas dang bas kun kyang nyon/ /'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis/ /
79b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te/ /mu stegs tshogs kyis bsam pa zil mnan nas/ /'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags/ /gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la ltung ba ltar/ /
80a1(dkon brtsegs): de la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i tshul thob pa/ /bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes/ /nyi ma nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes/ /
80a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag /bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes/ /skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni/ /sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tshom med/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po
80a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul thob dag / bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes/ /ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ /nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ /ye shes dam pa thob par
80a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur du shes/ /chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ /byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes/ /ji ltar gnam du
80a5(dkon brtsegs): bong ba 'phangs pa ni/ /sa la lhung bar 'gyur du the tshom med/ /de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang / /'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug /gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas yon tan gnas
80a6(dkon brtsegs): par bdag shes la/ /rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi chos nyid rab tu mthong / /gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag /sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smras byas kyang / /chos la
80a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba/ /de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus/ /de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing / /bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan brjod byed pa/ /de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa/ /mi
80a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzod/ /de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing / /de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang smra la/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang
80b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ /rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams/ /bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa/ /de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i/ /'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya/ /gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing / /
80b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gang dag dge bshes bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag byang chub lags mthil 'dra bar gsal/ /tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur/ /gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad/ /sha khrag lpags la mi lta byas pa
80b3(dkon brtsegs): bas/ /gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na/ /de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de ltar min/ /'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang / /ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang byung dang / /da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs
80b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob/ /rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa/ /'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing / /'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas na/ /tshul gyis su ni rang 'byung thob par
80b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa/ /de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams/ /de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul po/ tshul thob rnams kyis mngon bsten myur du 'thob/ /de la rta thul sangs rgyas
80b6(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med/ /sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnam rtse ba/ /tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod/ /de ltas tshul la dad pa'i yid byas te/ /brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal
80b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod la min/ /rtag tu dge bshes mkhas pa bsten byas na/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni/ /'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yi rangs te/ /rjes su yi
80b8(dkon brtsegs): rang the tshom med gyur nas/ /mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur/ /'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // bam po bdun pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang
81a1(dkon brtsegs): byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga'
81a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa yang mi dmigs
81a3(dkon brtsegs): na de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o/ /de lta bu de ni theg pa
81a4(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni gnyis su med do zhes
81a5(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod ma mos na de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems su lags kyang / de ni lam log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
81a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan
81a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/
81a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ /dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar
81b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags la chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos
81b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur ba'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis
81b3(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi
81b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan
81b5(dkon brtsegs): ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
81b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o/ /'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral
81b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba 'am/ skye ba dang / 'gag pas bzung ba 'am/ 'das pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba 'am/ 'dus byas
81b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba
82a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
82a2(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mthar 'byin legs par gsungs/ /'dren pas srid
82a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po ma brnyes na/ /skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis/ /'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs/ /phung po rnams ni kun du mi dmigs te/ /phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid/ /chos gang gang
82a4(dkon brtsegs): gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni/ /mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang / /yongs shes bya dang spang bsgoms mngon bya ba/ /gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te/ /dngos po
82a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung / /byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan
82a6(dkon brtsegs): mas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa/ /de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang / /mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul log pa ste/ /blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod/ /mtshan
82a7(dkon brtsegs): ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas/ /mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te/ /stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa/ /mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod/ /
82a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob/ /phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min/ /gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bgrod bya min/ /rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste/ /rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med dgra bcom
82b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang / /de bzhin rang rgyal skyob par gyur pa dag /mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med/ /go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang / /nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang / /gang rnams stong pas stong zhes stong smra dang / /
82b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus/ /sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la/ /slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams/ /mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs/ /ston pas bstan pa bzhin du
82b3(dkon brtsegs): dgyes byed lags/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo stong bas na/ /bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des/ /'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing / mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /de
82b4(dkon brtsegs): n as bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge
82b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam mkhyen nas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod
82b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dzum mdzad la/ /thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu de ma gsungs na/ /rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsungs/ /'jig rten don slad
82b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu/ /'dren pas bka' stsol the tshom bsal du gsol/ /drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas/ /thub chen khyod kyi 'khor rnams the tshom 'tshal/ /gau tam rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag
82b8(dkon brtsegs): la/ /'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol/ /'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud las rgyab phyogs te/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdong / /'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan the tshom 'tshal/ /don yod grags
83a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol/ /bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis te/ /phyir zhing dad bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de/ /the tshom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar/ /rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par
83a2(dkon brtsegs): khum/ /bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing / /gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/ /lam de nas ni the tshom ma mchis mchi/ /de bas skye bo'i the tshom bcad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
83a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas/ /tshigs su bcad de dus su gang smras shing / /'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa/ /khyod kyi tshig ni dus
83a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin/ /rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas/ /skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur/ /khyod kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen dag /byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa
83a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas mkhyen te/ /rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas bstan to/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i lam de nas/ /don du gnyer ba de dag de bzhin 'dong / /gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par/ /smyig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong / /
83a6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te/ /de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab/ /mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir mi rnams gang / rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jig 'gyur zhing / /mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam
83a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'dong / /mtshan ma med pa byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas/ /ji ltar brtags nas de ltar 'ching ba yin/ /mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi/ /zhi ba dag ni grags
83a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dam pa thob/ /'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis/ /sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed/ /'gro ba kun du sdug bsngal mi chung myong / /de ltar mi mkhas mtshan ma brtag pa byas/ /mtshan mar 'du shes
83b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni phung po dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong / /de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na/ /byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob/ /'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel/ /mtshan ma
83b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa kun du sbyor ba spong / /mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de/ /kun du sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med yin/ /gang rnams byang chub thob par bya rtog pa/ /rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin/ /mkhas pa'i longs
83b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod rnam pa thob byed na/ /longs spyod de nyid mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ /rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong / /rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /de nyid
83b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub gzhan du mkhas me smra/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas/ /mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal/ /dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar/ /mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs
83b5(dkon brtsegs): la legs shes 'dzin/ /'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ /mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing / /rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos rnams yongs shes nas/ /'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun
83b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug bcus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag
83b7(dkon brtsegs): gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur
83b8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de
84a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/ ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma
84a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gag pa yang ma yin/ ma 'gag pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang
84a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ khong khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/
84a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang
84a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ song ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod
84a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yong mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la yang mi gnas/ tha snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la
84a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi gnas/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/
84a8(dkon brtsegs): so so skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos
84b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i
84b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
84b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas
84b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa
84b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha'i bzhin du dag cing gos
84b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon/ /
84b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba bsten pa rjes su ston/ /zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrugs ma mchis/ /khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes/ /zhi ba thob par bgyid
84b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag pa bsten/ /yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton/ /sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god/ /de bsten
85a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung / /'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan/ /gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag gzhal yas 'thob/ /bslobs
85a2(dkon brtsegs): nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag / 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba bgyid gang dag gis/ /'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par
85a3(dkon brtsegs): rtog gyur pa/ /de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das/ /thub pa gang dag zhi
85a4(dkon brtsegs): las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa blo ldan 'das las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis/ /gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs/ /
85a5(dkon brtsegs): phung po 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags/ /dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste/ /chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan
85a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag gsungs/ /thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun du mtshan mi rnyed/ /de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'/ /de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur/ /
85a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob/ /rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa/ /chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa/ /des ni 'gro ba thams cad
85a8(dkon brtsegs): lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa/ /zhi byed zhi ba bstan nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas
85b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni/ /log pa rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing / /ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra
85b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mkhyen/ /rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen/ /ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas/ /kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'drangs pa/ /de la bkres med zad med sems can med/ /rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad
85b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ /chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang / /ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs/ /'di la byed med tshor
85b4(dkon brtsegs): med sems can med/ /byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med/ /'bras bu myong bar 'grur ba de med ces/ /'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yod mi mnga'/ /mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na/ /dga' bar 'gyur yang
85b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig la 'pho ba med/ /tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos kyang med/ /de mkhyen de la the tshom yod mi mnga'/ /pi bang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te/ /sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min/ /de ltar mkhas pas phung
85b6(dkon brtsegs): po 'di gzigs na/ /phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'/ /nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa/ /gos kyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / /
85b7(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar gyur/ /tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang / /rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / /so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa
85b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /ji ltar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te/ /sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtag byas kyang / /rang bzhin gyis stong dngos po de mi dmigs/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la/ /
86a1(dkon brtsegs): yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na/ /dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te/ /drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na/ /yan lag gzhigs brtags
86a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med cing stong / /nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong / /drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na/ /grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs/
86a3(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na/ /dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong / /ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / /
86a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang khyod gyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med/ /phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos
86a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /khyod kyi yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de
86a6(dkon brtsegs): brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra de 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa med/ /ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/ /skyes bu ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang
86a7(dkon brtsegs): med/ /ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min/ /ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong / /
86a8(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong
86b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur bar gzigs nas di 'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang rtan rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ shAkya thub pa'i
86b2(dkon brtsegs): zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas/ /lhar bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i bgro ba the tshom 'tshal/ /bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la lta zhing thos par dga' te
86b3(dkon brtsegs): sdod/ /rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' s+col the tshom dgum du gsol/ /rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'jig garten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na / bde gshegs
86b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tshom rgyu de gsungs/ /rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ 'khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems/ /bde gshegs thub ba'i gsung
86b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog the tshom gcod pa nyan 'tshal na/ /rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de deg rnams la gsungs/ /thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas
86b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'tshal/ /ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la lta/ /'den pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrags gsol/ /de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /
86b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas/ /skye po dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim/ /de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub/ /brtson
86b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid/ /de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol/ /rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni/ /dge
87a1(dkon brtsegs): ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar
87a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul nga yis phan byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa/ /rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos/ /de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa/
87a3(dkon brtsegs): phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med/ /bskal pa khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyad/ /kun du rnam par
87a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/ /de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed/ /'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul
87a5(dkon brtsegs): bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas/ /de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa che ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba/ /srid pa sel cing 'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/ /skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de
87a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te/ /'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar
87a7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zad mi nus/ /de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar 'thun par 'gyur/ /g.yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur/ /de dag zhing
87a8(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam sbyangs pa yi/ /sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'/ /de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te/ /mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs
87b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yid 'byung ba'o/ /de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad blo 'thun 'gyur zhing sla ba'i lam la myur bar 'gyur/ /de na mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /
87b2(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang / /zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi/ /sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur/ /sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol
87b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam brtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur/ /bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams na med/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan
87b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung / /de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang / /gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror
87b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas/ /drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di brtsams te/ /zhing
87b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten
87b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ /de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston/ /de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis/ /
87b8(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos
88a1(dkon brtsegs): nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
88a2(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs nas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur
88a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do/ /de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i
88a4(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i
88a5(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
88a6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid
88a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o/ /gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis te/
88a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i
88b1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa rab tu thob cing / de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/ kun du mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongs
88b2(dkon brtsegs): su ma grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yongs su thug pa ma mchis pa/ ma
88b3(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma smos gam bstan pa/ bsam

88b5(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa mi zad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ sho be ma lags pa ma
88b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/ ma bzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtad du ma
88b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ yongs su gtad du ma mchis pa ma btang ba/ yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/ chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lags so/ /a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar
88b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ma lags so/ /a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba 'ang ma lags so/ /a ni ma 'gags pa ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/ /a ni ma 'gags pa
89a1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags pa ste/ chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/ /a ni gnas pa yang ma lags mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni
89a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa ma lags/ ma spangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ mi shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/ /ma dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags/ mi stong pa yang ma
89a3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ a ni dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang
89a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo/ /chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste a'i tshul lo/ /chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste/ a'i 'gro ba'o/ /chos thams cad
89a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste as gdags pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha snyad do/ /chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste
89a6(dkon brtsegs): as brjod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /
89a7(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dus bgyis
89a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs
89b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi
89b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na brag ca la tha snyad ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags
89b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
89b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams
89b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi'i rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang
89b6(dkon brtsegs): tha snyad du bgyi ste/ brag ca la bya ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
89b7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du
89b8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ /thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud/ /bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis
90a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'gro ba stong / /sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can/ /byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor bar bgyid/ /de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la
90a2(dkon brtsegs): rten kyang 'tshal/ /de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal/ /'khor bar dga' ba zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po bdas/ /gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma
90a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ /blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la/ /nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med
90a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang / /blo stong de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba/ /de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer/ /de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar pa bgyid pa stong pa 'di
90a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis a yis yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan/ /de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye ba bzhin du yid bskyed cing / /
90a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol/ /bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des/ /myur du
90a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba 'thob 'gyur zhing / /grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas/ /pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa mdzad/ /
90a8(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog /'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag /grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos/ /de yi tshul
90b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur/ /'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med/ /de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi 'dag nyon mi mongs/ /nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med
90b2(dkon brtsegs): la nyon mongs rnams kyang med/ /gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur/ /grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu
90b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'khrul pa ste/ /kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog /'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni/ /las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med/ /
90b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal/ /des na da ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste/ /dge ba'i blo mnga' dag gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
90b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams gang byung ba/ /ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongs su mkhyen 'gyur pa'i/ /bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog /bsod nams
90b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su
90b7(dkon brtsegs): chud la 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun
90b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa/ /bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ /rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/ /'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad
91a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ /gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing / /rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur/ /des ni lha mir bcas pa'i
91a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas sgrol bar 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas/ /'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas
91a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing / /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang 'thun byung sras su 'gyur/ /'khor
91a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing bka' lung stsal du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zhabs 'bring gnas shing nyan par
91a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/ /ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /bde
91a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol/ /skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin du thob par 'gyur/ /thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel zhing grags pa don du gnyer/ /su zhig
