91a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing dgar gyur nas/ /tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur/ /
91a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu lags/ /bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros
91b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'gyur zhing / /spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa/ /de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis/ /'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste/ /'jig rten mgon med
91b2(dkon brtsegs): yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad spyad pa/ /byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur/ /tshul gyi dam pa shin du gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di
91b3(dkon brtsegs): thos na/ /sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur/ /de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur/ /bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab/ /
91b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te/ /bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas/ /sems can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te/ /de yi 'og tu
91b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur/ /de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya 'grangs par/ /yangs shing shin du dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ /kun gyi zhing du ngan song
91b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung / /bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang 'byung mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can
91b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rang 'byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrogs pa med par 'gyur/ /de na rang 'byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya 'grangs gang gA'i bye snyed 'gyur/ /rta thul
91b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas/ /gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na/ /bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so/ /de bas
92a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis/ /rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min/ /de ni u dum pa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mangs gsungs/ /de phyir bla na med
92a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhi ba byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis/ /shin du blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la bsten par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams thams cad yi rangs mchog tu
92a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar 'gyur/ /khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed/ /dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung / /zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon
92a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzad/ /bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni bskyug tu gsol/ /khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skyes dgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren
92a5(dkon brtsegs): las tshul thos mi bzad srid pa'i rgyud las grol/ /'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // bam po brgyad pa/ de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams
92a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod
92a7(dkon brtsegs): cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos
92a8(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde
92b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcad dam/ rkang lag bcad dam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ rna ba dang sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar
92b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba dang / spa lcag gis gzhus sam/ spa lcag phyed tshal lam / lcag gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam/ brtson cha dam po
92b3(dkon brtsegs): la rgyas btab bam/ byis pa'i gtsug pud ltar bcings sam/ dugs kyi snod ltar bdugs sam/ bu ram shing brdungs pa ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gzhom pa ltar bcom 'am/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bas byas sam
92b4(dkon brtsegs): mar gyi mar me dang zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar bstabs sam/ /skam ril bya ba ltar gril tam/ byi bo'i
92b5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kA ra ShA pa Na tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba
92b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ gsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang ma lags/ mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes
92b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i
92b8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba thob par gyur cig / gang gis bdag la skom blud pa dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / /bkur sti byas pa dang / bsti stang byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig
93a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par
93a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing de de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i
93a3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i 'du shes la bsten cing snyen la sgom zhing mang du byed de/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i
93a4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe de ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la
93a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o/ /de 'tshal na tshe rjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
93a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug po kun du skyes pa dang / byang chub sems
93a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslabs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du
93a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /de nas dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe tshigs su
93b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste/ /ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchis/ /de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i
93b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba rgal 'gyur pa/ /thub pa mi yi 'dren pa'i tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod/ /'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na 'ang ma mchis te/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa
93b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par mkhyen/ /yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas par rtogs pa ltar/ /de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs/ /'di na sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma
93b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ /mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam gzhag la/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs
93b5(dkon brtsegs): par dka'/ /byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la/ /sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen/ /de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom
93b6(dkon brtsegs): bral thugs ldan/ /des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun du mi dmigs kyang / /lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams
93b7(dkon brtsegs): la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs/ /de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun du 'tshal/ /des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi
93b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi gzigs la/ /dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal/ /de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal/ /des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas
94a1(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/ /skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun du sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs/ /'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed/ /sems can sdug bsngal
94a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan/ /gang zhig der dul ma gzigs
94a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs/ /thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa'i ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyis/ /thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal
94a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na brnyes gyur kyang / /de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsungs ma lags bsnyel ba yang mi mnga'/ /bde bar gshegs pa lus la song ba'i bsgom bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs
94a5(dkon brtsegs): pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis/ /'den pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la/ /tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te/ /de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang
94a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs ma gzigs/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/ /thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma brnyes la/ /gang gi nye bar gzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab
94a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen kyang / /thar pa 'dod rnams sems 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod pa bgyis/ /'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang
94a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod de ma gzigs/ /bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la/ /thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu
94b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas skyob la mchod par bgyis/ /gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi lta ga la mchis/ /gang gis gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /de bas gang gi bde ba'am
94b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis/ /ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyid na/ /'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam
94b3(dkon brtsegs): ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcing ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis brtags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan
94b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs/ /'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dpa' bo dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /yang dag du na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang dang sgom pa mi dmigs te/ /chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang
94b5(dkon brtsegs): ston cing byed pa po yang yod mi dmigs/ /thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur/ /'di ni mchod pa bzang
94b6(dkon brtsegs): po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga
94b7(dkon brtsegs): yang gsungs/ /rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgom shes bstan/ /thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te/ /'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la
94b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po/ /de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs/ /de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma
95a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te/ /thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro drang
95a2(dkon brtsegs): lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs/ /'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba mchis pa bcings pa ma mchis te/ /sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom khyod la mchod/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod
95a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan/ /brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin pa sgoms shes gsungs/ /mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis
95a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod/ /'dod chags gnyen pos zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs/ /gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems
95a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bstan/ /'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson/ /sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms
95a6(dkon brtsegs): shes gsungs/ /bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi/ /thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste/ /'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod
95a7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod/ /stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de/ /gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang / /gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa
95a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ /mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan/ /sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra/ /gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ /bde
95b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slar khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di sten pa/ /mkhas pa kun du dge
95b2(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /de ltar dge rgyas
95b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa yang
95b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ /skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas/ /bde gshegs
95b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum mdzad pa 'di 'jig rten bstan/ /rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol/ /
95b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khor/ /dpal stug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te/ /
95b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed/ /de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis/ /su zhig
95b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba/ /de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes/ /bdud kyi mi
96a1(dkon brtsegs): phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas/ /sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /bde
96a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs deng su 'gro la dad bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing / /byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas/ /gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang
96a3(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum/ /'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na/ /bde gshegs gsung gis thog
96a4(dkon brtsegs): mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren/ /de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur/ /
96a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /nga yis 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing / /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris
96a6(dkon brtsegs): te 'gro ba'i don byas pa/ /khyod kyis bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon/ /dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni the tshom med/ /
96a7(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang yi rangs rab zhi yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong bgrangs mchod 'os mchod byas te/ /the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun du som nyi med par
96a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ /de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod/ /bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur/ /'di dag bskal pa ud pa la la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur/ /
96b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed/ /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur pa/ /de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon/ /
96b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de kun chos kyi rtog ces bya ba 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur/ /'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan bzla bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin du rgyas 'gyur te/ /de tshe zhing rnams
96b3(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur/ /thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na/ /thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur/ /sems can khrag khrig
96b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te/ /ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med 'thob/ /thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun 'chad mi 'gyur te/ /slob pa khrag khrig
96b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du/ /ji ltar bye ba brgya bgrangs nga la legs par spyad pa spyad nas su/ /byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos
96b6(dkon brtsegs): slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong / /bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing / /dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe
96b7(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /bdag nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs/ /dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe
96b8(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus lha ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang
97a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing / tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /
97a2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / /phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs
97a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/ chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
97a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 'thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis
97a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ /khams
97a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis
97a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la
97a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas pa la 'jug pa dang /
97b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thog pa ma mchis
97b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu 'thob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang
97b3(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang / me dang / rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang
97b4(dkon brtsegs): la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /chu dang / me dang / rlung ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ltar
97b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ /ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ /da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos
97b6(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ne gdags su ma mchis so/ /de bzhin
97b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes bka' s+cal te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin
97b8(dkon brtsegs): ni dmigs su ma mchis na 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ ma 'ongs par yang ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
98a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas gzungs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug
98a2(dkon brtsegs): pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / rjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'di la
98a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug pa yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/ chos gang ma
98a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa de la spungs pa yang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o/ /dper na khyim dang / khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba gam dang /
98a5(dkon brtsegs): dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ra ba dang / shing thags dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po bsags pa la/ grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba yang de bzhin te/
98a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas na gzugs kyang ma mchis/ /gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
98a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po
98a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis so/ /de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba
98b1(dkon brtsegs): ni ci'i skye mched ces bgyi na/ sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do/ /de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dad pa ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / de la sa'i
98b2(dkon brtsegs): khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma
98b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
98b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis
98b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o/ /de ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o/ /
98b6(dkon brtsegs): gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o/ /
98b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la mig ce 'am/ skye mched ce 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so/ /rna ba dang /
98b8(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob
99a1(dkon brtsegs): bo/ /de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni mig ni mig gis ma mchis pa/ khams ni khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams
99a2(dkon brtsegs): ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye
99a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis so/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par
99a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /ming de yang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis
99a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma
99a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /
99a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/
99a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par
99b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ rtan ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs
99b2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi sa ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems
99b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags/ sa ma lags pa yang ma lags so/ /de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang
99b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ste/ tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o/ /des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste don dam par ni ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
99b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar
99b6(dkon brtsegs): du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po
99b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings te ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan
99b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad
100a1(dkon brtsegs): du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang
100a2(dkon brtsegs): gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi
100a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang
100a4(dkon brtsegs): po nyi shu gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang /
100a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po
100a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis/
100a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs
100a8(dkon brtsegs): su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba/ gang mi skye ba ni mi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes
100b1(dkon brtsegs): gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so/ /gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/
100b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na chad pa stong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bgyi/ /don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs/ chad pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
100b3(dkon brtsegs): du mig dang dbang po yang chad stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gsob/ gsob/ log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du
100b4(dkon brtsegs): gdags pa rabs kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs dbang po yang mi dmigs na de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can
100b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzung pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyi/ don dam par ni ma lags so/ /dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni
100b6(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa/ ma mchis pa/ gsob/ gsog /log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni mi skye mi 'gag go/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gags
100b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma
100b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ brdzun pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ gdags du ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba
101a1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/
101a2(dkon brtsegs): thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /'di lta ste/
101a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na mi zhig rmi lam na rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur/ 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
101a4(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na yang mi des rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang / rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma
101a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar na rmi lam na rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du
101a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /
101a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la
101a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/
101b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid
101b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ /som nyi ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
101b3(dkon brtsegs): gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma
101b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /
101b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog
101b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa rnam
101b7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs pa ste/ gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o/ /gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /
101b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ ma btags pa gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
102a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/
102a2(dkon brtsegs): ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khong du ma chud pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob
102a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ bsgrubs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du ma bgyis pa/ mngon du bgyi
102a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 'khrugs
102a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa/ dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
102a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/
102a7(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags
102a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags
102b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis
102b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags pa/
102b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i
102b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul
102b7(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags/ bgyis pa ma lags/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dam pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas
102b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi
103a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa
103a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni
103a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum mi dmigs pa de ni ming ma mchis so/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/
103a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / kun rdzob pa tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don
103a6(dkon brtsegs): du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so/ /chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyir ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma
103a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa/ log pa/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtags
103a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi ba dang / rab tu spros pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba yang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur
103b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma rig pa ma mchis pa'o/ /de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na par mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/
103b2(dkon brtsegs): shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na par mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho
103b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur/ 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste ming tsam du bas kyi/ don dam par ni ma lags so/ /ma rig pa gang
103b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de nyid byang chub bo/ /de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag /thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de
103b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste chos thams cad
103b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma 'gags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang
103b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de'i slad du
103b8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag gis chos thams cad ma mchis pa ste/ de'i slad du
104a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon
104a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang
104a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su ma mchis pa/ lags pas gnyis su ma mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
104a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so/ /
104a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gi 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du
104a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas
104a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am/ gnod
104a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /
104b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci 'ang 'dor ba 'am/ len pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
104b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan
104b3(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
104b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la ni mi 'gyur ba ma mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba mi gda'o// // bam po dgu pa/
104b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges par 'gro ba brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
104b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen
104b7(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa/ 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par
104b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan/ /khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g.yo brnyes/ /srog chags bye ba khrag
105a1(dkon brtsegs): khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin du phung po rnams dang bral/ /
105a2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/ /shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre'u thogs pa bzhin/ /grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa
105a3(dkon brtsegs): med par 'dong / /khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun du stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /dper na brag ca rnam pa kun du shin du sgra dang bral ba 'dra/ /des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang
105a4(dkon brtsegs): po bcings/ /grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis/ /skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan/ /yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing
105a5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa slu ba chad pa stong pa 'dra/ /mi mkhas skye bo lam la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/ /dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / /'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin
105a6(dkon brtsegs): tu stong pa ste/ /thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin du stong / /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/ /bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin/ /
105a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na/ /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags/ /
105a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo de'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/ /rten cing chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis/ /rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs
105b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa/ /mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings/ /mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar ba'i bya bzhin grol/ /thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos
105b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral/ /thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/ /de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal
105b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med/ /thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa byis pa'i spyod
105b4(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par bgyi/ /mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes shes smra ba dang / /
105b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang / /gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan bzlas smra ba/ /de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs por
105b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dkris/ /gang dag bde bar gshegs pas che yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang / /gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba/ /de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud
105b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi lag tu mchis/ /chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal stug
105b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags/ /de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs
106a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas/ /kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/ /'dren
106a2(dkon brtsegs): sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par thugs
106a3(dkon brtsegs): su chud nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /dpal stug 'dren pa rnams
106a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te/ /rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos/ /'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal ba lha mi
106a5(dkon brtsegs): lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs/ /de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzad bsil mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /mi mchog
106a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs/ /de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa/
106a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag su zhig gang gis ci 'thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul pa gsungs/ /mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrog te the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu
106a8(dkon brtsegs): mgu ba 'thob/ /bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par/ /'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pas sems shing mchis/ /thub pa 'dren mchog
106b1(dkon brtsegs): the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga'
106b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ /bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur/ /de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni yi rangs
106b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur/ /'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/ /
106b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/ /
106b6(dkon brtsegs): gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu/ /de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing / /rgyu las gzigs
106b7(dkon brtsegs): nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ /kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang / /kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang / /
106b8(dkon brtsegs): kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur bya ste/ /skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba dgrol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /'dzum pa cung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya/ /
107a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya/ /'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya/ /rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur
107a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs te/ /kha cig thar pa'i don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas/ /des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs
107a3(dkon brtsegs): 'og nub par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur/ /'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur/ /de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam
107a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum shes par gyis/ /rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub/ /sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/ /'dren pa rnams kyis 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam
107a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum yang bshad kyis/ /kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis/ /dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub/ /'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub
107a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin du ring du gnas/ /rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad/ /gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod
107a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni/ /de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin du mkhas par 'gyur/ /'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis skor ba byed par 'gyur/ /
107a8(dkon brtsegs): dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/ /gang dag gser rgyan ltar dkar steng bzhag 'dre ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na/ /de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par
107b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/ /gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang / /gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi
107b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la lding ba dang / /gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam
107b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum de tsam bstan/ /rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi
107b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan la the tshom med par gyis/ /'bras bu che ris lha tshogs bye ba brgyad bcu tham pa 'di dag ni/ /zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin du rgya cher smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa
107b5(dkon brtsegs): mang por gnas par 'gyur/ /de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan/ /de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum bcu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong / /bskal pa sum bcu drug tu thams cad
107b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod/ /da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum bcu rtsa drug tu/ /gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas/ /thams cad du yang phun sum
107b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ /de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog /'dren pa mthu
107b8(dkon brtsegs): chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung / /rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te/ /sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya/ /
108a1(dkon brtsegs): de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de/ /de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur pa de dag ni/ /gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang / /
108a2(dkon brtsegs): legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur/ /'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba/ /de las nyis gyur de tshe byang chub du ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /
108a3(dkon brtsegs): de tshe rgyal ba zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ /de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi 'di nyid 'gyur/ /'jig
108a4(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/ /de tshe sras kyis gzungs zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcur gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /gang
108a5(dkon brtsegs): gA'i klung gi bye ma pas kyang shin du mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni/ /nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'jig rten
108a6(dkon brtsegs): don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing / /yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /mi mchog de yi gsung rab
108a7(dkon brtsegs): de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te/ /thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ /bde bar gshegs
108a8(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ /de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de/ /rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la/ /
108b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'di la kun du bsten byos te/ /dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis/ /'bras bu che ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //
108b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgu
108b3(dkon brtsegs): la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do/ /de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas
108b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang / /btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang / /rgyal srid btang bar ci smos te/ /sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol
108b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa/ /rnam pa kun du bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /shin du bslabs pas mthar phyin pa/ /khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ /
108b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas/ /yan lag gtubs pa 'ang bzod par mdzad/ /zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te/ /bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol
108b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/ /stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol
108b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa/ /de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ /
109a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos shes rab pha rol phyin/ /yang dang yang ni bsgoms pas na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa/ /shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /
109a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang / /don spyad 'thun pa'i don dag gis/ /'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /byams chen thugs rje
109a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag / yun ring dus nas bsgoms mdzad de/ /sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/ /gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ /nyon mongs med pa'i mthar
109a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin cing / /thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas/ /ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ /kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med kyis gsol pa/ /sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba/ /
109a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba/ /sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa/ /sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ /shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can/ /blo gros
109a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo/ /mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi sems ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sangs rgyas
109a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang rnam dag mdzad/ /sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa/ /kun dga' khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ /dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom/ /
109a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur/ /lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar mkhyen/ /sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/ /zab cing blta dka'i chos dag
109b1(dkon brtsegs): la/ /myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol pa/ /bral gyur yongs su bral gyur ba/ /chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs/ /pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs/ /brtson 'grus brtan la
109b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ /'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs/ /gti mug spangs pa zag med pa/ /sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa/ /'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal/ /
109b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyi dam chos shin du brtan/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod/ /gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba rnyes/ /de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ /
109b4(dkon brtsegs): lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri/ /rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te/ /de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ /dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam/ /
109b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rab sum bcu rtsa gnyis can/ /shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa/ /rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'/ /de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs/ /
109b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /khyod mtshungs gang zag yod ma mchis/ /lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ /gnyis su med pas yang dag ston/ /dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon/ /gang dag zab la zhum ma
109b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ /de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin/ /lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ /mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag /khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams/ /sbrul rnams lpags pa rnying 'dor bzhin/ /srid pa gsum
109b8(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag 'dor/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ /ji ltar mar me mar zad cing / /snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin/ /khyod kyis bstan pa myur thos nas/ /shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas
110a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas gsol ba/ /gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i/ /mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang / /shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dang / /'dod
110a2(dkon brtsegs): chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu gnas mang gis gsol pa/ /zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod/ /cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur
110a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jig med kyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi zhi gnas bslabs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /
110a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing / /sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams kun kyi zhi ba ni/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ /
110a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa/ /khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs/ /mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams/ /
110a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing / /byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /thub chen khyod las gang slob pa/ /de dag
110a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten snang mdzad cing / /sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis gsungs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho de thos nas/ /de dag dri
110a8(dkon brtsegs): med bde ba 'thob/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung / /lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog /
110b1(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs/ /de 'dra'i ye shes ston bgyid pa/ /de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ /gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis/ /chos rnams
110b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sems ma mchis/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba/ /de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par/ /rnam par 'dren pa
110b3(dkon brtsegs): khyor kyis gzigs/ /de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis/ /sems can ma mchis phan tshun
110b4(dkon brtsegs): min/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams/ /bar snang lta bur snang ba ste/ /skye dang 'gog pa med par
110b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ngar 'dzin pa med pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med/ /spyod med rtsol ba med par
110b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa/ /sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na/ /de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'/ /thub pa de ltar mnyam ma
110b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ /lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa/ /gzugs brnyen ji ltar me long la/ /gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa/ /de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /de bas 'jig rten rmongs
110b8(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyen lta bu ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /
111a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ /chos nyid la ni khor zug tu/ /spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing / /chos nyid de ni brnyes pas na/ /de spang khyod ni spobs pa ldan/ /
111a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi chos 'di thams cad ni/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par/ /yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /de bas thub pas rab rib bsal/ /lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis
111a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /mya ngan med cing nyer len med/ /spros pa med med cing rnyog pa med/ /chos rnams kun du nyon ma mongs/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ /chos rnams
111a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma lags de/ /'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ /de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen/ /de bzhin rab tu bstan par mdzad/ /lha'i bu blo gros mchog gi gsol pa/ /lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa/ /rmongs pa med cing shes pa med/ /
111a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ /snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis/ /gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min/ /gzung ba ma mchis
111a6(dkon brtsegs): grol ma mchis/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum pas gsol pa/ yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa/ /yod dang med pa ma lags par/ /rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du/ /de dag rang
111a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa/ /byis pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/ /bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis
111a8(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ /gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ /ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa/ /bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /
111b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ /gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi/ /mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te/ /chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu smon pa med
111b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing / /smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang / /su la smon lam mchis gyur pa/ /de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/
111b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing / /gang zhig grol 'gyur de ma mchis/ /de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ /khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te/ /bde gshegs khyod la smad mi mnga'/ /su smod de dag mkhas ma lags/ /lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ /ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyis tshogs/ /char gyis
111b5(dkon brtsegs): sa chen ngoms par bgyid/ /de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis/ /'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad/ /lha'i bu bsam pa don yod gyis gsol ba/ /thub khyod gsung ni don mchis te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
111b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bskor/ /shin du brtags te mdzad pas na/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan/ /lha'i bu glo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis/ /ma skyes 'gags pa ma
111b7(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ /de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol pa/ /khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te/ /seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas/ /
111b8(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa/ seng ges ri dwags phra mo bzhin/ /lha'i bu bag yod las gyis gsol pa/ /bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de/ /khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas/ /sangs rgyas
112a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'dren pa khyod/ /bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ /bag yod pa la rab gnas te/ /khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel/ /stobs bcu gzhan yang
112a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel/ /lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ /bag yod pa la brtson pas na/ /byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes/ /thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas/ /de dag
112a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel/ /lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag /ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams/ /kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste/ /bag yod pas ni nges par
112a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/ /bag yod yongs su ma btang bas/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /'gro ba 'di la ma chags par/ /thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung / /lha'i bu bag yod
112a5(dkon brtsegs): bsrungs kyis gsol pa/ /byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing / /khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na/ /thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis/ /byang chub dam pa brnyes par gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol
112a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing / /mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras/ /yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ /bag yod
112a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ /dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas/ /nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil/ /lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad
112a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ /khyod ni bag gis bzung bas na/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /
112b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste/ /'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'/ /
112b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ /rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs/ /sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin/ /khyod la gnod
112b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyir mi nus te/ /sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul/ /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te/ /'dod chags
112b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la/ /dpa' bo chen po bsgom mdzad pas/ /ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ /sus kyang khyod kyi
112b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul ma 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa/ /ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi/ /sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs/ /bdag gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /chos gzhan de
112b6(dkon brtsegs): yi rjes su 'brang / /lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma'i zhi gnas ni/ /sems kyi rnyog pa 'dang bar bgyid/ /zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyis 'ching / /de khyod mtha' yas
112b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang du mdzad/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs/ /de la chags med spyod pa ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /
112b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/ /bsam gtan gyis ni sngon brlan te/ /shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas/ /de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes/ /de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren/ /
113a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang / /lam gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste/ /zhi gnas ye shes che thob na/ /rang byung nyid tu nges par 'byung / /
113a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol ba/ /dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ /de la khyod kyis sras spyod cing / /rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag
113a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong byung gis gsol pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing / /rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sman pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste/ /de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong rab
113a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te/ /yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na/ /brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob/ /byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dod/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung
113a5(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ /gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu nges par byung / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis/ /brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon
