113a6(dkon brtsegs): dgas gsol pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu/ /chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na/ /byang chub gzhal yas brnyes 'gyur te/ /de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong
113a7(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ /mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing / /dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa/ /de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis/ /pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus/ /lha'i bu lhag
113a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong byung gis gsol pa/ /chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du/ /rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing / rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la bsten pas gsol pa/ /
113b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du/ /ye shes la ni bsten mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni/ /srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams
113b2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen/ /'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi/ /'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/ /lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing / /
113b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te/ /sa bzang n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'dra/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis sras/ /ye shes kyis ni yongs
113b4(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste/ /byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing / /skye bo mang po 'grel par bgyid/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /
113b5(dkon brtsegs): zhum pa ma mchis dang mi mnga'/ /thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ /dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni/ /lhag mthong nyid tu yang dag 'du/ /rang bzhin med
113b6(dkon brtsegs): par rnam mthong na/ /de ni rang byung byang chub lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di
113b7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs shing / /thugs rje chen po shin du skyed/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/ /byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i/ /'jig rten mkhas pa nges par byung / /de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thob/ /
113b8(dkon brtsegs): grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la bsten gyis gsol ba/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos sten pa'i/ /mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/ /sems can bcings las 'grol bgyid cing / /
114a1(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa thams cad rnam par gcod/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/ /stong pa nyid la mos gyur pa/ /'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/ /dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa/ /de ltar
114a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams la ston/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' bos de
114a3(dkon brtsegs): la spyad par mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol ba/ /skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la/ /'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing / /nam mkha'i rlung
114a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ /stong nyid chos la bsten bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa/ /de dag ston pa mchod pa ste/ /mchod pa de ni bla na med/ /lha'i bu stong pa
114a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyi gsol ba/ gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur pa/ /de ni yang dag 'phags shes gsungs/ /stong nyid chos la sten bgyid pa/ /ma dmad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong
114a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po chos rnams gang / /mya ngan 'das min ston ma mchis/ /kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren/ /drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis
114a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni/ /khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar/ /stong pa nyid la gang sten pa/ /de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la sten gyis gsol pa/ /gang rnams stong pa nyid sten
114a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams/ /byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ /gang rnams stong nyid bsten bgyid pa/ /
114b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs/ /rang byung pham pa med par 'gyur/ /'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol ba/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te/ stong pa nyid la gang
114b2(dkon brtsegs): sten pa/ /de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag /stong gis dkrug par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te/ /dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas/ /sangs rgyas 'jig
114b3(dkon brtsegs): rten rnams nas byung / /mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med la gnas pas gsol pa/ /mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing / /zhi ba zhi la spyod pa rnams/ /mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis/ /
114b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la/ /'dren pa khyod ni sbyong mdzad de/ /mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing / /zhi spyod khyod la phyag
114b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/ /thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni/ /mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te/ /yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid/ /
114b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ /mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pas/ /lha dang dri za mi dag kyang / /khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol
114b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam pa shig cing / /dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/ /mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad/ /de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse
114b8(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ /thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod/ /mtshan ma med la rnam par rol/ /mi rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs
115a1(dkon brtsegs): su grub kyis gsol pa/ /gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub grub pa ste/ /yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma mang
115a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga' bas gsol pa/ /gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'/ /bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med
115a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la rten pas gsol pa/ /zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med/ /'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten/ /dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ /
115a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing / /zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas rgal ba 'gro sgrol ba/ /de dag tshad ni ga la mchis/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ /mgon po gang dag smon lam ni/ /rnam
115a5(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu mi dmigs pa/ /de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung / /lha'i bu smon pa med pa la ston pas gsol pa/ /zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod/ /srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad/ /
115a6(dkon brtsegs): sred pa yongs su chad pas na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten yong mi gos/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ /gang gis srid pa yongs bcom pa/ /de dag gzi mchog skyes pa ste/ /de dag 'jig rten
115a7(dkon brtsegs): mgon po'i sras/ /rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas bskyed kyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /sred pa yongs su bcad pas na/ /srid pa 'jig bgyid srid pa la/ /
115a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag smon pa mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ /gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa/ /gzi ldan khyod kyis sras kyi rnams/ /re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba/ /de dag yongs su
115b1(dkon brtsegs): grol bar 'gyur/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ /gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa/ /de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal/ /de dag mi skom zang zing med/ /dpa' chen khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /lha'i bu
115b2(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med la nges pas gsol pa/ /gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang / /bde ba dngos po med bsgoms pa/ /mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab/ /de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor
115b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba/ /de dag khyod kyi bstan la dus/ /kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel ba/ /sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ /
115b4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i dgon las byung ba rnams/ /bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ /g.yul
115b5(dkon brtsegs): las rgyal bar gyur pa ste/ /khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing / /srid pa kun du smon mi mdzad/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ /thar pa'i chos
115b6(dkon brtsegs): la stobs ldan pas/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing / /khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la/ /bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ /lus med 'chi ba med
115b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul du/ /lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul dga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs/ /lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/ /mi gtsang rul ba rnag zag
115b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /lus 'di mi bzang nges bsams te/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas/ /rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ /lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te/ /
116a1(dkon brtsegs): lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing / /lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams grol nas/ /nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ /sbrul gyi lpag pa rnying bzhin du/ /rnag can lus 'di
116a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku bo che/ /sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus la smod pas gsol pa/ /mi gtsang dri nga rnag zag cing / /rus pa'i lus la rtag smad de/ /mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs
116a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/ /gang dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing / /rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams/ /chos kyi rab tu bskyed pa'i sras/ /de dag
116a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsol pa/ /'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar/ /gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de dag lus las 'das pa ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang
116a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/ /lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste/ /ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag /srid gsum thams cad yongs
116a6(dkon brtsegs): su gzigs/ /lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa/ /lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral/ /chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas/ /kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste/ /rnam 'grel sangs rgyas
116a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen/ /khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing / /mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang
116a8(dkon brtsegs): rgya/ /lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ /srid pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong / /mya ngan 'das pa 'jigs med mthong / /khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ /lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol
116b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /gang gis srid pa rnam spangs shing / /'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/ /mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/ /mi yi dam pa khyod kyi
116b2(dkon brtsegs): sras/ /srid par khrid pa rab bsal te/ /khyod kyi bslab la bslabs pa dag /stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes/ /lha'i bu srid pa las rgal bas gsol pa/ /srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams
116b3(dkon brtsegs): la/ /grangs kyis rgyun tu bgrang ba yi/ /grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med/ /lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste/ /gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /srog chags
116b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol pa/ /srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol/ /rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal/ /srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas te/ /srid pa sil la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed
116b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ /srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing / /srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs/ /brten pa srid pa mthar 'byin na/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa/ /srid pa' mthar phyin rab zhi ba/ /mgon po
116b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'/ /srid pa phyir 'byin thams cad mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol ba/ /srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs nas/ /srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa/ /gang gis srid pa
116b7(dkon brtsegs): len 'gyur ba'i/ /khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ba mthong / /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te/ /srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no/ /zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'/ /mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu
116b8(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa/ /srid pa'i pha rol rgal ba ste/ /srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal/ /rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas/ /skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// // bam po bcu pa/ lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/
117a1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis/ /sems ma mchis shing rtsol ma mchis/ /bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis/ /tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol ba/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par/ /tshor
117a2(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /rmi lam sdug gi dga' 'dra ba/ /de la so so'i skye bo chags/ /lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/ /shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na/ /tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing / /'ong ba med la
117a3(dkon brtsegs): dngos med par/ /de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa/ /tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po/ /rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs/ /zab mo blta dka'i tshig de yang / /khyod kyis sems can rnams
117a4(dkon brtsegs): la bstan/ /lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol ba/ /tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam/ /don dam nyid du mi dmigs te/ /khyod kyis sems can der btul bas/ /'gro ba the tshom ma mchis gyur/ /lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas
117a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po/ /mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa/ /de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ /tshor ba'i phung po
117a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon mkhyen pa/ /rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis/ /tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las rgal bas gsol pa/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod/ /rgal
117a7(dkon brtsegs): dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal/ /'dam las rgal cing sdig med pa/ /byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas gyur/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du/ /tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas/ /
117a8(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/ /mi rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'i/ /tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /nyon mongs zhags pa 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de yi
117b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pham/ /bdud rnams kyang ni dpa' bkong ste/ /sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par/ /thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /
117b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis/ /sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin/ /sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod/ /lha'i bu sems la yang dag par
117b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas gsol pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan nam slob ma bzhin/ /gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i/ /sems de khyod kyis yang dag brtags/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/ /sems
117b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/ /rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na/ /ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du/ /byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ /dul gyur las su rung ba yi/ /
117b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rang bzhin rtog med pa/ /gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ /gang gis sems la sems med shes/ /mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur
117b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa/ /de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi/ /lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ /gang dag sems la sems med shes/ /de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te/ /dpa'
117b7(dkon brtsegs): chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/ /gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/ /sems can de dag zhi bar zhi/ /bdud kyi zhags las rab
117b8(dkon brtsegs): grol bas/ /de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi/ /lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa/ /mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing / /bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang / /khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pas/ /de dag 'dod par
118a1(dkon brtsegs): zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ /sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing / /yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos nas/ /zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu chos
118a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ /gang gi yid ni chos nyid la/ /rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa/ /de dag mi dbang sras po ste/ /zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags/ /lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ /chos rnams thams cad chos
118a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings su/ /'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams/ /chos nyid la ni gang sems pa/ /de dag spyod yul ma yin med/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la nges
118a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag /mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs/ /dpa' bo
118a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang spyod pa'i/ /ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa/ /de dag ye shes bsam yas te/ /sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med/ /sems can
118a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam la de dag mkhas/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/ /gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig /chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams/ /de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur/ /
118a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ /gang dag de dag gnas pa yi/ /'jigs pa med pa thob med pas/ /de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs/ /de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung / /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings
118a8(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste/ /chos rnams kun la shin du mkhas/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas
118b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas/ /khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/ /mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te/ /bzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol
118b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de/ /bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa/ /gang dang gang
118b3(dkon brtsegs): gi sgo dag nas/ /skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa/ /de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston/ /de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa/ /mngon par brtson pas chos kyi
118b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di/ /chos kyis rab tu tshim
118b5(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas/ /'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs/ /lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/ /gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /chos dbyings
118b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mkhyen pa yi/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/ /mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te/ /rnam par 'dren pa
118b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu po/ /gang la spyod pa de lags so/ /lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam/ /de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang / /
118b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags/ /lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ /khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen/ /mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang / /
119a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes/ /gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams/ /rang byung nyid
119a2(dkon brtsegs): du nges par byung / /lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i/ /skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs/ /rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas/ /de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu gnas med
119a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal pa/ /de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos/ /bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang / /de dag rmongs par yod mi nus/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas
119a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa/ /de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs/ /bye bas byang chub mi skyod ces/ /mkhas pa de dag shin du dga'/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /
119a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni/ /chos nyid la ni rab gnas te/ /sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni/ /ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /mtshan nyid gcig
119a6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa po/ /chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i/ /bdud kyi las ni gnas med de/ /gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas
119a7(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin gnas min pa/ /byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan/ /rang gis de ni thugs chud nas/ /sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ sngon chad rgyu ni
119a8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dang / /las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i/ /rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud/ /las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /las kyi rgyu
119b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gang gis rgyu yis bgyis de yang / /gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na/ /mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur
119b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ /de yi rgyu dang len pa dang / /gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las/ /gnas dang las kyi
119b3(dkon brtsegs): len pa rnams/ /kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i/ /las dang rgyu dang ma mchis te/ /gnas dang skye ba 'ang ma mchis so/ /de bas
119b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang zag mchog / lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ /las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas/ /dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang / /ji ltar de yi len pa yang / /khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod/ /
119b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas/ /rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol
119b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen dang rgyu rnams dang / /rnam smin so so yang dag rig /thams cad stong par rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa/ /rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas
119b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te/ /rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ /rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /'pho med
119b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug med pa ste/ /rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang las rnams dang / /rnam par smin pa sten pa rnams/ /de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes/ /
120a1(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/ /'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis/ /khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen/ /
120a2(dkon brtsegs): de bas khyod ni do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa/ /khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing / /gang gi mngon par las bgyis dang / /de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba/ /de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen/ /
120a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol ba/ /khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi/ /sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu stobs la
120a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pas gsol pa/ /khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas/ /'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur pa/ /de dag bla na med pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ /
120a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi byin gyi brlabs mkhyen cing / /'dren pa de ni khams dang ni/ /'du 'dzi bshes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/ /khams de dang
120a6(dkon brtsegs): ni len pa dang / /bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa/ /de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa nges/ /de phyir the tshom yod mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu khams la brten pas gsol pa/ /sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i/ /'khor
120a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dang khams de dang / /spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /ye shes gang gis khams de ni/ /'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa
120a8(dkon brtsegs): yi/ /mkhyen de mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes/ /blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan/ /lha'i bu khams nas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ /khams gang la ni bstan bgyis na/ /'dus byas dag la ji
120b1(dkon brtsegs): srid gnas/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa/ /khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas/ /yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang / rnam par smin
120b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bras bu dag / de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams la yang dag gzhugs pas gsol pa/ /khams gang la ni bsten bgyid cing / /'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa/ /de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen/ /
120b3(dkon brtsegs): de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod/ /lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ /khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas/ /'gro ba ci 'dra mchi ba yi/ /sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang / /ye shes mkhas pa
120b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ /sems can log pa nyid nges shing / /mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa/ /phung po gsum po de dag la/ /khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug /lha'i bu
120b5(dkon brtsegs): lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa sems can yang dag nyid nges te/ /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med pa/ /de la 'jig rten sgrol ma khyod/ /rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug /lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol
120b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /ma nges phung por gyur pa la/ /gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams/ /de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang / /mya ngan 'das pa 'ang khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te/ /
120b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang / /mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/ /kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams med/ /ye shes
120b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa gzhan yang med/ /don dam nyid du bstan to zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas/ /des na de la
121a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs med de/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras/ /ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phrul/ /lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang / /kun rdzob
121a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni don dam dang / /brda yang dmigs su ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ /brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis/ /khyod
121a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs/ /lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa/ /nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ /gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis/ /log par nges rnams kun du 'gror/ /drang srong chen po khyod
121a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis te/ gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba/ de dag thub chen khyod kyis
121a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /
121a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu rkyen 'dis
121a7(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /gti mug khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis
121a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag /ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te/ /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /
121b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na/ /'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung / /de la mos pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ /'khor
121b2(dkon brtsegs): ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang / /mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag /khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa/ /'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /gang
121b3(dkon brtsegs): gis rgyus byung nan tan dang / /mos pa de las gyur pa yang / /smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa/ /sems can gang gis khams gang la/ /bsten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi/ /rgyu de
121b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ /sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang / /gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang / /dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang / /dbang po khyod kyis rab
121b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang / /sred pa mngon par 'jug pa dang / /srid pa zhi ba bgyi ba'i don/ /de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang
121b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni/ /gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal/ /srid pa rnam par gzhig pa yang / /rkang gnyis dam pas bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par
121b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas gsol pa/ /dbang po rtul po dur khrod bsten/ /rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas/ /sred dang bcas pa khyod la lta/ /lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ /'dod
121b8(dkon brtsegs): chags can dang 'dod chags dang / /zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang / /srid pa zhi dang dbang po rnams/ /rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa/ /zhe sdang gnyen por
122a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yi/ /gnod sems med dang dben pa dag /dbang po rtul po sten pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/ /zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsung / /
122a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can shes pa rjes su skye/ /zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa/ /gnod sems med dang byams pa dang / /zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma gzigs/ /
122a3(dkon brtsegs): dag dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te/ /des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ /lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ /log par rnam par rtog pa dang / /log par nye bar ston pa yang / /nyon mongs dam
122a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir kun sbyor te/ /bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste/ /bzlog pas snang ba chen por
122a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs/ /
122a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ /sems can gang gi shes pa gang / /ji tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang / /snod tu gang rung ji snyed pa/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po dang zhes 'gras
122a7(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ /nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis/ /shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa/ /de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de bas khyod la mngon par dga'/ /lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa/ /yul dang
122a8(dkon brtsegs): dus dang gnas dag dang / /spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang / /nyon mongs snyon rmongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs/ /lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ /dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang / /
122b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag dag gis bsam pa dang / /bcings dang thar dang zad dang shes/ /g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring rtul po dang / /nyon mongs ye shes
122b2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / /gdul dang gdul bar bgyid pa dag /khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang / /rnam thar kun
122b3(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs dang / /snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldang ba dang / /rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /
122b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa/ /chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin gang / /chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa/ /yang dag
122b5(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin thugs su chud/ /des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ /log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs/ /rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur/ /las las
122b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes par de dag mkhyen/ /des na khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ /nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi/ /gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang / /bstan pa 'ang khyod kyis rab tu
122b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ /des na khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /ming tsam
122b8(dkon brtsegs): mo zhes khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa/ /bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin/ /bag yod pa las byung ba ste/ /de la khyod kyis
123a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jug / lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol pa/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang / /ldang dang rnam par byang la 'jug /de ni rlung ltar chags
123a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe/ /srid pa'i skyon dang yod ma 'dres/ /des na khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu sngon
123a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing / /'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na/ /des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags/ /lha'i bu sngon

123a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/ /sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa/ /'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar
123a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pas gsol pa/ /sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la/ /dba' bos sngan chad spyod mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen du nges par yang / /sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul
123a7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ /byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la
123a8(dkon brtsegs): nges pas gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pas/ /chos kun sems can med pa zhes/ /chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen/ /'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsung / /lha'i bu
123b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par/ /rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas/ /des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon
123b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' la dpyad pas gsol pa/ /gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis nas/ /las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na/ /khams dang dbang po mos pa dang / /bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen/ /
123b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ /stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po/ /dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel/ /des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul
123b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ /dpa' bo sems can thams cad kyi/ /sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang / /dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams/ /mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa
123b5(dkon brtsegs): la so sor rtog pas gsol pa/ /thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi/ /sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na/ /de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu mos
123b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/ /sngon gyi mtha' la brtag bgyis kyang / /khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'/ /des na mgon la bdag mos lags/ /
123b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yon tan gyi/ /pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis/ /
123b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa/ /shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag /khyod kyis sangs rgyas
124a1(dkon brtsegs): spyan gyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig /dgyes shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen/ /des na thams cad
124a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen ces bgyi/ /lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ /khams gang gis ni sems can gang / /bsgos par gyur cing las bgyid pa'i/ /bag chags las dang sems can dag /khyod kyis g.yo ba med
124a3(dkon brtsegs): par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/ /bshes gnyen ci 'dra bsten bgyi shing / /las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas/ /'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba/ /thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu
124a4(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /las de yi ni bgyi ba gang / /dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /gang gis slad du las bgyis pa/ /de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /
124a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po de dag dmigs pa yang / /las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /lha'i bu dngos po rig pas gsol pa/ /sems can rnams
124a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsam mkhas pa/ /dngos de ji ltar gnas pa dang / /de ni ji ltar grub pa yi/ /las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /shes pa gang gis dngos po de/ /brtags
124a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur ba rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ji ltar chags gyur pa 'ang / /thub pa khyod kyis shin du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /chags pa gang gis las de rnams/ /nyon mongs
124a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i/ /nyon mongs de dag yang dag mkhyen/ /de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon/ /lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /'gro ba gang du las gang gis/ /mchis shing sgrib pa gang
124b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed nas/ /'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi/ /gang gis las rnams smin 'gyur ba'i/ /dmigs
124b2(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te/ /de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug /lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis/ /sngon chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang / /de bzhin dge ba'i las
124b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi/ /bag chags khyod kyi rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /'gro ba 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /rnying dang gsar dang slad ma dang / /las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen/ /
124b4(dkon brtsegs): de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul/ /lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang / /che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang / /chung ngam che'am mnyam pa 'ang rung / /de la mu stegs can rnams
124b5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /tshe 'di'i las rnams gang lags dang / /skye bo'i las rnams gang lags dang / /lan grangs gzhan gyi gang lags pa/ /de dag spyan ldan khyod kyis
124b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /tshe 'di la ni bgyis pa yi/ /las kyi rnam smin mi gang dag /myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la/ /so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen/ /lha'i
124b7(dkon brtsegs): bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /gang gis las gang bsags gyur te/ /skyes nas rnam par smin gyur pa/ /gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /shes rab chen pos de nyid
124b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /las gang bskal pa bye ba yi/ /phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing / /dus gzhan dag na yang 'byung ba/ /
125a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa/ /yongs su smin par ma gyur na/ /de srid 'bras
125a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mi 'byin pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la rtog pas gsol pa/ /las gang dang ni ldan pas na/ /sems can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba/ /pham pa med pas
125a3(dkon brtsegs): de mkhyen te/ /yongs su brtags nas rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /las ni ji ltar yongs smin na/ /'bras bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen/ /de la
125a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi ye shes 'jug / de dag stong par rnam par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams/ /lci dang yang ba rab tu mkhyen/ /
125a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsam pa thugs su chud/ /de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /las gang gis ni sems can rnams/ /ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / /
125a6(dkon brtsegs): lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs/ /de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing / /las kyi lci dang yang ba dag /
125a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la dpyod pas gsol ba/ sems can spyod pa dpyad mdzad cing / /las kyi rnam par smin
125a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan/ /phor bu'i chu dang gang gA'i chu/ /lan tshwas rnam par bstan pa bzhin/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /slob dang mi slob rnam par smin/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sngon mdzad cing / /
125b1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas/ /las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan/ /lha'i bu sangs rgyas ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na/ /las kyi 'bras bu rten pa yi/ /byis pa
125b2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang mkhas pa gzigs/ /phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/ /'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod/ /sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang / /skye ba kun la ye shes 'jug /mkhyen
125b3(dkon brtsegs): pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la sbyor pas gsol pa/ /'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las/ /'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang / /rnam smin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa/ /'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog
125b4(dkon brtsegs): gis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar rmi lam skom pa zhig /shin du bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin/ /rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad/ /lha'i bu
125b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa dang bral bas gsol pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /yongs su rtog las skyes pa ste/ /rmi lam dga' bar rtse ba bzhin/ /smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu yongs su rtog
125b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ /yongs su rtog pa rab zhi bas/ /nyon mongs zad par rab bstan te/ /rmi lam na ni sprin med ltar/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ /rmi lam
125b7(dkon brtsegs): char chen 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung bar/ /zag pa 'byung la mkhas pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa/ /rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin zag
125b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams 'byung ste/ /nor pa rnams la zag 'byung bar/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na/ /dga' dang sdug bsngal
126a1(dkon brtsegs): tshor 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu rmi lam rtogs pas gsol pa/ /rmi lam dag na mgo bcad bzhin/ /khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs/ /de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan/ /
126a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros nges par brtags kyis gsol pa/ /chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni/ /ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang / /bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs/ /'gro ba
126a3(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin tshim par mdzad/ /lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi dam pa'i chos stong pa/ /thos na yid ni dgar 'gyur te/ /rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu
126a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ /me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin/ /'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na/ /bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'/ /lha'i bu
126a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros nges pas gsol pa/ /thub pa pi bang sgra 'dra ba'i/ /khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na/ /lha bu rnams kyang the tshom bor/ /rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol pa/ /
126a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag /byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na/ /mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sprul pa la sems pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba/ /
126a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs/ /mgon po'i bstan pa de thos na/ /bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul kyang / /sgyu ma lags par
126a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal pas na/ /de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ /de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu rtog pa'i rjes su rtog pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs brtags pa
126b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu kun du rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ /kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu lags te/ /'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma
126b2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ /rtog pa ngan pas 'dod chags byung / /de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa/ /ri sul dag na sgra byung ba/ /brag cha sems can sgra ma lags/ /de bzhin
126b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs/ /de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te/ /sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba lags/ /'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan/ /
126b4(dkon brtsegs): byis pa mang po rab tu btsud/ /lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang / /byis pa rnams kyis gzhan du brtags/ /nan tan chos las shes par bgyi/ /de la bdag ni the
126b5(dkon brtsegs): tshom chad/ /lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/ /chos don yang dag gang lags pa/ /de ni sus kyang ma rtogs shing / /sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur/ /de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs/ /
126b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtogs pas gsol pa/ /zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang / /bag chags dang ni rtog dang rtog /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa brda yi tshig kyang lags/ /lha'i bu kun du rtog
126b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang / /zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang / /dag dang bshad dang nye du dang / /ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags/ /lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis
126b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /khams gsum rnams la ma chags te/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas/ /zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol/
127a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod kyi thugs yid ni/ /gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing / /'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la/ /gnas pa ma mchis par snang 'dra/ /lha'i bu re ba med pas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i khams
127a2(dkon brtsegs): la re ba spangs/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gnyi gar min/ /'du 'dzi dag dang bral gyur pa/ /sred zad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sred pa phyung pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la/ /khyod kyi sred pa
127a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chad/ /khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'/ /rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sred pa 'jig rten 'di dag gzil mnan nas/ khyu mchog dam pa spyod

127a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu 'dam las rgal bas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i 'dam las rgal ba ste/ /srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin brgal/ /gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'/ /
127a7(dkon brtsegs): yang srid zad la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bzang zing spangs kyis gsol pa/ zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs/ /re ba spangs shing sdig pa 'ang spangs/ /sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnam spangs pa/ /don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang
127a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /lha'i bu re ba spangs pas gsol pa/ don dang don ma lags pa spangs/ /chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa/ /bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa/ /len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu phan par
127b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas gsol pa/ bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi/ /lam gang nyon mongs rims med pa/ /sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po/ /dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs/ /lha'i bu grags pa thob pas gsol pa/ 'dren pa

127b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang yong ma gzigs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mi bsnyengs par/ /seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ 'jigs pa kun las yang dag rgal/ /zug rngu thams cad kun
127b4(dkon brtsegs): du bton/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa/ lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / /bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis/ /khyod kyis chos la rgal mi
127b5(dkon brtsegs): nus/ /de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu seng ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas/ /sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /bdag la chos kyis su rgol zhes/ /bde gshegs
127b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la dogs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu skrag med kyis gsol pa/ seng ge ri sul gnas pa ni/ /'jigs pa ma mchis skrag ma mchis/ /ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te/ /dpa' bkong nags na nga ro sgrog /de bzhin thams cad
127b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa yang / /mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag te/ /lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na/ /mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog /lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na/ /
127b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgyid pa/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs/ /lha'i bu seng ge blo gros kyis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /chos rnams kun la
128a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs mi mnga'/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te/ /cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu rjes su 'thun par skyes kyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /
128a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni/ /khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ /seng ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te/ /khyod kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung bas/ /srog chags bye ba stong dag gis/ /byang chub mchog
128a3(dkon brtsegs): tu sems kyang bskyed/ /lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjes su 'thun gyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas rjes 'thun brtul zhugs can/ /dpa' chen de dag thob chen thob/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bdud cing / /gang zag mchog tu de dag
