128a5(dkon brtsegs): bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ /'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas/ /srog chags bye ba stong dag gis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /lha'i bu sems rgyud
128a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pas gsol pa/ /yun ring dus nas mi dbang gis/ /sangs rgyas bslab la legs bslabs pas/ /de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag /mtshan rab sum bcu gnyis dang ldan/ /lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid
128a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ /zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de/ /dam bcas pa la mngon bzhugs na/ /rgol ba 'di ni yod ma mchis/ /lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa/ /khyod kyi gsung
128a8(dkon brtsegs): la smra 'gyur ba'i/ /lha dang lha bu mi dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /des na thub pa stobs dang ldan/ /lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ /dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni/ /ma lus yongs su bas pa ste/ /
128b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha/ /lha'i bu rtag tu brtson pas gsol pa/ khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes/ /mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba/ /rnam pa kun du mi dmigs te/ /des na sangs rgyas
128b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste/ /gti mug bag chags bcas pa zhi/ /nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na/ /sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod
128b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ /rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang / /bas par 'gyur bar lta ba'i tshe/ /de la khyod kyi mkhyen kun 'jug /des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /'dren pa gang
128b4(dkon brtsegs): la bslabs pa yi/ /rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa de slad du/ /nyon mongs thams cad ma lus pas/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo/ /rnal 'byor
128b5(dkon brtsegs): las ni nyams ma mchis/ /des na khyod kyi nyon mongs kun/ /bag chags bcas par yongs su bsal/ /lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bag chags ma lus yongs su bsal/ /
128b6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang / /cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ /thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod/ /nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni/ /
128b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa/ /khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal/ /khyod la skyon dri yod ma mchis/ /de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen/ /lha rnams kun gyi thub
128b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thub/ /lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas gsol pa/ /zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na/ /skye ba 'ang skye ba ma lags te/ /thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa/ /des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol pa/ /
129a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs/ /sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur/ /mya ngan 'khri shing rnam par bskams/ /gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu shing btags bton gyis gsol pa/ /thub pa thams cad mkhyen
129a2(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod/ /ma rig shing btags rnams kyang bsal/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs/ /de bas ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol du song bas gsol pa/ /srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag rgal/ /rnam par 'dren
129a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bya ba byas/ /khyod kyis snang ba yang dag phyung / /'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub/ /lha'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bshig /bag chags
129a4(dkon brtsegs): rdul tsam yong mi mnga'/ /mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu snyal/ /chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa/ /
129a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas so/ /thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa/ /sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen/ /ye shes 'tsho
129a6(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa/ /seng ge nga ro rnam sgrog kyang / /rgyal sras de dag chog med cing / /sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis skom/ /lha'i bu chos don
129a7(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer bas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar/ /khyod kyi sras rnams sems bskyed cing / /khyod kyi mi 'jigs thob gyur nas/ /mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu chos kyi skom gyis
129a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /khyod kyis mi 'jigs thos gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir/ /srog chags bye ba skom gyur te/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu rtsom// // bam po bcu gcig pa/
129b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing / /'jigs pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /gsung pa'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas/ /brtul zhugs mchog can
129b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ /thub pa zab cing blta dka' ba'i/ /chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa/ /khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas/ /de dag bla med byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu lta ba
129b3(dkon brtsegs): med pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyi seng ge'i gsung thos nas/ /khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa/ /lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ /byang chub don du gnyer ba bgyid/ /lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis
129b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi dam chos 'di thos nas/ /gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par/ /brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas
129b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /theg pa gnyis po spang bgyis shing / /lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa/ /seng ge'i
129b6(dkon brtsegs): nga ro 'di bsgrags pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur na/ /byang chub mchog la nyer gyur cing / /de dag rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol ba/ /grags chen khyod
129b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsung brjod pa'i/ /spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras/ /kun kyang dga' ba rab tu bskyed/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/ /'jigs med khyod kyis gsung
129b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa/ /ma smad sras kyis thos gyur na/ /de dag spobs pa nam du yang / /sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog /lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol pa/ /'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas/ /
130a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs chen khyod kyis sras kyi rnams/ /rtag tu rab tu dga' 'gyur cing / /ma smad de dag byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa/ /khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa
130a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sras/ /dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis par/ /byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis gsol pa/ /khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na/ /sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste/ /
130a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag yid ni nam du yang / /byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos la bar chad med la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /chos rnams gang la bsten bgyis kyang / /dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing / /de yi bar
130a4(dkon brtsegs): chad mi 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /dkar po'i phyogs la spyod pa la/ /bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /gnas kyang med pas
130a5(dkon brtsegs): thub pas mkhyen/ /des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /dge ba kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te/ /khyod kyi thugs ni des mi gos/ /
130a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rig pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /nag po'i chos ni nam du yang / /dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par/ /rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs/ /des na bcom ldan
130a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi bla/ /lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres par/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen/ /kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na/ /dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur/ /
130a8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la/ /dkar po'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste/ /de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la/ /bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs/ /lha'i bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa/ /
130b1(dkon brtsegs): nag po'i phyogs la bsten bgyid na/ /thar par 'dod pa mang po yi/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ /sems grol
130b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas/ /kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs/ /de khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags/ /lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa/ /kun nas
130b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs spyod bgyid cing / /kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na/ /dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus/ /de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa/ /sdig pa rnams la
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bsten byas kyang / /dge ba mi 'grib gang smra ba/ /de ni thar chos skal med ces/ /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa/ /chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang / /zhe sdang
130b5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug 'dul 'dod pas/ /thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba/ /de lta bur ni nan tan bgyi/ /lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag pas gsol pa/ /dag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /mi mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa/ /
130b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min/ /de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs/ /lha'i bu thar pa la brtson gyis gsol pa/ /nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos/ /rgyal ba yis ni gang bsten pa/ /de bstan nyon mongs
130b7(dkon brtsegs): mi zad ces/ /khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa/ /chos gang nyon mongs gang gi rnams/ /zad 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la/ /yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces/ /rgol
130b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni yod mi dmigs/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la/ /gang gi don du chos bstan pa/ /de brtson bgyis pas mi 'thob ces/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma
131a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ /lha'i bu mi 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa/ /'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa/ /bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na/ /'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes/ /khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis/ /
131a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa/ /shin du bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bas/ /zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa/ /de bsgrubs sel bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /dgra 'joms khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mig
131a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag gis gsol pa/ /shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir/ /gsungs pa de la bsten bgyis kyang / /gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'joms kyis
131a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni/ /dbugs dbyung rngub pa dran gsungs pa/ /de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa/ /nga'o snyam
131a5(dkon brtsegs): pa spang slad du/ /stong nyid khyod kyis bka' stsal te/ /des ni de zhi mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs kyis gsol pa/ /nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du/ /mtshan ma med pa
131a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gsungs/ /bsten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu sems rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa yi/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /
131a7(dkon brtsegs): des ni nyon mongs mi zad ces/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ /phyogs gang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / /nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug la/ /'jigs pa med par
131a8(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba ni/ /thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo / /lha'i bu tha snyad shin du shes pas gsol pa/ /bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang / /zad dang ma zad tha snyad tsam/ /'jigs pa ma mchis rgod bgyid pa/ /thub pa de ni ming tsam mo/ /
131b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa/ /mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas/ /khyod kyi sku'i phrin las 'jug /thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na/ /des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lus
131b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' bo khyod sku'i phrin las ni/ /mtha' dag shin du nges pa lags/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu
131b3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi las shin du nges pas gsol pa/ /sku'i phrin las rab nges par/ /lus can kun la sman slad du/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de/ /des na khyod ni gang zag mchog /lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha'
131b4(dkon brtsegs): shin du mthong bas gsol pa/ /sems can kun la sman slad du/ /'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ /sku'i phrin las dag pa dang / /legs par yongs su brtags dang ldan/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin
131b5(dkon brtsegs): du mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag sku dang / /sku yi phrin las rnam dag dang / /ldan par sems can bde don du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod par mdzad/ /lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol
131b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang / /rtsub pa yongs su spangs pa'i gsungs/ /mkhyen pas shin du yongs brtags shing / /mgon po khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu dus su smras pas gsol pa/ /dus su don dang ldan pa dang / /
131b7(dkon brtsegs): don med yongs su spangs pa'i gsung / /gsung bar 'os dang blang 'os pa/ /'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sdum sra byed blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te/ /'dum par 'gyur dang
131b8(dkon brtsegs): yid 'ong ba/ /dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin/ /sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod/ /lha'i bu mi slu bas gsol pa/ /srog gi don du 'ang khyod kyis ni/ /srid pa rnams su brdzun ma gsungs/ /de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun/ /
132a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa/ /'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du/ /thub pa'i gsung la bstod pa ni/ /yang dag
132a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i rgyu 'thun lags/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /mi mchog khyod kyis bden pa yis/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te/ /chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin
132a3(dkon brtsegs): yang / /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa rtul pas gsol pa/ /'dus byas dag gi chos kyi rnams/ /yang dag ji bzhin blta ba dang / /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang / /
132a4(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dbang pos rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa/ /ye shes yongs su dag pa yis/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi/ tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis/ /
132a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa/ /mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi las/ /ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni/ /de dag 'gro la thugs rjes 'jug /'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog
132a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /'gro la thugs rje skyed nas ni/ /gang la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa/ /de la thugs ni dul bar 'gyur/ /'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /
132a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyad nas/ /rnam 'dren thugs kyi phrin las 'jug /thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni/ /mkhyen bzhin kun du rab tu 'jug /lha'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas
132a8(dkon brtsegs): sa dang yid kyi las/ /sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung / /sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs/ /rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /sbyin
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la yang / /gang gis gang la sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ /byang chub mchog ni tshol
132b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing / /gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi spyod pa yongs brtags nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /gang
132b3(dkon brtsegs): du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang / /khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi/ /ting 'dzin
132b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrub bya ba/ /sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu/ /grangs med dpag
132b5(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis/ /zhus shing bsgom pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang / bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
132b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas sems can rnams la ston/ /sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul bas gsol pa/ /gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal/ /rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis/ /
132b7(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa mi bzad bgyis pa dag /gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung bas gsol pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtogs pa/ /khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi/ /
132b8(dkon brtsegs): las dang bsam gtan snyoms 'jug dang / /'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang / /skye dang las kyi
133a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin la/ /thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ /brten pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi/ /mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi/ /bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu dang / /'gro ba
133a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa/ /khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang / /dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi/ /ye shes mchog ni mi chags te/ /srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/ /
133a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/ /las dang sems can 'gro ba dang / /rnam par smin pa myong ba dag /de dag thams cad ming tsam du/ /rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas
133a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /da lta byung la thogs ma mchis/ /grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam par dpyod pas gsol pa/ /mi yi
133a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang pos rnam dpyad nas/ /byis pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyid pa/ /dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par/ /nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyi gsol pa/ /dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing / /
133a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /rnams par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul bas gsol pa/ /'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams/ /
133a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par/ /skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa/ /dus gsum sems can thams cad la/ /snying po mchis par ma bstan te/ /sgyu ma smig sgyu mig g.yor dang / /
133a8(dkon brtsegs): brag ca lta bur khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa/ /'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /dus gsum po dag kun du yang / /sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas na/ /khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mos pa
133b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rig par byed kyis gsol pa/ /gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyi/ /byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa/ /de dus tshun chad mos pa la/ /bri bar gyur par yong mi gda'/ /lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten
133b2(dkon brtsegs): sgron ma'i mos pa ni/ /bar du rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/ /rtag par khyod kyi mos pa des/ /khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che/ /lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/ /chab las pad ma ji bzhin du/ /khyod ni mos pas mngon du
133b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags/ /'jig rten dag gis mi gos te/ /pad ma chab kyis ji bzhin no/ /lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol gyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings shes brjod pa ste/ /gnyis med gnyis su bgyid
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ /gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis/ /byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur/ /mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/ /brtson 'grus
133b5(dkon brtsegs): btang ba yong ma mdzad/ /lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ /dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni/ /thams cad kun kyi rjes su 'jug /mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/ /dgongs pa bri ba yod ma mchis/ /lha'i bu
133b6(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ /mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen/ /'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni/ /sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu shes rab lhur len
133b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyis kyang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod/ /lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ /rnam par
133b8(dkon brtsegs): grol dang ma grol ba/ /gang slad khyod kyis ma brnyes pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni/ /rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol pa/ /thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas/ /
134a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na/ /rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni/ /yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam par dpyod kyis gsol pa/ /mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du/ /dpa' bo yang dag
134a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs khyod kyi/ /spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste/ /des na sangs rgyas lags shes bstod/ /lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/ /srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du/ /bde gshegs khyod la chags mi mnga'/ /chos
134a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na/ /rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni/ /rnam pa kun du bsnyel mi mnga'/ /mgon po'i dgongs pa nyer bzhag pas/ /thub pa 'bru mar
134a4(dkon brtsegs): snod dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi mnga'/ /ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'/ /lha'i bu
134a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod la ni/ /ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste/ /mi yi dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos/ /ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis
134a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la ni/ /'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa/ /khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu snying po blangs pas gsol pa/ /sems can
134a7(dkon brtsegs): snying po bla na med/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas gtsang ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe gzhan
134a8(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi'am ci dang / phreng ldan glang po can dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /
134b1(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / /'thab bral dang / /dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ gnas
134b2(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur te chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis su gyur/ nem nur dang / the tshom
134b3(dkon brtsegs): za bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag ni kun du rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal/ /khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing 'di ltar
134b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur te/ sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau
134b5(dkon brtsegs): ta ma khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher gau tam
134b6(dkon brtsegs): ma khyod kyi legs par gsungs pa 'tshal zhing yi rangs par gyur ba mthong ste/ des bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to/ /kye gau ta ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni de bzhin
134b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'o zhes smras pa de la ji ltar chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshal lo/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod ni ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtogs nas mun pa med par
134b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do snyam ste/ /bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can
135a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun du rgyu dag de'i phyir khyed nyid la dris/ /khyed kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig /dge sbyong gau ta ma legs so zhes gsol te/ /kun du
135a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun du rgyu dag khyed kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma bdag cag gis
135a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan bcos las thos na gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang 'di pha dang ma gnyis kyang tshogs pa dang / chags par yang gyur pa dang / chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas
135a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyang byung ba de'i tshe mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ /pha dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags de ma'i sems las byung ngam
135a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma ma lags so/ /ma'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye gau ta ma ma lags so/ /de pha'i sems las byung ngam/ /kye gau ta ma ma lags so/ /pha'i rnam par rtog pas las byung ngam/ kye gau ta ma ma
135a6(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pha'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ pha'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mngal
135a7(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pha'i kun du rtog pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas
135a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de lha las shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de mi dang / lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
135b1(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ /mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa 'am/ gzugs med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/
135b2(dkon brtsegs): kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/ /kun du rgyu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/ /de skad ces gsol pa
135b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun du rgyu dag chos 'di ni zab cing phra ste/ mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas ris par bya ba yin te/ brtag tu med cing
135b4(dkon brtsegs): brtag pa'i yul ma yin la/ blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas de ni khyed yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/ gzhan du mos pa/ gzhan du dad pa/ gzhan du brtson pa/ gzhan du lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes
135b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus mod kyi/ kun du rgyu dag 'on kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas chos zab mo rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/ kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na
135b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na tshe 'di nyid la mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
135b7(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi mig nyams par gyur pas tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ des kyang chos zab
135b8(dkon brtsegs): mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu khyed kyang yun ring po nas gzhan du bltas pa/ sngon log pa'i gdams ngag gis bslus pa/ chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes pa/ thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'du shes
136a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'byung ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar 'du shes pa/ chud zos pa rnams kyis chud gzan pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na long ba'i dmigs bu long bas byas na/ gang 'di bkri ba dang / khrid pa de gnyis ga yang
136a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni ston pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs
136a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba
136a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba mthong ba yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag ni mu stegs byed pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o/ /
136a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes khas 'che zhing gang rjes su ston pa de ni log par rjes su ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chud par byed pa de ni log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/ gang 'byung
136a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la mkhas pa ma yin par gang 'byin pa de ni log par 'byin par 'gyur/ 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par gang 'byung ba ston pa de ni log par ston par 'gyur/ mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang sgrol bar
136a7(dkon brtsegs): ni log par sgrol bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na pa lang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa ma yin pas rab ka ma yin par ba lang
136a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgral na/ de'i ba lang de dag gis pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram ma rnyed nas 'khyil te/ de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang rdzi de rab ka la mi
136b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag nga ni ston pa
136b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin la ston par khas 'che bas ngag rjes su ston pa de yang dag par rjes su ston pa yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/ khas 'che bas/
136b3(dkon brtsegs): nga gang khong du chud par byed pa de yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa yin/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid yin la 'byung ba la mkhas par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byin pa de dag yang dag par 'byin pa yin/ 'byung ba
136b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba nyid yin la 'byung ba ston par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang dag par ston pa yin/ mu stegs byed pa yin la mu stegs byed par khas 'che bas nga gang sgrol ba de yang dag par sgrol
136b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ ston pa'i chos rab tu shes nas ni rjes su ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes nas ni khong du chud par byed/ 'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni 'byin/ yang dag par mthong nas ni ston/ mu stegs rab
136b6(dkon brtsegs): tu shes nas ni sgrol te/ gang sgrol ba de yang mu stegs bde ba rab tu sgrol ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ kun du rgyu dag khyed kyang thar par 'dod pa yin la/ nga yang ston pa mngon du bzhugs pa yin te/ yang dag
136b7(dkon brtsegs): par ston pa/ yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa/ 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba mthong ba/ yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyis de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te mos pa skyed la dran pa nye bar zhog
136b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ yid 'dun par gyis la ma thob pa'i chos rnams thob par bya ba dang / sngon ma phyin pa'i mal du 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma song ba'i phyogs su 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma 'grogs pa'i lam
137a1(dkon brtsegs): grogs dang 'grogs par bya ba dang / sngon ma btsal ba'i lam btsal bar bya ba dang / sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus yang dag par rtsoms shig /kun du rgyu dag
137a2(dkon brtsegs): chos gsum mngon du gyur pas mngal du 'jug ces gang smras pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la ngas bshad do/ /kun du rgyu
137a3(dkon brtsegs): dag de la ma zhes gang smras pa de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen du gsungs so/ /pha zhes bya ba de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsungs so/ /dri za zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis
137a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /mer mer po zhes bya ba de ni las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang gzhi'o/ /ma'i mngal zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phangs pa'i
137a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhi ste/ 'di ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la gnas na rtswa dang / shing gel
137a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dag skye zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'phel
137a7(dkon brtsegs): nas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /btsas nas rnam par 'phel lo/ /'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur te/ 'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes nas de dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dag de spyod
137a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ glen pas ni ma yin no/ /yun ring po nas 'grogs 'grogs pas shes par bya ba yin gyis yun thung dus ma yin no/ /
137b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ mi brtson pas ma yin no/ /kun du rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni 'di dag yin
137b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di lta ste/ skad sha sha po yin/ skad gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/ skad brtag dgos pa yin/ skad che ba yin/ skad lhang lhang po yin/ rtag tu dngangs pa yin/ rtag tu 'dar ba yin/ rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa
137b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ /ri rgyug par mthong ba yin/ me mdag 'bar bar mthong ba yin/ lcags zangs kyi nang du btso ba mthong ba yin lag na dbyug pa thogs pa'i mi dag mthong
137b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ srin po dag gis bdag 'phang bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid gson por gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag dbang par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag
137b5(dkon brtsegs): gis bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gyis gtses par mthong ba yin/ phyogs bzhir bros nas phyogs mi shes pa yin/ sems can kun la yid
137b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ston pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o/ /kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skyes gnas nas
137b7(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin / le lo che ba yin/ mang du za ba yin/ sa la 'drud pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa med
137b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ /mi gsal bar smra ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin/ mun pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dam rdzab la dga' ba yin/ yang dang yang sos rtswa gcod pa yin/ rgyun du rkang pa'i
138a1(dkon brtsegs): mthe bos sa rko ba yin/ yang dang yang mgo la sbrang ma 'du ba yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la sos 'debs pa yin/ kun du bskums te nyal ba yin/ sa la nyal ba yin/ mi gtsang bas mi 'dog
138a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la mnom pa yin/ yang dang yang ma smin par za ba yin/ gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du byed de g.yo byed pa yin/ bab bab tu spyod pa yin/ rmi lam na bdag rdzab kyis gos par
138a3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na bdag nags su song ste rtswa za bar rmi ba yin/ sbrul gdug pas bdag bskor par mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid ri khrod du zhugs par mthong ba yin te/ kun du rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa dud
138a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du mar shes par bya ste/ de dag ni bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par brjod kyang zad par mi nus so/ /kun du rgyu dag
138a5(dkon brtsegs): de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i mig lta bu yin/ rtag par bkres pa yin/ rtag tu skom pa yin/
138a6(dkon brtsegs): ser sna che ba yin/ 'dod chen che ba dang / 'thob pa mi rnyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi la re ba yin/ khro ba yin/ mig dmar ba yin/ bza' ba thams cad la sred pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin/
138a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i gnas dag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/ dngos po kun la yang de brku ba'i sems yod pa yin/ dngos por ngan pa rnams la yang dga' ba yin/ 'thob pa la mos pa yin/ zas skom mi
138a8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod la sred pa skyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems
138b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ zas gtor na sems mi dga' ba yin/ tshong 'dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing thog len pa yin te/ kun du rgyu dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag ni de dag la sogs pa
138b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas par shes par bya'o/ /kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ khengs pa yin/ 'thab krol che ba yin 'khon du 'dzin pa yin/ nga rgyal che ba
138b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ lus che ba yin/ mig che ba yin/ mig dkar ba yin/ mche ba snang ba yin/ mthu dang ldan pa yin/ thab mo'i blo can yin/ dbyen la dga' ba yin/ bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/ so snang ba yin/
138b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin/ mtshon cha rno ba yin/ tshig na pa yin/ bdag gzeng stod pa can yin/ mi shes pa'i stobs can yin/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yin te/ kun du rgyu dag de dag
138b5(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o/ /kun du rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ngo mtshar du 'dzin
138b6(dkon brtsegs): pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang sten pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/ dge ba byed pa yin/ mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa yin/ bzo la dga' ba yin/
138b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa chung ba yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/ rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/ byas pa gzo ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdu ba yin/ yongs su
138b8(dkon brtsegs): gtod pa dang ldan pa yin/ bye brag gshegs pa yin/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin/ tshig gi mthu yod pa yin/ gros gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang / 'thab mo bya ba
139a1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par mkhas pa yin/ pho nya nus pa yin/ skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i mthu yod pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun du rgyu de dag la sogs pa ni mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin no/ /
139a2(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag de la lha las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mdzes pa yin/ gtsang sbra che ba yin/ phreng ba la dga' ba yin/ spos la dga' ba yin/ bdug pa la dga' ba yin/ glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba yin/ 'dod pa'i yon tan mngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/ rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin/ glu thams cad la dga' ba yin/ skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang / khang pa
139a4(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa dang / khyim dang / longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/ de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rgod pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'jam par smra ba yin/ dga' ba la mkhas pa yin/ rgyun la dga' ba yin/ cha ba'i ngang
139a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul can yin/ 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ chags pa'i mtshan ma dang mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/ phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag mtshan ma de dag
139a6(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pas/ mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o/ /kun du rgyu dag de la mtshan ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan
139a7(dkon brtsegs): ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bar bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag
139a8(dkon brtsegs): gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe zhe sdang la yongs su bsten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas de las des sems can dmyal bar skyes te/ de'i phyir sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas
139b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang du skyes te/ spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag thos nas bdag ni sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang
139b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to/ /byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims
139b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/ de byams pa chen po bsgoms pas pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye
139b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe/ gti mug la yongs su bsten pas des gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas/ de las des dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes te/ de'i phyir de
139b5(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas brnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur pas de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te/ mi'i nang du skye kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de
139b6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/
139b7(dkon brtsegs): de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ston to/ /des kyang de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
139b8(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ de gti mug de ni rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te des de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa
140a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir 'gyur ba'i tshe ser sna la kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des der ser sna dang ldan pa chags pa las byung ba'i las mngon
140a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par bya ba dang / blangs pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ de gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur
140a3(dkon brtsegs): bas de gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes
140a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de las dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston to/ /des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag la nyal spong bar
140a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin
140a6(dkon brtsegs): las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la nga rgyal la yang yongs su bsten pas de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang /
140a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des lha ma yin du skyes te/ lha ma yin gyi nang na gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa
140a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bdag ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen
140b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga rgyal spang ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams ston te/ des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid ston pa des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang / bdag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ji
140b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bya ba sgyur ba rnams tshogs pa las byung ba'i tshul ston te/ des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/ des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de
140b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas de las de
140b4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pas mir skyes te/ de mi'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang mi'i spyod pa de dag
140b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing des mi'i spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal par bya ste/ de la
140b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston to/ /des kyang de'i spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi bsngags pa dang / mya ngan las
140b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te/ des de 'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la pha rol du phyin pa drug ston te/ de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
140b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston to/ /des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag shin tu bzung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag
141a1(dkon brtsegs): gis ni sngon mir gyur ba'i tshe tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang / sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas de las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang /
141a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba dang / blangs pas lha'i nang du skyes te/ de lha'i nang na gnas pa de lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de lha las shi 'phos te/ mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de
141a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bdag ni lha'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs
141a4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ston cing mi gnas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod do/ /mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sbyin pa bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /mchog tu 'dzin pa'i
141a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dmod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /des de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la tshul khrims
141a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de la thabs la mkhas pa yang ston to/ /de dang ldan pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun du
141a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mnyan par bya'o/ /thos nas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
141a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 'khor bzhi po yod pa dag tu gnas par bya zhing de dag dang 'grogs par bya'o/ /des 'gro
141b1(dkon brtsegs): ba byas te goms pa'i rjes su 'gro bas chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
141b2(dkon brtsegs): brten te/ gti mug gi gnyen por bstan bcos la mkhas pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig dga' bar gnas par bya'o/ /des de'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur te/ des bstan bcos shes pa de dag rang bzhin gyis yang dag par brtag par
141b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /de'i phyir de la bstan bcos dang bstan bcos shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin med do zhes bya bar snang bar gyur te/ des de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar
141b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /kun du rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni gang la rten na de'i sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan

141b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu gnyis pa/ kun du rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ nga rgyal zhes bya ba'i chos
141b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni gang zhig / de ni ci zhig gis yongs su bzung / de ni su la kun nas langs/ su zhig de spong bar byed ces yang dag par btsal na nga rgyal de mi dmigs so/ /gang gis de yongs su bzung ba dang / gang la de kun nas
141b8(dkon brtsegs): langs pa dang / gang de spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de yang mi dmigs te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su bzung bas bdag dang 'jig rten bslus par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des chos thams cad rang
142a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dngos po med pas yongs su ma grub bo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yongs su
142a2(dkon brtsegs): ma grub pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag go/ /gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni gdags su med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gang gdags su med pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar
142a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yang ma yin no/ /gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni thob pa yang ma yin/ chud zos pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kun tu rgyu dag de ltar na de ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do/ /chos nyid gang
142a4(dkon brtsegs): gis chos thams cad de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid pas de'i phyir chos thams
142a5(dkon brtsegs): cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /kun du rgyu dag ngas ni sngon chad dang da ltar yang 'jig rten btags pa ni nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no zhes bshad do/ /nga rgyal gyis ni mi las shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro/ /
142a6(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis ni mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal gyis ni sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal med na gdags pa med do/ /kun du
142a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag de ni nga rgyal med pa'i ye shes shes bya'o/ /de yang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas shes par nus so/ /de nas kun
142a8(dkon brtsegs): du rgyu drug khri bo de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas bstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do phyogs
142b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mgon po ye shes stobs kyis yang dag 'phags/ /'gro ba kun la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /'gro ba kun na spyod pa rnam gzigs te/ /lag pa'i
142b2(dkon brtsegs): mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /'jig rten lta ba'i rnam pas kun du dkrugs/ /sprin stug dag gis nam mkha' yog pa bzhin/ /de dag gis ni byis pa rmongs nas spyod/ /long ba'i tshogs rnams rab tu lam stor bzhin/ /'jig rten rtag
142b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten mi rtag dang / /rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kha cig mchi/ /rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min zhes te/ glang po'i dbang po khyim du btags ltar brlag /'jig rten mtha' yod 'jig rten mtha' med dang / /mtha' yang yod la mtha'
142b4(dkon brtsegs): med kha cig 'chi/ /mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med yin zhes te/ /dper na bya ni gzeb tu bcug pa bzhin/ /la la dag ni lus 'di bdag ces mchi/ /la la dag ni lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi/ /rtog pas yongs su dkris nas nyal
142b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de/ /bya ni bya rgyar chud nas thogs pa bzhin/ /la la dag ni dbang phyug sprul ces mchi/ /la la rgyu med byung zhes 'dogs par bgyid/ /lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis kun nas dkris/ /mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ltar rgyal bas gzigs/ /
142b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar gzeb tu bcug pa'i bya rmongs pa/ bu ga bu gar thar par re ba ltar/ /mi mkhas lta ba'i rnam pas btags par gyur/ /thar pa mi 'thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin/ /tshangs dang skye dgu'i bdag dang skem byed dang / /gzhan
142b7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'khor lo 'dzin dang rnam thos bu/ /phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung ba bzhin/ /dbul po bu lon chags pa bu lon pas/ /bzung na gnyar sbron gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin/ /lta
142b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i byin pa rnams/ /dbang phyug las ni bde ba tshol bgyid de/ /rkun po'i tshogs rnams btson rar bstsal pa bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal brgya myong ba/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis
143a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /phyag gi mthil na sor mo lnga dang mtshungs/ /de la mi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /'gro ba mkhyen pa 'gro bar spyod mdzad de/ /blo mchog tshe rabs 'gro ba bkrol ba ni/ /dper na rgyal pos btson rnams bkye ba bzhin/ /
143a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sman slad bskal pa bsam yas su/ /dka' ba mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes te/ /lta ba'i rnam par sems can 'khyams mkhyen nas/ /de dag bcings las khyod kyis grol bar mdzad/ /bde gshegs mi yi seng ge rkang gnyis gtso/ /
143a3(dkon brtsegs): chos tshogs gang la mnga' dbang khyod mdzad pa/ /lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar rmongs mi mnga'/ /bde gshegs khyod ni de 'drar bdag cag 'tshal/ /stobs rnams gang gis rgyal ba stobs brnyes shing / /mi 'jigs gang gis sngo ba'i dgra
143a4(dkon brtsegs): bsal te/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /khyu mchog de ni bdag cag thob par shog /gang gis rgyal ba 'jig rten gsum bskyod dang / /gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang / /gang gis mi mchog sems
143a5(dkon brtsegs): can lung ston pa/ /de ring yud kyis bdag cag de thob shog /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan kyis kun du rgyu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi/ bcom ldan
143a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /'jig rten phan bzhed 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa/ /mu stegs tshogs 'di shin du 'phags gyur tam/ /mi mchog rang byung ci slad mdzum mdzad pa/ /'dzum rgyu de ni khyod kyis bka' stsal
143a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas/ /'jig rten phan bzhed 'gro 'di the tshom 'tshal/ /zla ba nya la 'gro ba lta ba bzhin/ /lta zhing mchis na rgyal ba 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /su zhig rgyal la mchod
143a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dam pa bgyis/ /gang gis de ring yab ni mnyes par bgyis/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan de ring gang gis mthong / /mkhas pa myur du legs par bka' stsal gsol/ /mu stegs can rnams lung bstan de thos nas/ /
143b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas btul/ /des na 'gro ba kun gyi rnam 'dren lags/ /rgyal bas the tshom legs par bsal du gsol/ /som nyi 'tshal ba'i som nyi dgum du
143b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /des ni 'khor rnams 'di dag yi rangs shing / /sangs rgyas khyod kyi dgongs la dad par mchi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dus 'di shes 'gyur
143b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la dris pa legs/ /'dren pa rang byung nyid la de dris pas/ /'jig rten phan pa'i tshig kyang brjod par gyur/ /'dzum pa 'di ni ji ltar ngas mdzad pa/ /'dzum rgyu ngas de khyod la bstan par byas/ /yang dag ji
143b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nga yis bstan pa la/ /dga' ba'i yid du byos te der nyon cig /mu stegs tshogs 'dir rab tu dul gyur de/ /lta ba'i rnam spangs lta ba bzang por 'gyur/ /lta ba'i rnam par 'jig rten 'khyams mthong nas/ snying rje can gyur byang chub rab tu zhugs/ /lta ba'i rnam pa
143b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rab spangs te/ /lta ba drang po rnyog med rtogs gyur cing / /nga yis lung bstan thogs med thos gyur nas/ /de dag kun gyis thams cad mkhyen sems bskyed/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la dad bskyed de/ /thugs rje ldan pa rkang
143b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dam pa po/ /rgyal ba bye ba nyi shur tshang ba la/ /bla med byang chub tshol zhing bsnyen bkur byas/ /rgyal ba rnams la sbyin pa mi nyul thul/ /khrims dang zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs/ /shes rab brtson 'grus stobs kyang
143b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar bar byas/ /thugs rje ldan rnams drung du bzod pa bsten/ /byang chub dam pa bcal nas yun ring du/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la blo yang zhugs/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal ba zhu ba zhus/ /sangs rgyas brgya 'grangs dag la yid
143b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' byas/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang gis ni/ /lta ba'i rnam pa sdug la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag bde gshegs rang byung mthong gyur nas/ /chags pa med pas lta ba'i rnam pa spangs/ /ston pa'i dgongs
144a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag rnam par rtogs/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa rnams la dad pa gnas/ /ma 'ongs dus na byang chub tshol byed cing / /rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la/ /rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom
144a2(dkon brtsegs): par mtshan 'thun par/ /grags pa chen por phyogs su rnam par grags/ /'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba 'grel par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur te/ /de dag bkod pa sna tshogs mtshungs pa med/ /sangs rgyas zhing der
144a3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i blo can med/ /blo gros dag par 'thun pa sha stag gnas/ /de ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /mi khom bsal te dus de'i tha ma la/ /rgyal ba de dag sku tshe'i stobs ldan te/ /lo ni stong phrag brgyad bcu thub
144a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /mi de dag gis byang chub 'di thos nas/ /tshe de mi mnyes par ni byed mi 'gyur/ /chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi mchan thos na/ /bud med rnams kyang skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur/ /de ltar nga bcom rgyal ba drang srong
144a5(dkon brtsegs): che/ /ston pas mu stegs lung bstan bka' stsal pa/ /de thos gyur nas lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams/ /yi rangs gyur cing stobs kyang bskyed par 'gyur/ /mu stegs can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //
144a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dang bcas pas lha ma yin rnams dang / /nam mkha' lding rnams nas kun du rgyu rnams kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa thos nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
144a7(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byas pa ni ngo mtshar snyam nas de yang bu la chags pas kun du bkris par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sems thugs su chud nas rgyal po zas
144a8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ma la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod la tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ /don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/
144b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su byang ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma
144b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu gang zag 'di ni khams drug pa/
144b3(dkon brtsegs): reg pa'i skye mched drug pa/ /yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bcwa brgyad pa ste/ skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa zhes gang smras pa de'i las brten te smras she na/ rgyal po chen po khams drug ni 'di dag go/ /drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang /
144b4(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams so/ /rgyal po chen po de dag ni khams drug ste/ skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te
144b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las brten te smras she na/ rgyal po chen po reg pa'i skye mched drug ni 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ gzugs rnams la lta ba'i phyir mig reg pa'i skye mched dang /
144b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra rnams la nyan pa'i phyir rna ba reg pa'i skye mched dang / dri rnams la ma nom pa'i phyir sna reg pa'i skye mched dang / ro rnams la myang ba'i phyir lce reg pa'i skye mched dang / reg bya rnams la reg pa'i phyir lus reg pa'i skye mched dang / chos rnams rnam par
144b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyir yid reg pa'i skye mched do/ /rgyal po chen po de dag ni reg pa'i skye mched drug ste/ skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so/ /rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bcwa
144b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las brten te smras she na/ rgyal po chen po yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bcwa brgyad ni 'di dag ste/ bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la mis mig gis gzugs mthong na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
145a1(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms su 'gyur bar gzugs la nye bar spyod do/ /rna bas sgra thos na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar sgra la nye bar spyod do/ /snas dri tshor na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su
145a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar dri la nye bar spyod do/ /lces ro myong na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar ro la nye bar spyod do/ /lus kyis reg bya la reg na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar reg bya la nye bar
145a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod do/ /yid kyis chos reg na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar chos la nye bar spyod do/ /rgyal po chen po de la gang dag yid bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang / gang dag yid mi bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug
145a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang dag btang snyoms su 'gyur bar nye bar spyod pa drug po de dag gcig tu bsdus na yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bcwa brgyad du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bcwa brgyad po de dag ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi
145a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa bcwa brgyad pa'o zhes gang dag smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so/ /rgyal po chen po de la sa'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te nang gi yang yod/ phyi rol gyi yang yod do/ /rgyal po chen po nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang
145a6(dkon brtsegs): ci yang rung ste/ lus 'di la nang gi khong na sra ba dang / mkhrang ba'i rnam pa dang / nye bar gyur pa dang zin pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rngul dang / dri ma dang / lpags pa dang /

145a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / gzhan gang yang lus 'di la nang gi khong na sra ba dang / mkhrang ba'i rnam pa dang / lus su gtogs par gyur ba dang / zin pa 'di ni nang gi sa'i khams shes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen
145b1(dkon brtsegs): po phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ phyi rol gyi sra ba dang / mkhrang ba'i rnam pa dang / lus su ma gtogs pa dang / ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams shes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po de la nang gi sa'i khams
145b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang sogs par mi 'gro'o/ /rgyal po chen po bud med nang du bdag ni bud med do zhes rtog cing de nang du bud med ces brtags nas/ phyi rol du skyes pa la skyes pa'o zhes
145b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog go/ /de phyi rol du skyes pa la skyes pa zhes brtags nas chags par gyur te/ phyi rol gyi skyes pa dang phrad par 'dod do/ /skyes pa de yang nang du bdag skyes pa zhes rtog ste/ nang du bdag ni skyes pa zhes brtags nas phyi rol du bud
145b4(dkon brtsegs): med la bud med ces rtog go/ /phyi rol du bud med la bud med ces brtags nas chags par gyur te/ phyi rol gyi bud med dang phrad par 'dod do/ /phrad par 'dod pas brang par 'gyur ro/ /phrad pa'i rkyen gyis mer mer po skye bar 'gyur

145b6(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes te/ kun du rtog pa de yang ngo bo nyid kyis med do/ /kun du rtog pa ji lta ba de bzhin du phrad pa dang / mer mer po yang ngo bo nyid kyis med do/ /gang ngo bo nyid med pa ji ltar sra ba skyed par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po de ltar kun
145b7(dkon brtsegs): du rtog pa shes par byas nas sra ba nyid rtogs par bya ste/ ci nas sra ba ni skye ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar shes par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'di ltar gang lus 'di dur khrod kyi mthar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/ de'i sra ba
145b8(dkon brtsegs): de 'jig cing 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe shar phyogs su mi 'gro/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang 'og dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su yang mi 'gro ste/ rgyal po chen po nang gi
146a1(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams ni de ltar blta'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di nam mkhar gyur pa la tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa gnas pa'i dus de yod de/ rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe gang
146a2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang mi 'ong / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa byung yang / rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba re 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri
146a3(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i rgyu las grub pa sra zhing brtan la lhun stug pa rnams gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag dang / gnya' shing 'dzin dag dang / mu khyud 'dzin dag dang / gshol
146a4(dkon brtsegs): mda' 'dzin dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin dag dang / seng ldeng can dag dang / rnam par 'dud dag dang / ri rta rna ngag dang / blta na sdug dang / blta na sdug chen po dag dang / ther sgre dag dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dag dang / gangs ri dag dang / de ma yin pa'i ri
