170a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spos chu'i char rab tu bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de nas yang rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa la rgya cher brtag par 'dod nas 'di snyam du
170a8(dkon brtsegs): bsams te/ kye ma bdag gi gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me tog gi char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig snyam pa dang / rgyal po chen po rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis sems bskyed ma thag tu gling chen
170b1(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du me tog gi char rab tu bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma bdag gi gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
170b2(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dir lha'i gos kyi char dang / dbyig gi char dang / gser gyi char dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dang / yo byad thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig snyam pa dang / rgyal po chen po rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas
170b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems bskyed ma thag tu 'di ltar sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyus lha'i gos kyi char dang / dbyig gi char dang / gser gyi char dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dang /
170b4(dkon brtsegs): yo byad thams cad kyi char rab tu bab po/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ni rgyar dpag tshad khri brgyad stong yod par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer bye ba phrag drug bcu yod par gyur nas 'dzam bu'i
170b5(dkon brtsegs): gling de'i dbus na rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rgyal po'i pho brang du gyur pa chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ dri ma med pa shin du 'brel bar bres pa zhig yod par
170b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ rgyal po chen po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de ni shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ ta la de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang /
170b7(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi ta la sha stag go/ /de la gser gyi ta la rnams ni dngul gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /dngul gyi ta la rnams ni gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /bai dUr+ya'i ta la
170b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni shel gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /shel gyi ta la rnams ni bai dUr+ya'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de rin po
171a1(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun steng du bres pa 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i dra ba chen po'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang /
171a2(dkon brtsegs): spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de kun nas 'obs zab pa/ chu 'byung ba/ zabs su dpag tshad phyed yod pa/ kha tshon du dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
171a3(dkon brtsegs): chus bya rog gis btung du rung ba tsam du kha da chad du yongs su gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos kun du gang ba/ gser gyi bye ma brdal ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar gyur te/
171a4(dkon brtsegs): 'obs de dag gi khor yug nas 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / rin po che de bzhi las byas pa'i them skas bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa sha stag bkod par gyur to/ /de la gser gyi gzhi la ni dngul gyi them pa
171a5(dkon brtsegs): bkye/ dngul gyi gzhi la ni gser gyi them pa bkye/ bai dUr+ya'i gzhi la ni shel gyi them pa bkye/ shel gyi gzhi la ni bai dUr+ya'i them pa bkye ba sha stag ste/ them skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa
171a6(dkon brtsegs): rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor bar gyur to/ /rin po che'i them skas de dag gi steng steng du rin po che sna bdun rta babs bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa sha stag btsugs par gyur to/ /them skas de dag so so'i khar 'dzam bu chu bo'i
171a7(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi chu shing ljon pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa sha stag btsugs par gyur te/ 'obs kyi chu de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gru bkra ba blta na sdug pa sha stag bcas par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rgyal po grags
171a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas kyi bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i khor yug tu bskyed mos tshal bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ bdag gir bya ba med pa/ yongs su bzung ba med pa/ brgyad
171b1(dkon brtsegs): khri byas par gyur to/ /de dag kyang rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis skye bo thams cad yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir byin te/ mi de dag bskyed mos tshal de dag tu dong nas phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba mchog gis rtse dga' zhing
171b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod par gyur to/ /bskyed mos tshal de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu brgyad brgyad bshams par gyur te/ rdzing bu de dag kun kyang rgyar rgyang grags phyed phyed yod pa sha stag go/ /rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bzhi
171b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel gyi them skas bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/ /them skas de dag gi steng steng du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rta babs bkra ba/ blta na sdug
171b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag btsugs par gyur to/ /them skas de dag ri re'i khar yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi chu shing ljon pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa sha stag btsugs par gyur to/ /rdzing bu de dag kyang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bya
171b5(dkon brtsegs): rog gis btung du rung ba tsam du kha da chad du yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /rdzing bu de dag tu me tog chu las skyes pa 'di lta bu dag bskyed par gyur to/ /'di ltar me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang /
171b6(dkon brtsegs): dri zhim ldan rnams so/ /khor yug tu yang thang las skyes pa'i me tog 'di lta bu dag bskyed par gyur te/ 'di ltar a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / bar sha ka dang sna ma'i me tog dang / ma yu ka dang / da nu ska ri dang / de ma yin pa'i
171b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog thang las skyes pa mang po dag kyang bskyed par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de'i steng gi bar snang la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba chen po bres pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches
171b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brgyan pa'i shing ta la de dag dang / rin po che'i dra ba de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta bu'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba 'di lta ste dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol
172a1(dkon brtsegs): mo sil snyan mkhas pas legs par blangs pa'i sgra lta bu byung bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de na mi ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang sgra des rtse dga' zhing
172a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod par gyur to/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de ni 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang / mis yongs su gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang /
172a3(dkon brtsegs): pad ma dkar pos yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'o na bdag ni shar gyi lus 'phags gling du 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs/
172a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas shar gyi lus 'phags gling ga la ba der song ste/ des der lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang por rgyal po byas so/ /de nas rgyal po
172a5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa mtha' yas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'o na bdag ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par
172a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags nas nub kyi ba lang spyod ga la ba der song ste/ des der lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang por rgyal po byas so/ /de nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'o na bdag ni
172a7(dkon brtsegs): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chen po ga la ba der
172a8(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ des der lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang por rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan to/ /de nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas yun ring po 'das pa'i dus shig na 'di snyam du sems te/
172b1(dkon brtsegs): sum bcu rtsa gsum zhes bya ba'i lha ri rab kyi zom la gnas pa dag yod na/ bdag ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha ga la ba der 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan
172b2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas glang po rin po che'i bya la khar zhon te ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba gling chen po
172b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po ji ltar mthong / kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo dbyig pas 'phangs na yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du gling chen po bzhi
172b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'di yang yongs su 'khor bar mthong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba 'o na da dung glang po rin po ches 'gros ma phyung ngo / /yang rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis kha lo
172b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba gling chen po bzhi dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'di ji ltar mthong / kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gling chen po bzhi dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dag
172b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'gul zhing rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun du rab tu 'gul bar mthong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba 'o na da dung glang po rin po ches 'gros ma phyung ngo / /yang rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/
172b7(dkon brtsegs): kha lo sgyur ba gling chen po bzhi dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'di da ji ltar mthong / kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po da ni gling chen po bzhi dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang g.yo pa 'am
172b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa ma mchis par gnas par mthong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba da ni glang po'i rgyal pos 'gros bslang pa ltas ring po mi thogs par ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
173a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu ring po mi thogs par ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas rgyang ring po nas/ 'ong ba mthong ngo /
173a2(dkon brtsegs): /mthong nas stan gyi phyed la bdar te rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so/ /rgyal po chen po stan gyi phyed la bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang / rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas lha'i dbang po
173a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyi stan gyi phyed la 'dug ste/ des der lo brgya stong phrag mang por sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal srid phyed kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas yun ring po 'das pa'i dus shig
173a4(dkon brtsegs): na 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bdag gis brgya byin gyi stan thams cad la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang / des sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu stan phyed po de las nyams nas 'dzam bu'i
173a5(dkon brtsegs): gling du gnas par gyur te/ rgyal po pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi ra ba na 'khod pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i
173a6(dkon brtsegs): r in po che'i bskyed mos tshal du 'ongs shing de na 'dug pa mthong nas mthong ma thag tu myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa de na rgyal po dga' byed ces bya ba rgyal po
173a7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing 'dug pa la sbran to/ /rgyal po dga' byed des rin po che'i za ma tog gi bskyed mos tshal na lha'i mi zhig dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu gnas shes thos nas myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs su bzhon
173a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchog la zhon te/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa nas byang nas rin po che'i za ma tog gi bskyed mos tshal ga la ba der song ngo / /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin po
173b1(dkon brtsegs): ches rab tu brgyan pa na 'khod pa thams cad kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas rgyug par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dga' byed bzhon pa las babs te/ rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas ga la ba der dong nas/ des spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
173b2(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / bdug spos phul te/ gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas la khyod su zhig
173b3(dkon brtsegs): lags shes dris so/ /rgyal pos de la smras pa/ rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba zhig byung ba de khyod kyis thos sam/ rgyal po dga' byed kyis smras pa/ bdag gis rab tu 'ang thos te/ rgan rabs dag mchi na rgyal po
173b4(dkon brtsegs): grags pa mtha' yas shes bgyi ba 'khor los sgyur ba khyogs dang dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas te mtho ris su bzhud do zhes thos so/ /smras pa/ nga ni rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba de yin no/ /de nas rgyal po grags pa mtha'
173b5(dkon brtsegs): yas de mi'i gzi brjid kyis mig ma gang lte/ mi'i longs spyod mi bzod par gyur nas bying zhing mi gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na mar gyi gong bu 'am/ mar sar gyi gong bu bye ma tsha la ba la bzhag pa ni 'ju zhing mi gnas so/ /
173b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyang bying zhing mi gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po dga' byed kyi rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas de ltar bying ba de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyis legs
173b7(dkon brtsegs): par brjod pa ji skad gsungs shes mchi na/ bdag gis 'jig rten rnams la ji skad cig lung bstan par bgyi/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po grags pa mtha' yas ni gling chen po bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas shing bsam
173b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yid bzhin du grub la don med par ma gyur ba yang myong / shing thams cad yid bzhin du 'bras bu chags pa dang / gnod pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yid la bsams pa don yod pa dang / spos chu'i char 'bab
174a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lha'i yid bzhin gyi gos kyi char 'bab pa dang / dbyig gi char 'bab pa dang / gser gyi char 'bab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bab pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi char 'bab pa yang myong bar gyur nas gling chen po bzhi
174a2(dkon brtsegs): dag tu gnas te/ gling chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas nas brgya byin gyi stan phyed mnan pa las 'dod pa chen pos ma btang ste/ 'dod pas ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes rgyal po chen po khyod kyis lung ston
174a3(dkon brtsegs): cig / de skad ces smras nas rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du
174a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod dgos shing the tshom za na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur to/ /de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod
174a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu/ yul rnams ni rmi lam lta bu'o zhes de ltar rig par byas nas sems nges par bzhag par bya ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
174a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rnam pa las/ /sems ni mkhas pas bskyod byas te/ /chos kyi dbang phyug dga' ba la/ /sems ni yang dag nyid du gtang / /'dod pa'i dbang phyug spang byas shing / /chos kyi
174a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang la yid bzhag ste/ /sems gdul ba la rab brten na/ /nyon mongs rab tu tshar chod 'gyur/ /nyon mongs tshar bcad brten nas ni/ /las kyi lam yang chad par 'gyur/ /las kyi lam ni chad gyur na/ /
174a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi ni mchod rten 'gyur/ /'dod la kun nas nyon ma mongs/ /'dod pa'i nyes pa rab bstan te/ /sems can rnams la phan sems pas/ /de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya/ /'dod pa'i nyes pa thos gyur na/ /
174b1(dkon brtsegs): mi ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags las/ /sems sbyong byed pa thams cad mkhyen/ /de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya/ /sems can rnams kyi sdang spang pa/ /gang zag mchog gis rab tu mkhyen/ /sdang las sems ni grol mdzad pas/ /
174b2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya/ /sems can rnams kyi rmongs spangs pa/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog rab mkhyen te/ /rmongs las sems ni sbyong mdzad pas/ /de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya/ /sems can nga rgyal spang pa yang / /sems
174b3(dkon brtsegs): can kha lo sgyur bas mkhyen/ /nga rgyal dag las sems sbyong bas/ /de phyir mchod pa'i rten ces bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal
174b4(dkon brtsegs): po sa'i lha zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang /
174b5(dkon brtsegs): bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no/ /rgyal pos sa'i lha de'i pha ni rgyal pos 'byung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po sa 'byung de'i bu thu bo ni gzhon nu sa'i lha ste/ de nas rgyal po sa
174b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu sa'i lha rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rgyal pos sa'i lha de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po sa'i lha rgyal rigs spyi bo nas
174b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang bskur ba de gso sbyong gi nyi ma zla ba nya ba'i tshe skra bkrus te ras bcos bu sar pa bgos/ skra dang kha spu bcos/ phreng ba dang rgyan btags/ nor bu dang rna cha gdub kor btags nas khang steng na bud med kyi 'khor
174b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'dug 'dug pa dang / shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ 'od
175a1(dkon brtsegs): zer dang ldan pa/ 'od gsal ba/ 'phang du khru bdun yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos sa'i lha des sngon yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang gso sbyong gi nyi ma
175a2(dkon brtsegs): zla ba nya ba'i tshe zhes bya ba nas bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas thams cad gser las byas
175a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar dang ldan pa byung bar gyur ba dang / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha yin nam de la bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam
175a4(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal po sa'i lha stan las langs te/ gos phyogs gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lha'i 'khor

175a6(dkon brtsegs): po sa'i lha des lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de gos khye'u gtsang gis phyis te lag pa g.yas pas bskul nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye 'khor lo rin po che shar phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar gyis shig /de nas
175a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo rin po che de shar phyogs logs su gyur pa dang / shar phyogs kyi gnas rnams su de nyid kyi tshe sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi lam mnyam zhing shin du bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ rin po che bdun gyi
175a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las grub pa/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis gang ba byung bar gyur te/ de'i gshong du gyur pa'i phyogs rnams ni mtho bar gyur to/ /sgang du gyur pa rnams ni dmar bar gyur to/ /de'i khron pa dang / 'bab chu'i
175b1(dkon brtsegs): dong dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / chu klung skams pa rnams su ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ bsil ba dang / zhim pa dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / dang ba dang / dri nga ba med pa dang / 'thungs na lkog mar mi gnod pa dang /

175b5(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi rgyal po 'am/ grong rdal gyi mi 'am/ zhing pa de dag thams cad gser gyi gzhong pa dngul sil mas bkang ba dang / dngul gyi gzhong pa gser phyes bkang ba dag thogs te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de bsu zhing lha tshur
175b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs/ lha gshegs pa legs so/ /lha'i chags 'og tu mda' ba 'di dag ni 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs shing skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba ste/ 'di dag dang bdag cag la lha mnga' mdzad du gsol/ /de skad ces smras pa dang /
175b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nga la longs spyod 'di dag mi dgos kyis/ 'di dag khyed kyi longs spyod du gyur te nye bar 'tsho bar gyis shig /khyed 'di ltar nga'i rjes su 'brang bar gyis shig /
175b8(dkon brtsegs): gal te khyed kyis srog gcod pa spangs te/ ma byin par len pa spangs shing log par lta ba'i bar du spangs na nga yang bdag gis ni yul 'di dag las rgyal te/ mi gang dag mar 'dzin pa dang / phar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin
176a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa de dag ni nga'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no snyam du sems so/ /da phan chad khyed yul 'khor du chos ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang / mi rigs pa'i spyod pa 'dod par ma
176a2(dkon brtsegs): byed cig / de ltar byas na nga yang yul 'di rnams las rgyal zhing de dag kyang nga'i rjes su 'brang ba yin par sems so/ /de dag gis de la legs so zhes nas de bzhin du nan tan byed do/ /de'i lha'i 'khor lo rin po che des
176a3(dkon brtsegs): shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas te/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal nas mdun du shing rta'i srog shing btsugs pa ltar 'dug par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs su yang rgya cher rnam par rgyal bar
176a4(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ byang phyogs su byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chen po'i bar las rnam par rgyal bar byas te/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo'i steng du/ shing rta'i srog shing
176a5(dkon brtsegs): btsugs pa bzhin du 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po sa'i lhas 'khor lo rin po che bskor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la gling chen po bzhi pa thams cad rin po che'i rang bzhin bkra ba blta na sdug par gnas par gyur te/ rin
176a6(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /rgyal po sa'i lhas 'khor lo rin po che de bskor ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba
176a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyun chad par gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyis ris thams cad dang / mi khom pa thams cad kyang rgyun chad par gyur to/ /mi dge ba'i sgra
176a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang yongs su nub par gyur to/ /'di ltar rgyal po sa'i lha'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis gling chen po bzhi po thams cad du ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru yang byung bar gyur/ dpag bsams kyi shing
176b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung bar gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi nad kyi rnam pa yang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / kha zas mi za ba dang / rga ba gsum ma gtogs par thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba tshang
176b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ /sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal yang thams cad du mi mngon zhing mi gnod par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di dag dang gzhan yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba mtha' yas byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de nas
176b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po sa'i lha de 'di snyam du sems te/ mi'i 'jig rten na longs spyod 'di lta bu yod na longs spyod 'di bas rgya che ba dang / 'di las khyad par 'phags pa'i longs spyod gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam med snyam nas de 'di snyam du
176b4(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ bdag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha zhes bya ba ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa dag cig yod ces thos na de dag gi longs spyod de ci 'dra ba zhig yod snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po sa'i lha de 'dod pa de ma spangs
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mi'i longs spyod la ni smod/ lha'i longs spyod la ni smon cing 'di snyam du 'o na bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po sa'i lha des sems
176b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo la phyin par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po sa'i lha rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas 'di skad
176b7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras te/ rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so zhes stan gyi phyed la bdar te/ rgyal po chen po gang gi dus la dbab par mkhyen na stan 'di la bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang / rgyal po
176b8(dkon brtsegs): sa'i lha yang brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug ste/ des der lo brgya stong phrag mang por sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug phyed la dbang byas so/ /de yun ring po 'das pa'i dus shig na 'dod pa chen po'o/ /
177a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ kye ma bdag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi
177a2(dkon brtsegs): stan phyed las nyams nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong khyer bde ba'i khyim zhes bya bar gnas par gyur to/ /de lta'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa las 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par gyur bas mi'i gzi brjid mi bzod par gyur nas de bying
177a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po sa'i lha sa la 'bying ba na de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal srid dbang phyug rgya chen gyis/ /'dod la sred pa zhi mi 'gyur/ /me la rtswa shing ji bzhin te/ /de bas 'dod pa rnam
177a4(dkon brtsegs): par spang / /yun ring rgyud kyi 'dod pa la/ /bsten na ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /skom pas nyen pa tshwa chu la/ /rab tu 'thungs kyang yongs gdung bzhin/ /chu bo rnams kyis nam du yang / /rgya mtsho ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin
177a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa bsten byas na/ /gzhan yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /shing dang rtswa dag rab bsregs kyang / /me ni ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin 'dod pa bsten byas na/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ngoms mi myong / /me long ji ltar
177a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan gyis/ /nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin gzugs rnams bsten byas na/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ngoms mi myong / /brag ca ji ltar sgra rnams kyis/ /nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin
177a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra rnams bsten byas na/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod ngoms mi myong / /ji ltar spos snod spos rnams kyis/ /nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin dri rnams bsten byas kyang / /sna ni dri yis ngoms mi myong / /ji ltar
177a8(dkon brtsegs): gzar bu ro mchog gis/ /nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin lce ni ro mchog gis/ /nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rlung rnams kyis/ /nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin lus ni reg rnams kyis/ /
177b1(dkon brtsegs): nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na rmi lam rmis pa yi/ /chu 'thungs ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin chos la chags pa yi/ /yid kyang ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /sems can 'dod la sten pa ni/ /phyir zhing sred pa 'phel 'gyur
177b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ /yul la nye bar bsten byas na/ /'dod pas nam yang ngoms pa med/ /skom dang me 'dra'i 'dod pa las/ /sdug bsngal 'byung bar sus mthong ba/ /de dag sred pa zhir 'gyur te/ /me la chus ni blugs pa bzhin/ /rgyal po
177b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa'i lha zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po de nyid
177b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de tsam du che zhing tsam du yangs pa'i dbang phyug la dbang byas kyang dbang phyug gis ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir
177b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dbang po rnams ni ma ngoms shing ngoms par mi rung ba/ yul rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa ste/ dbang po rnams ni me long dang 'dra/ yul rnams ni gzugs brnyan dang 'dra/ dbang po rnams ni brag ca
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra/ yul rnams ni sgra dang 'dra/ dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma dang 'dra/ yul rnams ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba yin gyis/ rgyal po chen po khyod de la yid gzhag cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyis shig / //
177b7(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcwa lnga pa ste tha ma/ rgyal po chen po gzhan yang sngon gyi byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che la dbang che bar grags pa/ rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bo nas byung ba/ sngon
177b8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa mthong ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang po la chos dkar po yongs su bsgrubs pa zhig byung ste/ des
178a1(dkon brtsegs): gling chen po bzhir dbang phyug la dbang byas so/ /de 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can mi dang lha ji snyed cig 'dod pa la spyod par gyur pa de dag gi nang na rgyal po nga las nu de 'di ltar 'dod pa la
178a2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod pas mchog tu brjod do/ /de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grol rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
178a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang mad pa nye bar gyur/ grong rnams kyang bya gag gi 'phur stabs kyis son pa tsam du nye bar gyur to/ /'di ltar chos kyis gnas par gyur pas sa chen po 'di yang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing gser dngul mang po dang /
178a4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u dag gis mdzes par byas par gyur to/ /rgyal po nga las nu'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni grong khyer mi tshugs pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ shar nub tu chur ni
178a5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ lho byang gi zheng du ni dpag tshad bdun yod par gyur to/ /de ni bskal pa'i dang po la byung ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rigs chen por grags pas skyes pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi dang po'i grong
178a6(dkon brtsegs): khyer du gyur pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer chen po blta na sdug ces bya ba ni steng gi phyogs nas dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa'i bar du rgya cher te/ de bzhin du rgyal po nga las nu'i
178a7(dkon brtsegs): dpyid gnas pa ni zla ba 'char ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs bshams par gyur to/ /dbyar gnas pa ni bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang pa zangs bshams par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rnam par
178a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i khang bzangs lta bu'o/ /rgyal po nga las nu'i dgun gnas pa ni nyi ma'i 'od zer yang dag 'phags shes bya ba'i khang bzangs bshams par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i
178b1(dkon brtsegs): khang bzangs lta bu'o/ /rgyal po nga las nu khang bzangs zla ba 'char bar gnas pa'i tshe ni btsun mo dang bcas par 'di lta ste dper na tsan dan gyis bskus pa bzhin du lus bsil bar gyur to/ /khang bzangs bai dUr+ya'i snying por gnas pa'i
178b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'di lta ste dper na ta ma la'i lo mas bskus pa bzhin du lus dus dang ldan par bde bar gyur to/ /khang bzangs nyi ma'i 'od zer yang dag 'phags su gnas pa'i tshe ni 'di lta ste dper na a ga rus bskus pa bzhin du lus dro
178b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu'i bsam pa'i dbang gis khang bzangs de dag kyang nyams su bde ba'i reg pa 'byin par gyur to/ /bsam pa'i dbang gis rlung ldang bar 'gyur/ char 'bab par 'gyur/ rol mo
178b4(dkon brtsegs): mo'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa'i dbang gis skyid pa dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa'i rnam pa 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma bdag gi pho brang du zhag bdun
178b5(dkon brtsegs): du dbyig gi char 'bab par gyur cig snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu'i pho brang du zhag bdun du dbyig gi char bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nus zhag bdun po de
178b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas dbyig gi char bab pa de la 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du yongs su dag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas bsam pa yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa dmigs shing bsod nams dag kyang mi slu
178b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ngo snyam nas de yang 'di snyam du sems ste/ bdag gis gling chen po 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde zhing lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba la yang dbang byas/
178b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi khyim du ni zhag bdun du dbyig gi char bab na da ni bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan
179a1(dkon brtsegs): cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'dzam bu'i gling nas nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du phyin nas/ des der lo brgya stong phrag mang por mi'i las 'das shing lha rdzas su ma gyur ba'i longs spyod dang ldan
179a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po byas so/ /de nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling chen po de na gnas pa'i tshe yang sems bskyed ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling du bab pa bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du dbyig gi char bab par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal
179a3(dkon brtsegs): po nga las nu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor cing rgyas pa nas skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba'i bar la ni dbang byas/ bdag gi khyim du zhag bdun du dbyig gi char ni bab/ bdag gis nub kyi
179a4(dkon brtsegs): ba lang spyod kyi gling chen po la yang dbang byas te/ bdag gi khyim 'dir yang zhag bdun du dbyig gi char bab na shar gyi lus 'phags shes bya ba'i gling chen po yod kyis/ bdag ni gling chen po shar gyi lus
179a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags po ga la ba der 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas shar gyi lus
179a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags po'i gling chen por phyin par gyur te/ des der yang lo brgya stong phrag mang por mi'i las 'das shing lha rdzas su ma gyur ba'i longs spyod pa dang ldan par rgyal po byas so/ /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po
179a7(dkon brtsegs): nga las nus der yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po la ni dbang byas na da ni bdag byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chen por 'gro'o/ /
179a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i mi rnams ni nga yir bya ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang der song ste rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu de dpung gi tshogs yan lag
179b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas shar gyi lus 'phags po'i gling chen po nas byung gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chen por phyin par gyur te/ des der yang mi rnams nga yir bya ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med
179b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang du lo brgya stong phrag du mar bdag gi dpung gi tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan to/ /rgyal po chen po de nas lo stong mang po 'das pa zhig na rgyal po nga las nu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling la ni dbang
179b3(dkon brtsegs): byas/ zhag bdun du ni khyim du dbyig gi char bab/ bdag gis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling chen po la yang dbang byas/ bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling chen po la yang dbang byas/ bdag gis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling
179b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po la yang dbang byas na/ da ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya ba'i lha ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'khod pa zhig yod ces grag gis sum bcu rtsa gyi gnas su 'gro'o snyam du bsams so/ /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nus sems
179b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas ri rab kyi rtse mo la phyin par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chos bzang lha'i mdun sa zhes bya ba na 'dus
179b6(dkon brtsegs): shing 'khod 'khod pa las lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po nga las nu rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas stan gyi phyed la bdar te rgyal po chen po chur spyon/ rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so/ /gang gi dus la dbab par
179b7(dkon brtsegs): shes na stan gyi phyed la bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang / rgyal po nga las nu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi stan gyi phyed la 'dug go/ /rgyal po nga las nu brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug ma thag tu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams
179b8(dkon brtsegs): cad lha'i gnas bcus zil gyi gnan to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ lha'i tshe dang / lha'i grags pa dang / lha'i kha dog dang / lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang ba dang / lha'i gzugs dang / lha'i sgra dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i ro dang / lha'i reg dang /
180a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu ste/ de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin ma gtogs pa thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig 'dzums pa dang / mig mi 'dzums pa tsam las lha rnams kyis 'di ni rgyal po nga las nu'o/ /'di ni lha'i
180a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin no zhes bya bar shes pa ma gtogs par rgyal po nga las nu de dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnyis kyang gzugs mnyam par gyur/ spyod pa mnyam par gyur/ longs spyod mnyam par gyur te/ rgyal po chen po mir gyur pa
180a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lhar gyur pa gnyis lus mnyam par grub pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nus der lo brgya stong phrag mang por sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug phyed la dbang byas so/ /
180a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po nga las nus gling chen po bzhi ba'i dbang phyug dbang byas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal srid phyed la dbang byas kyang dbang phyug gis ma ngoms nas 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/
180a5(dkon brtsegs): kye ma bdag gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas
180a6(dkon brtsegs): nas nyams te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal mchog tu phyin par gyur to/ /de 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par gyur ba'i tshe phyogs thams cad kyang snang bar gyur te/ nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas 'di
180a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper zla ba'i 'od nyi mas zil gyis mnan pa lta bu'o/ /nyi ma nam mkha' la 'dug pa yang lham me ma yin te/ 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa nyi mas zil gyis non na mi
180a8(dkon brtsegs): snang ba bzhin no/ /de nas grong khyer mi tshugs pa'i pho brang dam pa na mi 'khod pa rnams kyis rgyal po de bskyed mos tshal der phyin pa mthong bar gyur to/ /mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de dag grong du dong nas kye grogs po
180b1(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di ltar lha'i bu zhig bar snang las babs te/ rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal 'dir phyin to zhes tshig tu brjod/ sgra bsgrags so/ /rgyal po chen po de nas yul 'khor gyi mi dang rgyal por bcas pas de skad thos nas myur ba myur bar
180b2(dkon brtsegs): rings pa'i gzugs su glu dang / rol mo dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dag thogs nas gtsang sbra'i spyod pas grong khyer de nas byung ste bskyed mos
180b3(dkon brtsegs): tshal de ga la ba der dong ngo / /rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu de bskyed mos tshal der 'dug ma thag tu sa chen po 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de nas yul 'khor gyi mi dang rgyal por bcas pa mi'i dri khyad
180b4(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pas rgyal po nga las nu'i drung du dong ba dang / /rgyal po nga las nu lha'i longs spyod la goms pas mi'i longs spyod mi bzod par gyur nas sa la bying zhing mi gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na mar gyi gong bu 'am/
180b5(dkon brtsegs): mar sar gyi gong bu bye ma tsha ba la bzhag na zhu zhing mi gnas pa de bzhin du yul 'khor gyi mi dang rgyal por bcas pas de bying bar gyur pa mthong nas khyod su zhig lags shes dris so/ /de nas rgyal po nga las nus rgyal po dang /
180b6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor gyi mir bcas pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed kyis rgyal po nga las nus zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de thos sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis rgan rabs dag las rgyal po nga las nu zhes bgyi ba zhig lus de
180b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu mtho ris su bzhud do zhes thos so/ /rgyal po nga las nus de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba de ni kho bo yin te/ mtho ris nas nyams nas
180b8(dkon brtsegs): lhung bar gyur to zhes smras nas/ rgyal po dang yul 'khor gyi mir bcas pa de dag gis glu'i dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcas pas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag rnams kyis rgan rabs las/ /mi yi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che/ /
181a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan bral zhing grags chen ldan/ /nga las nus zhes bya ba byung / /de ni khyogs dpung bzhon dang bcas/ /g.yog bcas mtho ris 'jig rten bzhud/ /mi dbang gtso bo lha gnas bzhugs/ /chos kyi sa yang skyong zhes
181a2(dkon brtsegs): thos/ /de smras mi yi bdag po de/ /mi rtag nyen te phongs par gyur/ /bde ba stor te sdug bsngal thob/ /rgyal po de ni kho bo yin/ /nga smras skye bo thams cad kyis/ /thal mo sbyar te rkang bar gtugs/ /rgyal po bdag cag ci brjod
181a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /ya mtshan ngo mtshar bka' stsal gsol/ /de smras rgyal po lha las nyams/ /sdug bsngal rnyed pa'i ngo mtshar nyon/ /yun ring bde bar 'dod pa yi/ /mis ni rtag tu bag yod bya/ /nga las nu ba rgyal po'i mchog /rgyal pos
181a4(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhir rab bstan nas/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod mchog ldan te/ /'dod pas ma ngoms de 'das so/ /de yi khyim du bzhag bdun du/ /dbyig gi dra ba'i char pa bab/ /gling bzhi pa la rab bstan nas/ /'dod pas ma ngoms de bying ngo / /
181a5(dkon brtsegs): lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyi/ /stan phyed la ni rgyal po 'dug /kun du rtog pa'i rtog pas brlag /bdag 'dod nga rgyal bcom nas rgud/ /mi mkhas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir/ /'gro ba dag tu yang nub ste/ /'dod pa rab tu bsten byas
181a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i ngoms mi rnyed/ /rmi lam rmis pa'i chu lta bur/ /'thungs kyang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams/ /bsten na ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo grogs ldan pa gang dag
181a7(dkon brtsegs): gis/ /shes pas mun pa rnams bsal te/ /ngoms par bya phyir bcom ldan gyi/ /'phags pa'i shes rab yang dag rtog /srid pa rnam bshig blo gros can/ /rga dang shi dang skye la rtog /sred pa rab tu spangs nas su/ /srid pa
181a8(dkon brtsegs): spangs te len mi byed/ /tshor ba'i rnam pa me 'drar rig /reg pa'ang mi 'drar rig nas ni/ /tshor ba 'phags pa ma yin dang / /reg pa de la sred mi byed/ /rol mo'i sil snyan brdungs pa ltar/ /yul dang dbang po mi byed de//
181b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bstan byed pa dbang po rtogs/ /rang bzhin mthong ba dbang po 'dor/ /skye mched drug po yod min yang / /gzugs dang 'brel bar yid bskyod do/ /rnam par shes par brtags pa'i phyir/ /tshor ba kun du rtog ces brjod/ /de ltar
181b2(dkon brtsegs): rig nas 'phags pa rnams/ /srid pa'i rgyud la yid mi rton/ /shes rab 'phags pas ngoms gyur te/ /shing med me bzhin zhi bar 'gyur/ /sred pa mi rtag bstan byas te/ /rgyal po yul 'khor mir bcas la/ /nga nus de
181b3(dkon brtsegs): skad lung bstan nas/ /mi yi bdag po nub par gyur/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du dogs shing the tshom za 'am/ nem nur du gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /
181b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug rgya chen po la dbang byas kyang 'dod pas ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus
181b5(dkon brtsegs): byas par gyur pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na de ltar rig par byas la dbang phyug gi dregs pa spangs te bag yod bya'o/ /bag yod pa la gnas te khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrubs par
181b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po bag yod pa la mngon par dga' ba ni don grub par 'gyur gyis rgyal po chen po bag yod par khams mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po 'dus byas kyi
181b7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams ni bud med ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin gyis/ rgyal po chen po 'di la khyod kyis sems nges par
181b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhag cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po
182a1(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa lhur len pa zhig byung ste/ de bya ba gang dang gang rtsom yang de dang de thams cad la bag yod par spyod cing byed do/ /rgyal po chen po rgyal po mu khyud de chos 'di dag thams cad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi
182a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa ste/ 'das pa'i dus na yang chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na yang chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bral ba'o zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la brtson par gyur to/ /
182a3(dkon brtsegs): des chos thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du mthong bas chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par gyur te/ des sems phyin ci log bzhis sems phyin ci log tu gyur cing mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes
182a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dag mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ni chos
182a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad stong par ma mthong bas/ /kye ma kyi hud 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phung ngo / /kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni rnam par phung ngo snyam nas 'di snyam du bsam te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag
182a6(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu bar bya'o/ /bdag gis de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdus na chos la sbyar ba la dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis thabs mkhas pa
182a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon du btang ste sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdus nas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gdams ngag gis bstan te/ kye sems can dag chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/
182a8(dkon brtsegs): kye sems can dag chos gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ 'das pa zhes gdags par
182b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bya ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po de nas sems can de dag rgyal po mu khyud des de ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bskul bas srog chags bye
182b2(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i
182b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod pa byung ste/ 'di ltar phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la thabs mkhas pas phyin ci log med pa yang dag par ston pa chos can chos kyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa mu khyud
182b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di su dag gi rgyal po yin pa'i mi rnams ni kye ma'o rnyed pa dang ldan pa ste/ kye ma mi rnams ni rnyed par legs par rnyed pa'o zhes zer bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos bzang lha'i mdun sa ga la ba
182b5(dkon brtsegs): der song ste phyin nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ khyed da ltar 'di na 'khod pa rnams gtam ci zhig byed byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i
182b6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po bdag cag chos bzang lha'i mdun sa 'di na mchis pa'i tshe bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod pa byung ste/ 'di ltar phyin ci log tu gyur
182b7(dkon brtsegs): p a'i sems can rnams la thabs mkhas pas gang 'di chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o zhes phyin ci ma log par ston pa chos can chos kyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa mu khyud 'di su dag gi rgyal po yin pa'i mi rnams
182b8(dkon brtsegs): ni kye ma 'o rnyed pa dang ldan pa ste/ kye ma'o mi rnams ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o zhes bgyis so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye grogs po dag rgyal
183a1(dkon brtsegs): po mu khyud ces bya ba de ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin na rgyal po mu khyud de 'dir 'ongs nas mthong bar khyed 'dod dam mi 'dod/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i dbang po rgyal
183a2(dkon brtsegs): po mu khyud de 'dir mchis te mthong bar bdag cag kyang 'tshal lo/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la smras pa/ ma ta li tshur shog /khyod lha'i shing rta cang shes rtsibs stong dang ldan pa khrid la rgyal po mu khyud ga la ba der
183a3(dkon brtsegs): song ste rgyal po mu khyud la 'di skad gyis shig / rgyal po chen po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shig rta cang shes rtsibs stong dang ldan pa 'di bkri ste mchis na rgyal po chen po thags thogs ma mchis par 'di la bcibs su
183a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni khyod mthong bar dga'o zhes gyis la shing rta la zhon pa dang 'di skad ces gyis shig /rgyal po chen po lam gang nas gshegs par bgyi/ gang gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i
183a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log gis nas bzhud dam/ phyin ci log ma mchis pa rnams kyi phyin ci log ma mchis pa'i sa nas bzhud ces bgyis shig /legs so zhes smras nas/ kha lo sgyur ba ma ta lis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar
183a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyen nas babs te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin rgyal po mu khyud la de skad ces smras so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po mu khyud kyis kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ma ta li de lta bas na lam de gnyis gnas
183a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dong ngo zhes byas pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba ma ta lis rgyal po mu khyud phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyi phyin ci log gis dang / phyin ci log med pa rnams kyi phyin ci log med pa'i sa de gnyis gnas drangs te dong ngo / /rgyal po
183a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la smras pa/ ma ta li de bas na phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sa bltas yud tsam zhig shing rta sdod du chug shig /de nas kha lo sgyur ba ma ta lis shing rta sdod du 'jug pa'i
183b1(dkon brtsegs): yun ji srid pa de nyid kyi bar skabs su rgyal po mu khyud kyis srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bcu de kho na nges par bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bkod par gyur te/ 'di ltar bag yod pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i phyir ro/ /de dag
183b2(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /kha los sgyur ba ma ta lis ni rgyal po mu khyud kyis las ci byas pa shes par ma gyur to/ /de nas kha lo sgyu ba ma ta lis de bzhin du dengs te/ rgyal po mu khyud dang ri rab kyi rtse mo la
183b3(dkon brtsegs): phyin to/ /de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis rgyang ring po nas nags tshal stug po rnam pa thams cad du sngo ba mthong ste mthong nas kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ma ta li nags tshal stug po 'di ni the tshom med par phyin
183b4(dkon brtsegs): ci log med pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnas yin no/ /ma ta lis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa lags te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang 'dir 'dus
183b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyal po chen po thags thogs ma mchis par bzhud cig / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni khyod mthong bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po de nas rgyal po mu khyud de thags thogs med par nang du song ba dang / lha'i dbang po
183b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas stan gyi phyed la bdar to/ /de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyang brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po mu khyud stan la 'dug par
183b7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas legs par shin du dga' bar byas te/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa 'jig rten du bzhag pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum
183b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag /rgyal po mu khyud 'di ni thabs mkhas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar skad cig tsam la srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bcu sangs rgyas kyi chos la btul bar gyur to/ /
184a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i dbang po bdag ni phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro bar 'dod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su
184a2(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya'o/ /brgya byin gyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod gang gi dus la dbab par mkhyen na bzhud cig de nas rgyal po mu khyud de phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin nas snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing thabs mkhas pa la shin du
184a3(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pas sems can bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la btul bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du the tshom 'am/ nem nur
184a4(dkon brtsegs): za na/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de ltar rgyal po mu khyud lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi stan phyed la dga' ba
184a5(dkon brtsegs): med pas mu khyud kyi bag yod pa'i stobs bskyed pa la ltos/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis bag yod par sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang gang zhe na
184a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gal te chos thams cad
184a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos lags na de lta na ni sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang dag phyin ci ma log pa de dag ni sangs rgyas so/ /rgyal po chen po
184a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni de kho na mthong ba'i tshigs bla dgas so/ /de kho na mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dwags so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /rgyal po chen po
184b1(dkon brtsegs): po chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba de ni gzhan du na ming tsam 'am/ brda tsam 'am/ tha snyad tsam 'am/ kun rdzob pa tsam 'am/ brjod pa tsam 'am/ gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par bstan par mi nus so/ /rgyal po chen po chos thams
184b2(dkon brtsegs): cad skye ba med pa 'di ni gzugs kyi sgo ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la ni chos thams cad mi g.yo mi 'gul zhing rlom sems med pas de'i phyir de ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /rgyal po chen po chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa de ni
184b3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la ni chos thams cad mi g.yo mi 'gul zhing rlom sems med pas de'i phyir de ni gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /de bzhin chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
184b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma skyes pa dang / rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med
184b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / btags pa med pa dang / kun nas dkris pa med pa dang / bag la nyal med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
184b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rjes su chags pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / bcings pa med pa dang / grol ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rgyug pa med pa dang / ldog pa med pa dang / dma' ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'dug pa med
184b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa dang / nor ba med pa dang / shes pa po med pa dang / rnam par shes pa po med pa dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / mi mthong ba med pa dang / tshul khrims med pa dang / tshul khrims ma yin pa med pa dang /
184b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa med pa dang / mi 'gyod pa med pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba med pa dang / mchog tu mi dga' ba med pa dang / dga' ba med pa dang / mi dga' ba med pa dang / shin du sbyangs pa med pa dang / shin du ma sbyangs pa med pa dang / bde ba
185a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mi bde ba med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa med pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin med pa dang / log pa med pa dang / yid byung ba med pa dang / yid ma byung ba med pa dang / 'dod chags dang
185a2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba med pa dang / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba med pa dang / lta ba med pa dang / lta ba ma yin pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba med pa dang / rnam par ma grol ba med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mi shes pa med pa dang / mthong ba
185a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / ma mthong ba med pa dang / las med pa dang / rnam par smin pa med pa dang / tshul bzhin med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa med pa dang / rnam pa'i sgo bdun bcu po de dag gis rgyal po chen po chos thams cad la
185a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma byung mi 'byung da
185a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na gzugs brnyen gyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
185a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na brag ca'i sgra'i rang bzhin ni ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
185a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu'i chu'i rang bzhin ni ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs
185a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na dbu ba rdos pa ni snying po med de/ ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /
185b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam gyi yul gyi bzang mo ni ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /
185b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma byung mi byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam gyi mo sham gyi bu'i skye ba ni ma byung mi byung da ltar yang med do/ /de
185b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la gnas med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par
185b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i bar du gnas med do/ /rgyal po chen po gzugs la ni skye ba med do/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med do/ / rgyal po chen po gzugs la ni 'gag pa med do/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du
185b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa med do/ /rgyal po chen po'i 'di lta ste dper na mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la skye ba 'am 'gag ba med do/ /de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do/ /rgyal po chen
185b6(dkon brtsegs): po 'di lta ste dper na chos kyi dbyings la skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/ de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do/ /rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
185b7(dkon brtsegs): yul te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul lo/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i spyod yul te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin/ phri ba ma yin/ bsnan pa ma
185b8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ thob pa ma yin/ stor ba ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ma yin/ mngon par ma shes pa ma yin/ yongs su
186a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma yin/ yongs su shes pa ma yin/ spangs pa ma yin/ ma spangs pa ma yin/ bsgoms pa ma yin/ ma bsgoms pa ma yin/ mngon du byas pa ma yin/ mngon du ma byas pa ma yin/ bstan
186a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ ma bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu ma bstan pa ma yin/ bsgrags pa ma yin/ ma bsgrags pa ma yin/ thos pa byas pa ma yin/ thos par ma byas pa ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/
186a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po gang bsnan par bya ba 'am/ dbri bar bya ba'i chos de mi dmigs te/ rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis med pa yin gyis/ rgyal po chen po 'di la
186a4(dkon brtsegs): yid yongs su dga' bar bya zhing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la ni gang rtogs pas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang
186a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas gdags pa bstan to snyam nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan
186a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs can/ kha dog du ma dang
186a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas rgyas par bkang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ phyir log nas bcom ldan
186a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo
186b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa po/ /dpa' chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'jig rten snang ba mdzad pa po/ /'dzum pa'i 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
186b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa po/ /rgyu gang gis ni 'dzum bstan pa/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams la ston/ /bdag gi the tshom myur du khum/ /shAkya'i tshogs kyi don slad du/ /go'u ta mas ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ /dpa' bo 'gro ba dga' mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i the tshom
186b3(dkon brtsegs): bsal du sol/ bsam gtan chen po khyod kyi gsung / /thos na 'gro ba'i the tshom 'chad/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i yid gyur te/ /kun kyang khyod kyi bstan pa 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i 'dzum gyi phrin las 'di/ /khyod kyi sras rnams 'tshal gyur
186b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ /nan tan gyis ni rab nges shing / /shes pas rjes su mchi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog khyod kyis ni/ /'gro ba'i the tshom 'di bsal gsol/ /'jig rten the tshom chad gyur na/ /bde ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /de skad ces gsol
186b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /ngas ni 'dzum zhing gang mdzad pa/ /rta thul de ni nga las nyon/ /shAkya rnams kyi blo nges pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin lung bstan to/ /chos rnams
186b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med par ni/ /shAkya rnams kyis yang dag shes/ /de phyir sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /'di dag yid ni nges par bzhag /dmigs su med la brten nas ni/ /shAkya grags pa chen po pa/ /chos rnams kun la nges gyur
186b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /shAkya nges pa 'di dag ni/ /mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du/ /'od dpag med kyi drung du 'gro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /bde ba can na gnas pa'i
186b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ /sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la/ /phyogs bcu dag tu mchod byed 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rnams ni khams gcig na/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs rnams bsnyen bkur byed/ /sems can kun la phan tshol zhing / /byang chub
187a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu smon lam 'debs/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod byed cing / /zhing nas zhing du rnam par 'gyur/ /gang du sangs rgyas 'byung bar yang / /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'dod par 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /
187a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod nas/ /de yi 'og tu 'dren par 'gyur/ /de tshe sangs rgyas re re zhing / /sems can khrag khrig mang po dag /byang chub phyir ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /sangs rgyas
187a3(dkon brtsegs): dgongs la 'gro ba 'dul/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rnams na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston/ /de na sangs rgyas gang yang ni/ /nyan thos 'dul bar yong mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas de dag re re zhing / /de ni tshe tshad 'gyur ba ni/ /
187a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba grangs med lo rnams su/ /chos ston pa dag gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngan yongs 'das nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras dag lo grangs ni/ /bye ba stong du dam chos 'dzin/ /mi dbang
187a5(dkon brtsegs): sras po de dag kyang / /stong pa nyid kyi chos bstan pas/ /sems can bye ba bsam yas dag /byang chub la ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /bag yod pa yi mi rnams ni/ /bag yod pa la gnas bcas te/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos bsten
187a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis shAkya yi/ /bu yi 'gro bstan 'di thos nas/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten dgar gyur te/ /byang chub phyir ni yid kyang btang / /shAkya lung bstan pa'i
187a7(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' mthar phyin pa
187a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsgrags par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gang zag med pa ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang ma dmigs so/ /gang ma dmigs pa de ni mngon par rdzogs par
187b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs ma rgyas so/ /gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa de ni ma bstan pa'o/ /gang ma bstan pa de ni ma shes so/ /gang ma shes pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams
187b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bstan pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi rnga chen po yin gyis/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di gzung ba dang bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par
187b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de sha ri'i bu khyod la yongs su gtod do/ /sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du pha rol du phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha
187b4(dkon brtsegs): rol du phyin pa dang bral bar spyad pa bas/ sha ri'i bu gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di tha na thos par gyur kyang de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /sha ri'i bu gang gis bskal
187b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu'i bar du mnyan pa bas gang gis sems can gcig cig la 'di bstan na de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du mnyan te gzhan la bsnyad pa bas gang gis se gol
187b6(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa tsam du 'di bsgoms na de nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /shA ri'i bu de bas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams nan tan
187b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis gdams par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di bsgoms pas ni myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu gang bla
187b8(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ /
188a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan
188a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos
188a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las de kho na nges par bstan pa yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / dA na
188a4(dkon brtsegs): shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
188a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu bdun pa ste gang pos zhus pa/ bam po dang po/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pUr+N+Na pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
188a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mang po
188a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med tshad med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo
188a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la zhu ba cung zad cig mchis na de bzhin gshegs pas
188b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse bar dgongs te rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ byams ma'i bu gang po khyod ci 'dod pa dris shig /ngas yang dag par bstan nas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /tshe dang
188b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni yon tan mchog mngon par bsgrubs pa/ grags pa shin du mtho zhing rgyang ring ba/ rtag par sems can gyi bde ba yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
188b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du zhu ba mchis lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ yon tan mchog ni rab bsgrubs nas/ /grags pa mtho zhing rgyang ring dang / /tshul
188b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims gtsang zhing chos mos pa'i/ /spyod pa gang lags bdag zhu lags/ /ji ltar sems ni spyod par bgyid/ /ji ltar sbyin pa rgya cher btang / /ji ltar sems can rab sgol cing / /dga' sems rtag tu lam sgom lags/ /
188b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das la byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi slad du dngos po de lta bu dag zhu ba lags na byang chub sems dpas/ ji ltar mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen
188b6(dkon brtsegs): po lta bur bsags pas yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur lags/ ji ltar mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur lags
188b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ mang thos rgya mtsho lta bu tshol/ /chos la nges pa'i don thob nas/ /byang chub lam ni legs rtogs 'gyur/ /ji lta bur na tshig gcig gis/ /tshad med
188b8(dkon brtsegs): don ni rab rtogs te/ /'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs 'gyur lags/ /mang thos mthar thug ma mchis pas/ /rgol ba mchis kyang sems mi g.yo/ /snying brtse slad du chos bstan
189a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /sems can the tshom gcod bgyid lags/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni sa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis de bzhin
189a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la zhu ba gsol ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su ldog par mi 'gyur lags/ de nas yang tshigs su
189a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa/ ji ltar mi khom yongs spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas mang po phrad gyur lags/ /sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang / /shin du dang ba myur 'thob lags/ /bla med dang ba thob gyur nas/ /shin du btang dka'
189a4(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad yongs su btang nas kyang / /stobs kyis thogs med lam spyod lags/ /ji ltar rab 'byung mos gyur nas/ /dben gnas stong pa'i ye shes sgom/ /ji ltar chos dang 'gal mi bgyid/ /dngos
189a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di ni bkas bshad gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa
189a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi pha rol du byon pa dang / khams gsum na mchog tu gyur pas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i ye shes chen po gya nom pa brnyes nas chos rnams la spyod pa thogs pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud
189a7(dkon brtsegs): pas na de'i slad du deng bdag dngos po 'di dag zhu ba lags so/ /de nas yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bcom ldan yon tan mchog bzhugs pas/ /rdzu 'phrul pha rol rab tu byon/ /thogs pa mi
189a8(dkon brtsegs): mnga'i mkhyen brnyes pas/ /dpa' bo khyod la bdag zhu lags/ /chos rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas/ /yon tan mtho zhing mngon par 'phags/ /mun bcom shes rab snang bskyed pas/ /'khor mang
189b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dga' bar mdzad/ /dgra zin byams sdang mi mnga' zhing / /mya ngan mi mnga' slu mi mnga'/ /'chi bdag las ni rab rgyal zhing / /bdud dpung bdag ni pham par mdzad/ /mtshon cha thogs pa mi mnga' bar/ /
189b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra rnams thams cad pham par mdzad/ /rtag par byams pa'i thugs ldan zhing / /tshul khrims rnam dag brtan par gnas/ /bcom ldan g.yo sgyu mi mnga' zhing / /nga rgyal mi mnga' dregs mi mnga'/ /rnam
189b3(dkon brtsegs): grol rig pa brnyes pas na/ /yon tan kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /ji ltar sngon ni lam sbyang nas/ /mkhyen pa mchog ni brnyes pa dang / /ji ltar spyad nas sangs rgyas pa/ /bdag la deng ni bkas bshad gsol/ /
189b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dngos po de lta bu dag zhus pa de legs so legs so/ /shin du legs par nyon la yid
189b5(dkon brtsegs): la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed na ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
189b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ngas deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /rab tu brtson pa'i stobs dag gis/ /byang chub lam spyad bshad par bya/ /byang chub
189b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spyad pa yi/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs kyis/ sangs rgyas lung ni bstan gyur pa/ /dngos po de dag mdor bstan to/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas chos mos sems/ /tshad med mtha'
189b8(dkon brtsegs): yas yod ma yin/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ston byed pa/ /dngos po gcig gis 'grub mi 'gyur/ /dga' sems nang ni rab rgyas pas/ /sbyin pa dag ni gtang bar byed/ /sbyin pa gtong yang 'gyod med pas/ /
190a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/ /sems can rtag tu rgud pas na/ /mang du thos pa'i nor mi ldan/ /bdag gis btsal bya snyam du sems/ /sems can rtag tu rgud pa yang / /le lo'i
190a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang las gyur pas na/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus rab bskyed de/ /byang chub thob bya snyam du sems/ /bdag gis sems can ched du ni/ /yid bzhin bzod pa rab bskyed de/ /tshig ngan sma 'bebs brdegs gyur kyang / /lan yang mi smra snyam
190a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ /bdag la sma 'bebs su zhig yin/ /sma 'bebs dmigs par mi 'gyur bas/ /sma 'bebs khong khro byed pa yi/ /dngos po thams cad stong snyam sems/ /de ltar yid la sems pas na/ /sems la khong khro khon 'dzin
190a4(dkon brtsegs): med/ /rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms pas na/ /des na mngon par 'tshang yang rgya/ /sems can dge sems med pa la/ /'jig rten sgron ma byas nas ni/ /mgon dang skyabs ni byed pas na/ /nor med nor dang ldan par byed/ /sems can
190a5(dkon brtsegs): lam log spyod pa ni/ /de dag snying brtse'i gnas yin pas/ /bdag gis yongs su bzlas nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das la gzhag snyam sems/ /sems can thams cad rgud pas na/ /shes rab nor dang yong mi ldan/ /bdag gis thams
190a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen thob nas/ /de dag tshim par bya snyam sems/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/ /sems bskyed byang chub tshol ba na/ /de 'dra'i smon lam 'debs par byed/ /bcom ldan
190a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgyu rkyen rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can la chos ston par byed kyang chos 'ga' tsam la yang gnas
190a8(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad la yang dag par bslabs nas de'i 'og tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung
190b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas chos gzhan gang yang dngos po 'di las lhag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom par
190b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po dang po zhes bya'o/ /khong khro'i sems can nan po che dag gi nang na bzod pa sgom par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po gnyis pa zhes bya'o/ /sems
190b3(dkon brtsegs): can lam log pa la spyod pa dag mthong nas bdag nyid yang dag pa'i lam la brtson par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po gsum pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can 'khor ba las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam
190b4(dkon brtsegs): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi pa zhes bya'o/ /gang po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems
190b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po mchog ces bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can le lo can mthong na/ /brtson 'grus sems ni skyed byed pas/ /bdag gis de
190b6(dkon brtsegs): la chos min pa'i/ /dngos po bstan snyam yong mi sems/ /khong khro ston par mi byed de/ /khong khro sangs rgyas lam min zhes/ /rtag tu byams sems sgom pas na/ /byang chub de las skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can lam
190b7(dkon brtsegs): log mos pas na/ /log pa'i lam la gnas par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag lam/ /btsal nas sems can 'god par byed/ /'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas na/ /rtse gcig sangs rgyas ye shes
190b8(dkon brtsegs): tshol/ /bla med gter ni thob par 'gyur/ /sems can bzla bya snyam du sems/ /rmad byung dngos po 'di dag las/ /lhag pa'i gzhan ni su yang med/ /de lta bas na thogs med chos/ /'thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /
191a1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi gos ni tshig pa dang / /mgo thod me ni 'bar ba bzhin/ /le lo'i sems ni skyes gyur na/ /myur ba nyid du sel bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang po byang chub sems
