260a4(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen/ /spyod pa gang dang ji ltar lam 'byung dang / /tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur pa/ /de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen/ /'dod
260a5(dkon brtsegs): chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong / /gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang / /gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las/ /'gro bas legs par bgyis dang nongs bgyis mkhyen/ /
260a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang / /da ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang / /gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin/ /bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ /dag pa'i zhing
260a7(dkon brtsegs): dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang / /drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad/ /rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen/ /mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas
260a8(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra dang / /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang / /der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba/ /de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen/ /dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi/ /ye shes mkhyen pa
260b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug / chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/ /phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la/ /khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag /skar ma rnams kyis nam mkhar spras
260b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ltar/ /mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa/ /mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi/ /lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid/ /
260b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams/ /khyod kyi spyan snga de dag mdzes ma lags/ /khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'/ /dbu snum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas/ /lhun po'i rgyal po lta
260b4(dkon brtsegs): bur spyi gtsug 'phags/ /bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs/ /'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing / /khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes/ /'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang
260b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa/ /spyan ni ud pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi/ /zla nya dri med mkha' la ji lta ba/ /rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste/ /lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /zhal bzangs mi yi mchog la phyag
260b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ /ngang pa rma bya ri dgas rgyal gyi stabs/ /glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis/ /sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs dang / /stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
260b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes/ /sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras/ /bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lhang ngar rig cing sleb/ /sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo dra bas khyab
260b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhabs 'dor bas/ /sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs/ /zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i/ /mi rnams gum nas lha'i 'jig rten mchi/ /chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po/ /chos kyi sbyin
261a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /chos kyi spyad pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa/ /'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog /tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi
261a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ /de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa/ /nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par 'gyur/ /rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol/ /grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel/ /
261a3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba/ /bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston/ /gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing / /'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /gnas mchog zhi ba
261a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma bgyis pa de/ /thugs rjes brnyes nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal/ /thub pa chen po'i 'jig rten mchog bstod pas/ /bdag gis 'dir ni bsod
261a5(dkon brtsegs): nams gang bsags des/ /'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar
261a6(dkon brtsegs): te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
261a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
261a8(dkon brtsegs): la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /'di skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris ma
261b1(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
261b2(dkon brtsegs): to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa thob/ myur ba'i
261b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'thob/ spobs pa rnams par nges pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong pa dang / som nyi
261b4(dkon brtsegs): spong pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po dag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi
261b5(dkon brtsegs): khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang
261b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rab nges pa/ /yang dag nyid du ji ltar de byung dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam
261b7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa/ /mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad tu gsol/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu/ /sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa/ /khyod ni skyabs dang gnas
261b8(dkon brtsegs): dang dpung gnyen lags/ /byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs/ /gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi/ /ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis skye bo'i dogs pa gcod
262a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag /'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lta bgyid kyang / /skye bo'i blo ni nam yang me skyed cing / /de dag don dge ston
262a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / /dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / /tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang / /sems can chad kyi bka' mchid bla med dang / /byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol/ /bdud 'joms
262a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa ltar na spyod pa po/ /sred pa skems pa rnam grol rig mdzad pas/ /chos kyi tshul yang bskyud par mi 'gyur bar/ /sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol/ /gzugs dang long spyod spobs
262a4(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs/ /snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzad pa/ /bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan
262a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung 'byin pa/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi blo ngan rab 'jig pa/ /chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis/ /gtso bo bdud rtsi'i ro yis tshim par mdzod/ /byang chub dam pa mchog la 'dun
262a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mchis/ /chos la 'dun pa bzlog pa mi rigs te/ /'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags/ /rin chen dam pa bsgrags pa'i dus la bab/ /thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis/ /bdag
262a7(dkon brtsegs): gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen/ /rgyal ba co 'dri ma lags don du gnyer/ /spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
262a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong khyod la legs so/ /yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba
262b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar
262b2(dkon brtsegs): sems pa ni legs so/ /yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol to/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
262b3(dkon brtsegs): skyong bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su dag
262b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag 'thob bo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ji skad
262b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo/ /'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la
262b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya'o/ /bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa/ /byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa/ /g.yo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa/ /ye shes mtha' yas ldan la de dag yod/ /
262b7(dkon brtsegs): skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba/ /sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba sgrol ba'i phyir/ /de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor/ /nges pa
262b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la sems mnyam pa/ /bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lta/ /'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol lo zhes/ /gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o/ /
263a1(dkon brtsegs): stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud/ /bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin/ /'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la/ /byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs/ /mkhas pa de dag ji
263a2(dkon brtsegs): skad tshig smras pa/ /de la nan tan byed cing kun du gnas/ /dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
263a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag
263a4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o/ /'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /gang gis sangs rgyas
263a5(dkon brtsegs): kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba/ /gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thob/ /nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel/ /de dag ye shes chags
263a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin/ /byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/ /de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag
263a7(dkon brtsegs): la sten pa ma yin te/ tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong / /dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas/ /de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung / /
263a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
263b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /
263b2(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong rjes su 'thun pa'i chos thos pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub
263b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i
263b4(dkon brtsegs): chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so/ /'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /gzi brjid
263b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun du de dag mthong / /byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshe na sems can dgrol ba'i phyir/ /
263b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod/ /'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyang nyan/ /thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu
263b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor/ /dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang / /'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de mi skyed/ /de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun
263b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin med/ /slong ba gnyer bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'/ /grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang / /thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du 'ang g.yo ba
264a1(dkon brtsegs): med/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong
264a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o/ /'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /
264a4(dkon brtsegs): skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta/ /yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul/ /de dag gang du 'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris
264a5(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la dri ma bral/ /de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur ma thob yid zhum med/ /'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu dang
264a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos spangs/ sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin/ /lus dang
264a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te/ /bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor/ /lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med/ /
264a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
264b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung
264b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang 'thun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa
264b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so/ /'di la
264b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing / /tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung / /de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom
264b5(dkon brtsegs): yin mi sems/ /tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor/ /de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed/ /de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med/ /gzugs kun rtswa
264b6(dkon brtsegs): dang shing dang brtsig pa 'dra bar mthong / /'di la skyes pa bud med bdag ni med par mthong / /'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med/ /bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas
264b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sbyor/ /thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer/ /skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad kyis gzir gyur pa/ /'gro ba
264b8(dkon brtsegs): mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas/ /zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbyar te/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed/ /'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyams
265a1(dkon brtsegs): pas skyabs mgon dang / /dpung gnyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis/ /bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes/ /de phyir byang chub mchog tu
265a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis smon lam btab/ /yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro thob ste/ de yang sangs rgyas 'byung
265a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang phrad pa dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed de/ de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/ de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba
265a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / spobs pa thob ste/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o/ /'di la 'di ni chos nyid
265a5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas par byed/ /de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min/ /chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin/ /zab
265a6(dkon brtsegs): mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral/ /rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed/ /de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag spyod/ /bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par
265a7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya cher byed/ /grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur/ /lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la
265a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems can 'dzud/ /dge ba bcu po dag la 'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dgar 'gyur te/ /de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar gyur/ /
265b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grol/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
265b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par
265b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni
265b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub
265b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa na/ /tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med/ /de ni su la 'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin/ /g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med/ /khyim gyi blo gros ya nga mya ngan rtsa/ /skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin
265b6(dkon brtsegs): ring 'gyur ba/ /spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas/ /thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/ /dgon pa bas mtha'i rnams pa bstan pas na/ /shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rton cing / /lus dang srog la 'ang
265b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bar mi byed la/ /seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal/ /byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na/ /ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing / /rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni/ /
265b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no/ /dper na bse ltar gcig bu gnas byed cing / /seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin/ /ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton/ /de ni mchod pas khengs par
266a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med/ /g.yang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /rab tu thar par bya phyir 'bad par byed/ /gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na/ /bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen
266a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing / /sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med/ /rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas/ /stong pa nyid
266a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma med la mos/ /'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog /yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'/ /de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu/ /ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed cing / /de ni
266a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bsam pa yongs su spyod/ /gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na/ /yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bltas nas/ /gang zhig don du
266a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyer de dgar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/ /blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyed/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste/ bzhi gang zhe
266a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la sten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul
266a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong rnyed pa bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'
266a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'phags
266b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la/ /de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yi/ /de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yon can te/ /rtag tu kun du ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs/ /rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste/ /de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo
266b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor dga'/ /kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang / /'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra/ /de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste/ /glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/ /de dag zhing gi las dang tshong
266b3(dkon brtsegs): la dga'/ /de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin du ring / /phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i/ /dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba/ /de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang / /phrag dog dbang gis
266b4(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di nub par byed/ /byang chub lam las rtag par shin du ring / /'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin du ring / /'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni/ /de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam par
266b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams
266b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems
266b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
266b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan
267a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ma dad le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems/ /de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu khro/ /bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang
267a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro tshe dbyug pas rdeg / pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phrag dog skye/ /de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin/ /glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can/ /su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam/ /de dag nga yi bstan pa
267a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di las ring / /de dag yon tan dngang zhing ngan song gzhol/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/ /ngan song shin du mi bzad 'bar bar 'gro/ /de dag rnams kyi sdig pa spyod pa dang / /chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'di
267a4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ /rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor/ /ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/ /bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/ /da ltar dal ba dam pa rnyed
267a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la/ /gal te thar 'dod bag med spong bar gyis/ /yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba ste/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes
267a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byung chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i
267a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byung chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya
267a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing / /gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa/ de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel/ /
267b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na mkha' la zla ba yar ngo bzhin/ /dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang / /bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag /de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang / /gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer/ /gang dag mi mchog rnams
267b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhi ba'i chos/ /'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thun spong ba/ /de dag dper na ngan skyugs rdzab bzhin spang / /gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags/ /rtag tu khyim la 'dris
267b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed brtson pa/ /de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste/ /de dag me yi 'obs bzhin spang bar bya/ /gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang / /'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang / /de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod
267b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya/ /gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang / /grags dang mtshang 'dru phrag dog gang spangs te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/ /
267b5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
267b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa
267b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal
267b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
268a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/ /de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na/ /des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/ /ya nga bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol/ /
268a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod/ /gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la/ /bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing / /sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min la/ /chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med/ /bslab dang sbyangs pa
268a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de mi mos/ /sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa/ /de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs/ /dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam/ /
268a4(dkon brtsegs): yi dags 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed/ /gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing / /mi yi dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa/ /de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te/ /byang chub lam ni rtag tu
268a5(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bya/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig
268a6(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la sten par byed pa byang chub
268a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o//
268a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing / /rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom/ /ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te/ /glang po
268b1(dkon brtsegs): lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin/ /khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang / /gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems/ /ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa/ /mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings/ /gang shig
268b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'di dag dang / /skye rga 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod pa/ /brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni/ /byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod
268b3(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ /bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas/ /sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang / /brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin drug sa dang yon tan dang / /stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes
268b4(dkon brtsegs): la spyod/ /yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas/ /rga ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyod tshe/ /sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du/ /sbyin dang dul dang des la
268b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sbyar/ /gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur/ /bas mtha' nags su rtag par nga dga' ste/ /byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs/ /brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur/ /skyes chen rnams kyi
268b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes de 'dra'o/ /srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas/ /sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni/ /sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed/ /'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs/ /bskal
268b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing / /rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug /phangs pa'i srog dang shin du 'byor sa dang / /grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang / /me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i/ /nags
268b8(dkon brtsegs): su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur/ /ka ling rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad/ /de tshe nga ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur/ /nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i/ /thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na/ /mi yi dbang pos sra
269a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mdas bsnun kyang / /yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur/ /legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nas/ /lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur/ /ngas ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir/ /
269a2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to/ /stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir/ /lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas/ /nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan
269a3(dkon brtsegs): pa legs bshes bsgrags/ /gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na/ /sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe/ /rin chen ched du rgya mtsho skams nas ni/ /nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas/ /rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes
269a4(dkon brtsegs): byar gyur te/ /rjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe/ /nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya/ /bsad par byas pa myur du thar par byas/ /dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas/ /nga yis phangs pa'i
269a5(dkon brtsegs): lus ni btang byas te/ /nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas/ /de tshe nga ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur/ /nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni/ /rang gi lus las sha yang bcad
269a6(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ /rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang / /rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe/ /sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du ni/ /mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang / /srog btang nas ni de dag
269a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la byin/ /'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na/ /rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe/ /chung ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba/ /bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang / /gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes byar gyur
269a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ /nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang / /bya dka' brgya bcu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas/ /nor dang dpal yang sngan chad ngas btang ngo / /rgyal bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe/ /nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten
269b1(dkon brtsegs): mdun/ /mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas/ /nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi bzad mig can khros par gyur nas ni/ /de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pa na/ /de tshe
269b2(dkon brtsegs): nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin/ /nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar gyur tshe/ /grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo/ /thams cad du yang rgya che sman gyi rnams/ /de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go/ /srid pa rnams na
269b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang gi tshe/ /nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na/ /bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis/ /lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas/ /gang tshe nga sngon mi yi rgyal po ni/ /rin chen gtsug pud gyur
269b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe me tog dang / /spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi/ /cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo / /nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe/ /shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa lta bu dang / /pad ma'i 'dab
269b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i/ /lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo / /ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa na/ /snying rje med cing mi bzad rab gtum pa'i/ /srin mo brgya dag shin du tshar bcad nas/ /rgya shug
269b6(dkon brtsegs): gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur/ /gang tshe mig bzangs shes byar gyur pa na/ /byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/ /srin mo dag la na chung 'du shes pa/ /tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar par byas/ /gang tshe
269b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na/ /lha'i bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa'i/ /bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung / /sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na/ /dri med dag pa'i
269b8(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi mdog can gyi/ /rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na/ /sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang / /rgyal po ud pal mig ces byar gyur tshe/ /pad ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig /yid du 'ong
270a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing snying du sdug gyur pa/ /'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas/ /sman pa'i rgyal po skra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe/ /sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni/ /bud med cha byad gzugs la blo nyams pa/ /ngas ni
270a2(dkon brtsegs): snying rjes yongs su thar par byas/ /sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa ni/ /nad kyis btab pa'i nad pa'i mi mthong nas/ /nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te/ mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas/ /rgyal po
270a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog bzang zhes byar gyur tshe/ /nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni/ /nad kyis ring par gyur la rkang byin te/ /ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo / /rgyal po don grub ces byar sgor gyur tshe/ /rang gi
270a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing / /phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste/ /phongs par gyur ba'i mi ni thar bar byas/ /rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe/ /byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /
270a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad ma lta bu yi/ /lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin/ /rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe/ /snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod do/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /
270a6(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas/ /rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe/ /'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla/ /dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni/ /rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no/ /bud med
270a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe/ /bud med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas/ /gser ltar ser zhing shin du gzhon pa yi/ /nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyis ga btang / /rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na/ /
270a8(dkon brtsegs): shin du nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog dang / /rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon/ /gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma gtang / /rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral/ /rin chen phyir ni de
270b1(dkon brtsegs): yis nga mig phyung / /'on kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do/ /srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe/ /srog sbur dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur dogs nas/ /lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang ba byas/ /de tshe nga yi sems ni
270b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba med/ /spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na/ /rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste/ /nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'/ /nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med/ /skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis
270b3(dkon brtsegs): mi/ /snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste/ /gdol ba'i mi yis mnga' rnams bsnun kyang ni/ /spre'ur gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo / /rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni/ /glang po bla ma rgan dran lus
270b4(dkon brtsegs): bskams te/ shin du yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos/ /de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur/ /bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur/ /nga yis zhag bdun par du bsrungs pa'i mi/ /de yis gsod pa
270b5(dkon brtsegs): nga la btang byas kyang / /ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med/ /kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur/ /byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol/ /dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni/ mchod
270b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dam pa byin gyi khros pa med/ /dum bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba/ /sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe/ /mthong ba tsam gyis me ni zhi gyur nas/ /lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams
270b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang gtor/ /ri dgas gyur tshe gang gA'i brlabs shugs kyis/ /khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa/ /de yis gsod pa nga gan khrid de 'ongs/ /'on kyang de la nga ni yid ma khros/ /rgya mtsho'i dbus su son
270b8(dkon brtsegs): te mgon med pa/ /tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas/ /bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsad gyur tshe/ /ru sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan/ /nga ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ /sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i
271a1(dkon brtsegs): nyar gyur tshe/ /sems can phan phyir rang yis lus btang ste/ /srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur/ /srog chags des par gang tshe gyur pa na/ /nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas
271a2(dkon brtsegs): su/ /lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te/ /sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas/ /ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe/ /mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rjes ldan/ /mda' yis bsnun kyang
271a3(dkon brtsegs): khros pa'i sems med de/ /de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas/ /dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du/ /nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe/ /srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams/ /nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed
271a4(dkon brtsegs): nas bsgral/ /'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe/ /mdab chags ku na lar ni nga gyur tshe/ /'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas/ /bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur/ /gel ba'i nags gnas
271a5(dkon brtsegs): ri bong gyur pa'i tshe/ /legs spyod ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan/ /thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa/ /de yi ched du ngas ni lus kyang btang / /sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe/ /sdong po
271a6(dkon brtsegs): skams kyang ngas ni de ma btang / /de tshe brgya byin byas gzos nga mthong nas/ /sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas/ /nga ni spra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste/ /spra yi
271a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton to/ /nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir/ /sA lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas ni/ /ne tso ci phyir nga yis sA lu len/ /lo tog
271a8(dkon brtsegs): smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam/ /ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol/ /bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len/ /pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir/ /de la snying rjes bdag gis sA lu
271b1(dkon brtsegs): blangs/ /gang tshe thog mas sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe/ /'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes/ /de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te/ /des na bdag ni rku bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /ne tso legs so sA lu ci dgar khyer/ /
271b2(dkon brtsegs): srid zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na'ang dkon/ /khyod ni mi yi nang 'dir dud 'gro yin/ /legs so khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams/ /byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na/ /sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams/ /
271b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang / /nga yi yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med/ /nang gi dag gam 'on te phyir yang rung / /nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med/ /tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /
271b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab ngas spyad do/ /sha dang lpags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag /de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas/ /bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe/ /ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas/ /
271b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi/ /sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/ /sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te/ /sngon spyod tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug /spyod pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa/ /brtul
271b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang / /spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams/ /tshe gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni/ /bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur/ /de dag zas
271b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing / /rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang / /bstan pa sun 'byin byed cing yon tan nyams/ /zhi ba'i chos ni thos par gyur pa na/ /
271b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes zer/ /nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur/ /mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin/ /de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang / /sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas/ /
272a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi/ /bla med ni dpag med yon tan chung / /nges kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyi/ /'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ba yin/ /gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang / /rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med
272a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ /tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la/ /gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /gal te theg pa chen po yod na ni/ /'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med/ /gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs
272a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i blo dang mu steg ngan mtshungs pas/ /rang gi blo yis rang bzod byed pa ste/ /dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni/ /tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ /
272a4(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang / /khwa ltar spyi brtol che la rgod gtum zhing / /phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi/ /dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing / /chos gos
272a5(dkon brtsegs): grwa rnams kyang ni skyog par byed/ /chos gos thogs shing chad dang rgyags myos nas/ /grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu/ /de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /khyim na gnas pa'i skyo bo sten par byed/ /
272a6(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas/ /de dag rtag tu phrin yig khyer bar byed/ /de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang / /de dag phyugs dang bran pho bran mo srel/ /zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la/ /brtson yid ldan
272a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin/ /de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi smra med/ /bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med/ /de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni/ /dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor de mtshungs/ /dge slong yon tan
272a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byor ba mthong nas ni/ /de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed de/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa slu ba zhugs nas ni/ /bud med 'jigs byed mi bzang rab ces rjod/ /rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar/ /khyim pa 'dod
272b1(dkon brtsegs): pas brkam pa de ltar min/ /khyim pa mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang / /bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang / /las dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba/ /de yi chung ma la ni yongs
272b2(dkon brtsegs): chags shing / /nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min/ /'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te/ /dud 'gro yi dags dmyal bar ltung byed cing / /de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing / /de dag bdag nyid ma
272b3(dkon brtsegs): dul nyer zhi min/ /ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba/ /de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul/ /kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed/ /bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon
272b4(dkon brtsegs): tan phyir min te/ /de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin/ /'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor/ /de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni/ /bdag gis snying rjes 'di
272b5(dkon brtsegs): dag sdud byed kyi/ /slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni/ /rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra/ /de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang / /lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug /rtag tu 'phags min mi dag
272b6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig kyang / /'ongs shing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur/ /lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams/ /de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson/ /de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/ /de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing
272b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs/ /de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang / /'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag rang nyam rang dbang 'gro ba ste/ /lcags kyo btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra/ /de dag nags su gnas par 'gyur
272b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni/ /sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ /nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la/ /de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang / /bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs
273a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang brjed nas ni/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te/ /de dag mi bzad mnar med ltung bar 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing / /rkun po'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'/ /nye du
273a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed/ /bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/ /rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson/ /gnas la brkam zhing kho gnyer 'byin par
273a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba/ /nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla/ /bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/ /dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes 'thun pa/ /gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/ /gang
273a4(dkon brtsegs): dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/ /chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson pa/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/ /de dag rnams ni sdud par mi byed do/ /'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste/ /
273a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nga yi lhan cig gnas pa'i yin/ /'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa'i yin/ /khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song / /'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/ /mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/ /
273a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song / /de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/ /nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ /de dag khyim pa lta bur stsogs 'gyur zhing / /'tshog
273a7(dkon brtsegs): chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag /kun du smad pa byas par gyur nas ni/ /de dag nga yi tshig ni dran gyur te/ /bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas/ /kyi hud rnyed
273a8(dkon brtsegs): pas zil non yon tan sdang / /dge slong mang po gang du byang gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag /ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyis dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag /rtag par yongs su
273b1(dkon brtsegs): brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams/ /spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur/ /'byed dang zur zer thab mo dga' ba dang / /yon tan nyams la rtag tu sti stang byed/ /de dag skye bo'i
273b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par grags 'gyur te/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur/ /'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/ /'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang / /
273b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas subs pa dang / /pad ma'i rdzing bu yongs su skams pa dang / /rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar/ /phyi ma'i dus na
273b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos/ /rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin du mi bzad tshe/ /dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba/ /de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin/ /spyod pa 'di la bsten par
273b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba rnams/ /de dag bzang 'gro ga la yong de ring / /'di nas shi 'phos yi dwags 'gro ba dang / /dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas/ /lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/ /mi bzad
273b6(dkon brtsegs): drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed kyang / /rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag sten pa/ /long ba 'am 'on pa 'am zhar par skye bar 'gyur/ /
273b7(dkon brtsegs): lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa sten pa ni/ /de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te/ /de yi tshig la yid ches
273b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur/ /de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs/ /mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun/ /bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs/ /
274a1(dkon brtsegs): yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/ /des pa rnams kyi sdig pa spyod 'or la/ /legs par spyod la rtag tu bstan par gyis/ /'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re/ /
274a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang / /bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur ba/ /gnyen dang brnyed dang grags rjod spang byos la/ /de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis/ /'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta
274a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / /'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang / /sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing / /'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la/ /pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ /rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par
274a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ /ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa/ /de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// //yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
274a5(dkon brtsegs): phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la
274a6(dkon brtsegs): sti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la/ zang zing dga' bar 'gyur zhing chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du
274a7(dkon brtsegs): lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la
274a8(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur
274b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos
274b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba byed pa dang ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod
274b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i
274b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag
274b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i
274b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yang mi smra na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig / de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i
274b7(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' khob pa'i nang du skye ba dang dbul ba'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen phrad pa
274b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / nad mang ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas 'che
275a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la byang chub ces nga mi smra'o/ /tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa nga mi smra'o/ /zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes
275a2(dkon brtsegs): nga mi smra'o/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /shes rab 'chol ba la the tshom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mi
275a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro 'thob ces nga mi smra'o/ /khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga
275a4(dkon brtsegs): mi smra'o/ /spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /tshod mi shes pa la chos
275a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o/ /yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod
275a6(dkon brtsegs): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan smra la gzhan du byed pa'o/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /yang
275a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/ /ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che/ /nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas/ /de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring / /chags pas zil gyis
275a8(dkon brtsegs): non na le lo 'phel/ /le los zin gyis non na dad pa nyams/ /dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams/ /tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/ /dbul por gyur pas rab tu
275b1(dkon brtsegs): byung gyur te/ /mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar gyur/ /de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su/ /gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/ /rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro/ /der song
275b2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol/ /mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/ /rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song ba/ /mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po
275b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / /dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang / /mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin/ /de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos/ /bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams/ /g.yang sa chen po mi bzad
275b4(dkon brtsegs): ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bskal ba bye bar thar pa med/ /gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na/ /de phyir lhas byin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/ /rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltar/ /chags pas
275b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so/ /bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags/ /tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/ /byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob/ /de dag bstan la ma dgos
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dur shing bzhin/ /byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba/ /dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so/ /de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar/ /nga rgyal zin non byang chub de 'dra'o/ /byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig
275b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ /nga yis rang gi phangs pa'i srog kyang btang / /chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/ /don med gyur nas bstan las ltung bar 'gyur/ /ngas ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir/ /g.yang sa chen pe me lce 'bar bar
275b8(dkon brtsegs): mchongs/ /de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/ /thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas/ /bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/ /de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skyed na/ /chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod/ /dper na long
276a1(dkon brtsegs): ba lam gsal med dang mtshungs/ /yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa tshad med par gyur pa de'i
276a2(dkon brtsegs): dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
276a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug
276a4(dkon brtsegs): stong la rgyal srid byed do/ /yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe di'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do/ /yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i
276a5(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rab rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs ris su bris pas mdzes par byas pa yod do/ /
276a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang
276a7(dkon brtsegs): po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po khang bzangs kyi nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te/ yul
276a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag btson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas thar par gyur to/ /
276b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi
276b2(dkon brtsegs): gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod par gyis shig /mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig /gzhon nu mi rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro
276b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin gyis/ 'jig rten pa'i pha rol la 'jig par blta bar bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur
276b4(dkon brtsegs): ta re/ /bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re/ /bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing / /bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang dmad/ /des pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing / /legs sdom dga' la ser sna med
276b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan/ /de dag ring po mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang / /'di ni da ltar dag dang gang ma byon/ /de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags/ /
276b6(dkon brtsegs): bag yod lam nyid la yang shin du gnas/ /bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang / /gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyan/ /bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang / /byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer/ /rkang pa lag pa de bzhin
276b7(dkon brtsegs): rna dang sna/ /slong ba rnams la rab tu bgos byin na/ /byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas/ /de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang / /nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ /'dus
276b8(dkon brtsegs): byas gar la lta dang sgyu ma 'dras/ /'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis/ /srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo/ /'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can/ /brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min/ /gzhon nu 'di la rtag mang
277a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ma yin/ /ngan 'gror ltung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni/ /pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med/ /mi yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa/ /de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/ /don
277a2(dkon brtsegs): med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/ /khyod kyi mi phan ma byas ci yang med/ /don med nyid du ngal ba bsten par gyur/ /da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi/ /mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/ /rkang dang sha dang lpags
277a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de bskams kyang / /de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ /zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin du dka'/ /bsgrim par byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /
277a4(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs bsten cig /sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ /de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed/ /lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed/ /brtson 'grus shin du brtan pa legs byos
277a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ /lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i snying gi bsam gtan bar/ /sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis/ /sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/ /kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa/ /tshol ba'i tshe na spyod
277a6(dkon brtsegs): yul dgon par dga'/ /khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs/ /dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen/ /skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la/ /lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par/ /bde
277a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis/ /yul 'khong skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de ni bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang rgod
277a8(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur/ rtses par ma gyur/ dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang bskyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/
277b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pur sems shing gnas par gyur to/ /nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med
277b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang 'bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par
277b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis bdag gis cang mi smra bar 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag
277b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs shin tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang gi yongs su lam srang
277b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang bla re dang ldan pa rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po
277b6(dkon brtsegs): che'i srog shing stong btsugs so/ /rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to/ /rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag rlung gis bskyod
277b7(dkon brtsegs): de bskul na 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ lang tsho dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os
277b8(dkon brtsegs): su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin mtshan du glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya
278a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig / sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra shig ces bsgo'o/ /lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod
278a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/ gos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lam dang / rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor
278a3(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shi rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyod pa'i phyir rin po
278a4(dkon brtsegs): che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas
278a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ /de'i nang du khang bzangs zhig byas te/ der gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so/ /de'i dbus su bskyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang /
278a6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dad ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel
278a7(dkon brtsegs): lo/ /gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so/ /rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab po/ /me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so/ /khor
278a8(dkon brtsegs): yug tu rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to/ /dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so/ /rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams
278b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sbrel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bsgul na 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon nu'i lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg
278b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'ong zhes rdzing de'i stong rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe khang bzangs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to/ /gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
278b3(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur ba'i khri rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to/ /khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog por nas a ga
278b4(dkon brtsegs): rus bdugs shing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed do/ /gser gyi lda ldi bres so/ /gser gyi pad ma rab tu sbyangs so/ /mu tig dang nor bu'i dra bas bres so/ /nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so/ /
278b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu sbyangs so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya spyangs so/ /bskyed mos tshal kun du yang nor bu rin po che 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par
278b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang pa dang /
278b7(dkon brtsegs): ngur pa dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping ka dang / shang shang te'u rnams 'khod do/ /de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon
278b8(dkon brtsegs): nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to/ /de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu
279a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu drug lon na lo nyi shu lon pa'i skyed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do/ /thams cad bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang
279a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to/ /pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba byin no/ /nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang /
279a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sha stag go/ /thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa/ /glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas
279a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gar mkhas pa/ gong mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/ drang ba/ gzhon pa/ mnyen pa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba
279a5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba/ kha nas me tog ud pa la'i bsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan dan
279a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/ shin du yid tu 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so/ /glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi
279a7(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed do/ /de de'i tshe 'di lta ste dper na gsad par bya ba'i mi mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed
279a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza'
279b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs kyi
279b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to/ /de nas bu mo de dag gi rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha gzhon nu ni mi rol
279b3(dkon brtsegs): to/ /dgyes par mi mdzad do/ /dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// // bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od
279b4(dkon brtsegs): zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing 'dar te mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to/ /de sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu cig rin
279b5(dkon brtsegs): chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smros/ /nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel/ /su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros/ /de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos bcad par bya/ /khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang
279b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ /lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros/ /brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/ /pad ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag
279b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos/ /mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses/ /ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug /de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan
279b8(dkon brtsegs): lag snyan/ /glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes/ /khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /pad ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir der lus dman/ /me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas bskyed mos
280a1(dkon brtsegs): tshal/ /sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra/ /soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin/ /dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis/ /khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams
280a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yang 'dra/ /ud pa la dang pad ma dag gi tshal gyis gang / /pad ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan/ /de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed/ /ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang / ka la
280a3(dkon brtsegs): ping ka shang shang te'u dang kun la/ /yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye spos ngad ldang 'dra ba/ /thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug /gser dang bai d+'ur+yas
280a4(dkon brtsegs): spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra/ /rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/ /gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa/ /zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra sgrogs pa/ /khyod kyi ched du srang rnams
280a5(dkon brtsegs): su yang sbyin rgya che/ /bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir/ /rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis bu khyod
280a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ma byed/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba/ /bu mo de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis/ /khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ /
280a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer/ /yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa/ /'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /thar pa don gnyer pa la smras pa yab
280a8(dkon brtsegs): gson cig / lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis/ /bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags/ /nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa/ /sdug pa thams cad dgra dang
280b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs te rjes mi srung / /mi mkhas byis pa skye bo de dag bud med dga'/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching pa g.yang sa che/ /rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad/ /sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir
280b2(dkon brtsegs): bsten/ /bud med 'di dag lpags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam/ /bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer/ /khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'jog /gsal ba dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga'
280b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi/ /dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid/ /kun du rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis/ /ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs
280b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khol/ /shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na/ /dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags/ /mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te/ /srog g.yor gyur kyang gti
280b5(dkon brtsegs): mug gis ni bag med gyur/ /sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus/ /srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod/ /'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su/ /'di na ji ltar lhun
280b6(dkon brtsegs): po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin/ /rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min/ /bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/ /sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar
280b7(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur bag yod mdzod/ /mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung / /srog kyang ri'i chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung / /'dus byas 'di zab glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung / /rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags
280b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mang / /lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig /byang chub sems dpa'i yul la chags pa min zhes bskul/ /'jig rten phan pa snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi/ /rgyal po bag med spyod la byang
281a1(dkon brtsegs): chub yod ma lags/ /rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba/ /de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog /'tshe ba shin du rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi/ skon par bcug
281a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur/ /khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra/ /zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs/ /rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra'i lus/ /
281a3(dkon brtsegs): chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'/ /rab tu gsal gnas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / /'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/ /rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang / /gnyid log
281a4(dkon brtsegs): sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang / /zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur du sbyar/ /stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas/ /legs par bshad
281a5(dkon brtsegs): pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi/ ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ /long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i khri shing bskam par bgyi/ /rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas/ /de yis srid
281a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gar la lta ba 'drar mthong 'gyur/ /byams dang snying brtse snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin/ /sems can don 'grub lhag mthong glog gi phreng ba dang / byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis/ /'gro ba yun
281a7(dkon brtsegs): ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi/ /rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te/ /bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis/ /byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir sbyang bgyi/ gcig tu
281a8(dkon brtsegs): nges te bdag ni sred la dga' ma mchis/ /rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas/ /blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ /mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung / /byang chub lam
281b1(dkon brtsegs): shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun zlog pa/ /rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus/ /lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro yi/ /bdag 'dir
281b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min/ /rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs gcig myur du bzhud/ /yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol/ /gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar
281b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma 'gas/ /bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang / /grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus/ /dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes
