281b4(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de
281b5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so/ /khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad la
281b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la 'gro ba dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba
281b7(dkon brtsegs): thos so/ /thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad
281b8(dkon brtsegs): de smras pa/ /lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar bgyi/ /su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhud/ /tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni
282a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam/ /don grub
282a2(dkon brtsegs): blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyis skyabs/ /de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog /de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa/ /bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa/ /
282a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni rgyal ba blta 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra/ /de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig /ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba/ /byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dir
282a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ /de yi gtsug gtor ri yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin/ /dbu skra 'jam zhig mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/
282a5(dkon brtsegs): de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ltar lham me ba/ /nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud pal sngon po 'dra/ /mi dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i sgros/ /
282a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed/ /stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems/ /de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag /bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang
282a7(dkon brtsegs): rmad byung legs par grub/ /rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi/ /de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khebs/ /rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don/ /shin du tshim byed 'brel cing
282a8(dkon brtsegs): gya gyu med pa ste/ /tshangs dbyangs shin du snyan pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba/ /yid gnyis 'jom pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa/ /rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa/ /yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan
282b1(dkon brtsegs): lag 'thun/ /chos kyi phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab rgyus pa/ /sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba/ /mi ci ka la ping ka khu byug ngur pa dang / /rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku na la yi sgra/ /tshangs
282b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra/ /ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa/ /rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba/ /skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur bar sbyong ba dgar
282b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /gzhan gyi spyod dang 'thun pa zhus na tshim byed pa/ /chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di/ /ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum/ /dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun
282b4(dkon brtsegs): yang mtho/ /phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum/ /rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog /ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes/ /lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang
282b5(dkon brtsegs): sbubs rta yi 'dra/ /rang byung e n+ya'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla/ /zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtshan/ /glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stobs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stobs/ /khyu mchog
282b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyings pa'i stobs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas/ /mkha' las me tog char bab me tog gdugs su gyur/ /gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos/ /rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug
282b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /pad ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med/ /mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyas
282b8(dkon brtsegs): b u gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
283a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / /
283a2(dkon brtsegs): des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba ya nga ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag
283a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa dmad
283a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs
283a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las
283a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig
283a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga'
283a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa/ rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can/ bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags
283b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga
283b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'gyur snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyis par chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas mthur du mchong ngo snyam mo/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon
283b3(dkon brtsegs): nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad
283b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
283b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyis 'od zer la reg go/ /'od de las kyang pad ma 'dam ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung
283b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to/ /pad ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
283b7(dkon brtsegs): n ams kyi 'od zer pad ma de la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la
283b8(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du rjod pa ched tu brjod do/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa 'gyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
284a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
284a2(dkon brtsegs): pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas ldongs/ /tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do/ /ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis 'thab
284a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni/ /mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te/ /thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na/ /mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur
284a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta bu/ /lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig /ldongs par gyur ba'i mig tu deng gyur cig /dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan/ /g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig /dbul
284a5(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod/ /mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng dgrol mdzod/ /som nyir bcas pa'i yid gnyis bcad du gsol/ /byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston/ /chus khyer bdag la
284a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gram ni bstan du gsol/ /mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol/ /rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung / /khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar
284a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzod/ /srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis/ /mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol/ /srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung / /dge ba bar
284a8(dkon brtsegs): chad mang po 'byung ba ste/ /bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub/ /bdag gis ngal ba don rnyed gcig des gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub
284b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mchog spyad pa/ /'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las mthar 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
284b2(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya
284b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzungs thob bo/ /mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ /mngon par gtor to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas
284b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i
284b5(dkon brtsegs): zhal/ /gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis/ /mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang / /
284b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi gtsug gtor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin/ /gtsug gtor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/ /kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar/ /thugs rje
284b7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa/ /spyan mchog bzang po ud pal sngon po 'dra/ /rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong
284b8(dkon brtsegs): yang khebs/ /chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar mdzad/ /'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshems bzang shin du brtan pa rdo rje 'dra/ /bcu dang sum bcu snyoms shing thags bzang
285a1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ /'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro la 'dul bar bgyid/ /bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/ /'jig
285a2(dkon brtsegs): rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag / bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du brlag /e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das/ /glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs/ /bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs
285a3(dkon brtsegs): shing gshegs/ /sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /khyod kyi lpags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra/ /'gro bas gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /
285a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/ /khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad/ /khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ /sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/ /mchog tu
285a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ /khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan/ /khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/ /mtshungs med ye shes
285a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/ /khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs/ /khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/ /mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal
285a7(dkon brtsegs): lo/ /thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag /pad ma chus ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/ /khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la ping ka'i skad/ /srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis
285a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / /gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang / /bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med/ /chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen/ /stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /ma shes pas
285b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur te/ /thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis/ /de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/ /'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis/ /skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag
285b2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs te/ /bde gshegs sems can brgyad dag yongs 'grel cing / /zla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/ /sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas/ /rtag tu na pa'i
285b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rnams gzigs nas ni/ /thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu/ /dud 'gro yi dags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ /'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/ /glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis
285b4(dkon brtsegs): mgon ma mchis/ /de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad/ /gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ /'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/ /chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba de dag
285b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog /tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/ /dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog /sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung pa
285b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ /bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis/ /yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung / /de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag /theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/ /
285b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni/ /rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi 'thob/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/ /phyug cing nor che 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/ /mtshungs med khyod la dad pa bskyed pas ni/ /
285b8(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba mchog /'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa/ /rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni/ /tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig
286a1(dkon brtsegs): rten bdag po dang / /yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang / /gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/ /mnyam med khyod la mchod dang
286a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / /thos pa 'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te/ /gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa/ /'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las
286a3(dkon brtsegs): bzlog / bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral 'god pa/ /bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i/ /bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te/ /byang
286a4(dkon brtsegs): chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/ /yongs su dag cing mdzes pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i zhing du lus dang
286a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag yid kyis/ /sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs/ /yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang / /'gro ba kun gyi
286a6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gter 'thob 'gyur/ /khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i phreng ba ni/ /bde bar gshegs rnams
286a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor du rtag par sgrogs/ /rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/ /mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa/ /bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dgyes pa/ /mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
286a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/ /dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te/ /dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye/ /lha dang mi
286b1(dkon brtsegs): dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs/ /yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog /yul 'khor skyong
286b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ngu ba'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga'
286b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed ci'i phyir du/ de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas
286b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'od zer ldan pa gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong
286b5(dkon brtsegs): khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
286b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
286b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi cha ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom
286b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod
287a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/ sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur/ /skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /yon tan ye
287a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod sku sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag /lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag /rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam la gser gyi kha dog
287a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra/ /blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas sti stang mdzad/ /sngon chad mchod sbyin
287a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad/ /des na khyod sku bzang zhig shin du mdzes pa lags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod
287a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sbyangs/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags/ /chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags/ /'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston/ /chu zla 'dra zhing
287a6(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags/ /rang gi phyogs rnams kun du rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi chad ni gda' ma lags/ /khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par
287a7(dkon brtsegs): gda'/ /'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni/ /dpa' bo yul gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad/ /thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs/ /bcom ldan
287a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa 'ang mdzad pa ste/ /sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun bor gda' ba mdzad/ /nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin du lta/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung
287b1(dkon brtsegs): yang phyung / /thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang / /yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang / /kha cig tu ni bud med nang na
287b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs par gda'/ /yab dang yum dang sa dang bud med rnams kyang btang / /gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par rgyal zhing du/ /sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas/ /nags
287b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas gnas gcig po nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad/ /khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang / /zhing na bdud 'dul bar yang gda' ba ston par mdzad/ /sngon chad 'khor lo bsam
287b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang / /khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad/ /rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /mya ngan 'da' zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu
287b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung / /rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ /khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung / /khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med/ /thub pa khyod
287b6(dkon brtsegs): sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung / /kun du spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur
287b7(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang / /thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa 'am byon ma lags/ /sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro
287b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa/ /lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod ni legs par gsung / /bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/ /mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad
288a1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ /mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig /bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams dam pa gang sgrubs des/ 'jig
288a2(dkon brtsegs): rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob bar shog / yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang
288a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
288a4(dkon brtsegs): pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
288a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur bas gnang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs de dag dang
288a6(dkon brtsegs): bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig /de dag
288a7(dkon brtsegs): gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la
288a8(dkon brtsegs): phul lo/ /ro bro ba bkang ba lnga brgya ba'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to/ /dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis
288b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i tshogs bshams pa steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub pa/ me tog pad ma dkar po'i
288b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyi de nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig
288b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so/ /de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i
288b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so/ /bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid
288b5(dkon brtsegs): la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la yang mi lta na dngos po gzhan lta la smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thams cad kun du bzang ste de bzhin
288b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de la lan gnyis su ma zhus so/ /bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus/ rkang pa ma bkrus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do/ /za na za ba dang

288b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad

289a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so/ /mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so/ /mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo/ /mchod rten thams cad

293b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la gus pa dang bcas shing ri mo byed pa dang bcas pa/ chos don du gnyer ba/ chos 'dod/
294a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ chos la gzhol ba/ chos la 'bab pa/ chos la bab pa/ chos srung ba/ chos sbed cing gnas pa / chos kyi grags pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa la gnas pa/ chos kyi
294a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang du gyur pa/ chos yongs su tshol ba/ chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i mtshon cha dang ldan pa/ chos kyi bya ba byed pa de 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
294a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la chos kyi bgo bsha' bya'o snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/ khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos
294a4(dkon brtsegs): la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba ni gal te
294a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ theg pa chen po pa
294a6(dkon brtsegs): dag mthong na de de la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas shing ldang bar brtson pa/ bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa yin te/ de yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pas 'di
294a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang nyan thos kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir chos bstan to
294a8(dkon brtsegs): snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de de dag la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pa yin gyi de dag la dga' bar ni mi byed de/ de ltar na khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin
294b1(dkon brtsegs): no/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / dam bcas pa mi 'jig pa dang / snying rje chen
294b2(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su mi gtong ba dang / theg pa gzhan la mi dmigs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang
294b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la skyabs su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la brten cing bsnyen te bsnyen bkur byed cing sti stang du byas nas chos nyan pa dang / chos thos
294b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang ji ltar khong du chud pa rnams gzhan dag la yang ston cing yang dag par rab tu 'chad pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla
294b5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim
294b6(dkon brtsegs): pa chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dag par skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa dang / gang zang zing
294b7(dkon brtsegs): gis sdud par byed pa de dag chos kyis bsdu ba la sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rton kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la rton pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan yang yongs su tshol la/
294b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i rnam par grol ba la mos pa yang ma yin pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim
295a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /chos thos nas chos rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni chos la skyabs su
295a2(dkon brtsegs): song ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthong nas byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes su dran pa ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na
295a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par smon cing sbyin pa sbyin pa ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /sbyin pa de bla na
295a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ni skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams
295a5(dkon brtsegs): byed cing skyes bu ngan pa'i las rnams mi byed do/ /khyim bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las yin gyi skyes bu ngan pa'i las ma yin pa rnams gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos kyis longs spyod
295a6(dkon brtsegs): tshol gyi chos ma yin pas mi tshol lo/ /'thun pas tshol gyi mi mthun pas ma yin no/ /yang dag pas 'tsho ba yin gyi log pas 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de chos kyi longs spyod thob pa de dag gis gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed de/
295a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom pa mang zhing snying po len to/ /'di lta ste/ pha ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yang dag par longs spyod dang /
295a8(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la bkur sti dang / gong du yang chos la 'dzud pas gtong ba 'phel bar byed do/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni 'di
295b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi phung po lnga'i khur khyer bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dor bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir
295b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba/ bdag bde ba la mi chags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa/ rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags
295b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pas de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / rnyed pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas mi snyims pa dang / rnyed pa dang / grags pa
295b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / brjod pa'i sgra'i snyan pa med pa la yi mi chad pa dang / shin du brtags te las byed pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa kun du srung ba dang / log par sgrub pa la yid mi mos pa dang / mi gnas pa'i blos 'byung ba mthong ba dang /
295b5(dkon brtsegs): shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu'i sems med de/ ji ltar dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi bya ba byed pa dang / rang gi bya ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / gzhan la byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs
295b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi re ba dang / gnod pa byas pa la sha mi ldon pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par 'ged pa dang / stobs dang
295b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams la nga rgyal bcag pa dang / 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs par dbugs 'byin pa dang / mya ngan gyis nyam thag pa rnams la mya ngan gyi zug rngu sel ba dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len
295b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang / bla ma rnams la gus pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten pa dang / mkhas pa rnams la kun 'dri ba dang / lta ba drang ba dang / g.yo med par spyod pa dang / sgyu
296a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bcos ma med par sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / dge ba gang yin zhes tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / mang du thos pa la chog mi shes par byed pa dang / brtsams pa rnams la yid
296a2(dkon brtsegs): dam brtan pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / mdza' ba brtan pa dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang /

296a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang / lus la mi gtsang ba 'du shes pa dang / srog la zil ba'i thigs pa ltar 'du shes pa dang / longs spyod la sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu lta bur 'du shes pa dang / bu dang chung ma la sems
296a5(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba mnar med par 'du shes pa dang / zhing dang khyim gyi las kyi mtha' dang gos rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa la phongs pa'i sdug par 'du shes pa dang / yongs su tshol ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par
296a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par 'du shes pa dang / khyim gyi gnas la gshed ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang / mdza' shes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la sems can dmyal ba'i srungs mar 'du shes pa dang /
296a7(dkon brtsegs): nyin dang mtshan du bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ces yongs su 'jal bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang / snying po
296a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa yin no/ /de la snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gzhan gyi bya'o cog bya bar spro ba dang / bla ma rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag
296b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa'i las byed pa ste/ 'di ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/

296b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/ gang ser sna'i sems tshar gcod cing gtong ba chen po'i sems 'phel bar byed cing sbyin pa yang dag par 'god pa ste/ 'di ni snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams

296b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi nyams pa yin no/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi yongs su bzung nas des srog gcod pa spang bar bya ste/
296b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyug pa dor ba dang / mtshon cha dor ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / srog chags 'byung po thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin can dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rang /
296b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu byams pa la gnas par bya'o/ /des ma byin par len pa spang bar bya ste/ bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang / chags sems dang brnab sems med
297a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa med pa dang / tha na rtswa dang lo ma yang ma byin par mi blang bar bya'o/ /des 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang bar bya ste/ rang gi chung mas chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma
297a2(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa med pa dang / ma chags pa'i mig gis blta ba dang / yid byung ba'i yid dang / 'dod pa dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du ma chags pa yid la byed pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de gang gi tshe rang gi chung ma la 'dod
297a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba de'i tshe yang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas na des rang gi chung ma la mi sdug par rjes su blta ba dang / skrag pa yid kyis 'dod pa bsten par bya'i/ zhen pas zin bzhin du ni ma yin pa dang /
297a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi gtsang bar 'du shes pas des ci nas bdag gis yid kyis dgu la yang 'dod pa la spyad par mi bya na/ mtshan gnyis sbrad pa'am/ yan lag ma yin par 'jug
297a5(dkon brtsegs): pa lta ci smos te/ bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o snyam mo/ /des brdzun du smra ba spang bar bya ste/ bden par smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / mi slu ba dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs
297a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/ ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa smra ba dang / chos rjes su srung bar gyur pa nges lus dang srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /des 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i
297a7(dkon brtsegs): chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spang bar bya ste/ de ra ro ba med pa dang / myos pa med pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa dang / tshig ma 'chal ba dang / mi 'phyar ba dang / ma rgod pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / shes
297a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/ de nam bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i blo 'jug cing zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam na des gzhan dag la chang yang sbyin te/ 'di
297b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i dus yin te/ gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyis bdag gis 'di ltar bya ste/ gang dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin nas gang 'di 'khrul pa med pa'i spyod pa la de dang de dag
297b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
297b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba yin no/ /khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gzhan dag la chang byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin no/ /khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga
297b4(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag kyang shin du bsrung bar bya'o/ /gong du yang des phra ma mi bya zhing bye ba rnams kyi bsdums
297b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /des ngag rtsub po yang mi smra bar bya zhing des ngag 'jam por smra ba dang / tshig mnyen pa dang / gsong por smra bar bya'o/ /tshig kyal ba yang smra bar mi bya zhing / dus su smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / don smra ba dang /
297b6(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba dang / rigs pa smra ba dang / 'dul ba smra ba dang / lan legs par 'debs pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed par bya'o/ /des brnab sems su mi bya zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bsam par
297b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /gnod sems su mi bya zhing rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /des yang dag par blta bar bya zhing log pa phyin ci log tu lta ba thams cad dang bral bar bya'o/ /lhar sangs rgyas la bsam pa rjes
297b8(dkon brtsegs): su song zhing lha gzhan mi 'dzin par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grol rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa der des sems can
298a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi gtam brjod par bya ste/ gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dad pa la gzung bar bya/ sems can gang dag mi gus shing phar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin
298a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro mi byed pa/ tshul dang mi ldan zhing mtshams las 'das pa de dag bla ma la gus pa dang / chos spyod pa la gzung bar bya'o/ /sems can gang
298a3(dkon brtsegs): dag thos pa nyung ba de dag mang du thos pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ser sna can rnams ni gtong ba la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams ni tshul khrims la/ gnod sems can rnams ni bzod pa
298a4(dkon brtsegs): dang des pa la/ le lo can rnams ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la/ brjed nges pa rnams ni dran pa dang shes bzhin la 'chal ba'i shes rab can rnams ni shes rab la gzung bar bya'o/ /sems
298a5(dkon brtsegs): can dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par bgo bar bya'o/ /sems can nad pa rnams la sman sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon bya'o/ /skyabs
298a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen bya'o/ /des ljongs dang ljongs kyi phyogs de dag thams cad dang ji ltar 'thun par sems can 'ga' yang log
298a7(dkon brtsegs): par ltung bar mi 'gro ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan bdun gyi bar du rjes su bstan pas
298a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yon tan dag la bkod pa las yon tan gang yang rung ba la gnas par ma gyur na khyim bdag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des sems can de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ d
298b1(dkon brtsegs): es thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha sra ba yang bgo zhing tshig 'di skad ces ji srid du sems can gdul dka' ba dmu rgod de dag yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
298b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni de dag gi phyir go cha bgos te/ sems can drang po rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ g.yo med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin/
298b3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin te/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir bdag gis go cha ma bgos kyis/ ci nas bdag gi rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ba dang / sems
298b4(dkon brtsegs): can gyis bdag mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang / dad pa thob par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /de ltar bsgrub bo/ /de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo/ /khyim bdag gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal
298b5(dkon brtsegs): lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des phyogs der ma bskul tam/ dran par ma byas te sems can rnams ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skyes par gyur na byang chub
298b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no/ /khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na sman pa mkhas pa zhig gnas pa des
298b7(dkon brtsegs): tha na sems can 'ga' zhig gi dug zhi bar ma nus te 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na sman pa de skye bo mang pos smad par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag de bzhin du grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs
298b8(dkon brtsegs): g ang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa des de'i phyogs su tha na sems can 'ga' tsam la yang ma bskul tam dran par ma byas te ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skyes par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs
299a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no/ /khyim bdag de bas na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ci nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa des bdag gis
299a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /de ltar bsgrub bo/ /de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam pa'i go cha de lta bu bgo bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
299a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa khyim na gnas pas khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /des 'di ltar so sor bslab par bya ste/ khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jom par byed pa/ 'byung ba sun 'byin pa/ dge ba'i
299a4(dkon brtsegs): sdong po 'gyel bar byed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/ /khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi gnas/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo ma dul
299a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma sbas pa rnams kyi gnas/ mi dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi gnas/ skye bo ngan pa 'dus pa yin te/ de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi chos thams cad kyi gnas
299a6(dkon brtsegs): shes brjod pa'o/ /'di ni sngon goms par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nyams par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni der gnas nas bya ba'i mi rigs pa byed pa'o/ /der gnas
299a7(dkon brtsegs): nas pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze la gus par mi 'gyur ba yin te/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/ /khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i 'khri shing la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
299a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/ /khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang mi snyan pa dang / gshe ba dang /
299b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du bya ba'i tshig gi lam rnams 'du ba ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/ /khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa mi 'dzugs pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa rnams rnam par 'jig pa'o/ /
299b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad kyis smad pa'o/ /'di la gnas pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'di la gnas pa ni 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba ma yin par
299b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'o/ /zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims kyi phung po kun mi srung ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'dor ba'o/ /
299b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi phung po la mi 'jug pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i phung po mi 'thob pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po mi skyed pa ste/ de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni pha dang ma dang /
299b5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / g.yog yongs su 'dzin pa la sred pa yin no/ /
299b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa 'di ni rgya mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang dka' ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni me la shing ltar chog mi shes pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni thug pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlung mar ltar thug pa med par rnam par
299b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni 'jig pas bye ma'i grong khyer ltar 'jig pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni kha zas bzang po dug dang 'dres pa ltar 'dres pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni mi mdza' ba bzhin du 'thun pa ma
299b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pas rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni 'phags pa'i chos sgrub pa la bar chad byed pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni phan tshun rkyen gyis 'thab pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig gnod par
300a1(dkon brtsegs): sems pas rtag tu mi 'thun pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la sbyor bas gnod pa mang ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni las kyi mtha' thug
300a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas rtag tu brtson pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni yun ring po nas bsags pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi rtag pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni dngos po kun du tshol zhing yongs su srung bas sdug
300a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni dgra ltar mi 'dza' bas rtag tu bag tsha ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni phyin ci log gis zin pas bag med pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni rang gi dpyod pas rnam par bsgrubs te/ ngo bo nyid
300a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis stong pas gar mkhan gyi tshon dang 'dra'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni myur du phan tshun 'gyes pas mthar rgud cing 'gyur ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni skye bo glo bur du 'dus pas rtag tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir sgyu ma la lta
300a5(dkon brtsegs): bu dang mtshungs so/ /khyim na gnas pa ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang mthar rgud par 'gyur bas rmi lam dang mtshungs so/ /khyim na gnas pa ni myur du 'bral bas zil pa'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so/ /
300a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni ro bro ba dang chung ngu yongs su 'jal bas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so/ /khyim na gnas pa ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyis gzir bas tshor ba'i dra ba dang
300a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs so/ /khyim na gnas pa ni mi dge ba la rnam par rtog pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir kha khab tsam gyi srog chags dang mtshungs so/ /khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig 'drid pas srog rnam par 'jig
300a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni sems rnyog pa can du byed pas rtag tu 'khrug pa'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pas rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir thun mong
300b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /khyim na gnas pa ni nyes dmigs mang bas ro bro ba chung ba'o/ /khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
300b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa mang du bya'o/ /des yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ gang byin pa de ni bdag gi yin no/ /khyim na bzhag pa
300b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni bdag gi ma yin no/ /gang byin pa de ni snying po can no/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa ni de snying po med pa'o/ /gang byin pa de ni gzhan du bde ba'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni da ltar byung ba na bde ba'o/ /gang byin pa de
300b4(dkon brtsegs): ni yang bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bsrung bar bya'o/ /gang byin pa de ni sred pa zad par 'gyur ba'o/ /khyim na bzhag pa de ni sred pa rnam par 'phel ba'o/ /gang byin pa de ni
300b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi ba med pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi ba dang bcas pa'o/ /gang byin pa de ni yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gang byin pa de ni 'jigs
300b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gang byin pa de ni byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdud kyi phyogs nye bar ston pa'o/ /gang byin pa de ni
300b7(dkon brtsegs): zad mi shes pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni zad par 'gyur ba'o/ /gang byin pa de ni bde ba'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni kun du bsrung dgos pas sdug bsngal ba'o/ /gang byin pa de ni nyon mongs pa spong bar
300b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'o/ /gang khyim na yod pa ni nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /gang byin pa de ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni longs spyod chen por mi 'gyur ba'o/ /gang byin pa de ni
301a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa'i las so/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i las so/ /gang byin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsngags pa'o/ /gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni byis pa'i skye bos
301a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa'o snyam du brtag par bya'o/ /khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas snying po blang bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum
301a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / tshe rjes nas longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston par 'du shes pa ste/ khyim bdag byang
301a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum
301a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ ser sna tshar gcad pa'i 'du shes dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lta ba'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim
301a6(dkon brtsegs): pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin
301a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya ba'i 'du shes dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum
301a8(dkon brtsegs): po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ slong ba la g.yog tu 'du shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos mi
301b1(dkon brtsegs): gtang bar 'du shes pa dang / dam pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa las 'byung bar 'du shes pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan
301b2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa bsgom pa'i 'du shes dang / gti mug la mi 'jug pa'i
301b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na
301b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug srab mor 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug srab mor 'gyur zhe na/ gang de'i
301b5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gtang snyoms shing yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i 'dod chags srab pa'o/ /gang slong ba de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub pa 'di ni de'i zhe sdang srab pa'o/ /gang dngos po byin nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
301b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni de'i gti mug srab pa'o/ /khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug srab mor 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag
301b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dngos po gang yang rung ba zhig
301b8(dkon brtsegs): bslangs ma thag tu dngos po de la sems kyis 'dzin par mi byed de/ de ltar na de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang byang chub kyi sems la brten nas yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar na de'i
302a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang slong ba de dag la byams pa nye bar sgrub ste mi khro zhing gnod sems mi byed de/ de ltar na de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
302a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te byin na ci spyad snyam du 'di ltar sems g.yo bas zhum pa med de de ltar na de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang slong
302a3(dkon brtsegs): ba la byin te byin nas kyang gdung ba med cing 'gyod pa med pa yin/ gang du yang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ste bde ba yang yid bde ba skyed cing gang byang chub kyi sems la gnas nas gtong ste/ de ltar na de'i bsam gtan
302a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byin nas kyang gang chos thams cad mi dmigs shing rnam par smin pa la mi re ste/ ji ltar mkhas pa de dag chos gang la yang mngon par ma zhen pa de ltar
302a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar na de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub
302a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / // bam po gnyis pa/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas rjes su chags pa
302a7(dkon brtsegs): dang khong khro ba med pas 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bya'o/ /des longs spyod rnyed dam/ chung ma rnyed dam/ bu rnyed dam/ nor rnyed dam/ 'bru rnyed kyang khengs par yang mi bya/ dga' bar yang mi bya/
302a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma 'byor kyang des zhum par mi bya/ yi mug par yang mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ 'dus byas thams cad ni sgyu ma byas pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /'di lta ste/
302b1(dkon brtsegs): pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin te/ de dag
302b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de dag gi ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha ma la sogs pa de dag ni bdag gi mgon nam/ skyabs sam/ dpung gnyen nam/ gnas sam/ gling ngam/ bdag gam/ bdag gi ba ma yin
302b3(dkon brtsegs): no/ /gang bdag gi zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang bdag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin na/ gang bdag gi pha ma la sogs pa de dag bdag dang bdag gir 'gyur ba dang / bdag kyang de dag gi yin pa lta smos kyang ci
302b4(dkon brtsegs): dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag kyang las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin te/ las dge ba 'am/ sdig pa 'am/ gang dang gang byas pa de dang de nyid kyis bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur
302b5(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong ngo / /de dang de nyid kyi rnam par smin pa la spyod do/ /'di dag kyang las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin te/ las dge ba 'am/ sdig pa 'am/
302b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang byas pa de dang de nyid kyi bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur/ de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi phyir bdag mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/
302b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni tshe 'di la bde ba'i bdag gir bya ba yin gyi/ tshe gzhan la bde ba'i bdag gir bya ba ma yin no/ /bdag gi gang yin pa de la bdag 'jug par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang /
302b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / des pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sdud cing mngon par sgrub pa'i dge ba de ni bdag gi yin te/ gang du bdag 'gro bar
303a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i lam der 'di dag kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de srog gi phyir ram/ bu dang chung ma'i phyir yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed do/ /khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim
303a2(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa des rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi brtan pa'i 'du shes dang / 'gyur ba'i 'du shes te/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes
303a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ni dga' zhing rtse ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di
303a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pha rol gyi grogs ni ma yin no/ /'di ni bza' ba dang btung ba'i 'grogs yin gyi/ 'di las kyi rnam par smin pa myong ba'i grogs ni ma yin no/ /'di ni bde ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di sdug bsngal gyi grogs ni ma
303a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum
303a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / dri nga bar 'du shes pa dang / mi mthun par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum
303a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dgrar 'du shes pa dang / gshed mar 'du shes pa dang / phyir rgol bar 'du shes pa'o/ //khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum
303a8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sha za mor 'du shes pa dang / srin mor 'du shes pa dang / gzugs mi sdug par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes
303b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ dgang dka' bar 'du shes pa dang / gting du 'du shes pa dang / byas pa mi gzo bar 'du shes pa pa'o/ //khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes
303b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
303b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ khur du 'du shes pa dang / srid par 'du shes pa dang / srid pa yongs su 'dzin par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan
303b4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ba ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa 'du shes pa dang / brnyan mar 'du shes pa'o/ /
303b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i
303b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas su 'du shes pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag
303b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ khri mon du 'du shes pa dang / gsod par 'du shes pa dang / 'ching bar 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag
304a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa
304a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ khog rtser 'du shes pa dang / snyir 'du
304a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rgyar 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yams kyi nang du 'du shes pa dang / gnod par 'du shes pa dang /

304a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mya ngan du 'du shes pa dang / smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
304a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ spyang mo chen mor 'du shes pa dang / chu srin chen mor 'du shes
304b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byi la chen mor 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sbrul nag mor 'du shes pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod
304b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes pa dang / mdangs 'phrog mar 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mgon med par 'du shes pa dang /
304b3(dkon brtsegs): skyabs med par 'du shes pa dang / gnas med par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gang bar 'du shes
304b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bri bar 'du shes pa dang / na par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ chom rkun du 'du shes pa dang /
304b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson srungs su 'du shes pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i srungs mar 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang
304b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ chu bor 'du shes pa dang / sbyor bar 'du shes pa dang / mdud par 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/

305a1(dkon brtsegs): mur du 'du shes pa dang / rtswa me'i sgron ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang / chu gri lta bur 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum
305a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ don med par 'du shes pa dang / tsher mar 'du shes pa dang / dug tu 'du shes pa'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/

305a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mi sdug pa dang phrad par 'du shes pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar 'du shes pa dang / nyam nga bar 'du
305a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o/ /mdor na thab mo'i dri mar 'du shes pa dang / thab mo rnyog pa thams cad du 'du shes pa dang / gnod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur par 'du shes pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa bar 'du shes bskyed
305a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas 'di lta bu'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rang gi chung ma la brtag par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
305b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim pas bu la lhag par sdug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /khyim bdag gal te des bu la lhag par sdug pa'i sems bskyed la de bzhin du sems can gzhan la ma yin na des spyo ba gsum gyis rang gi sems
305b2(dkon brtsegs): la spyo bar bya ste/ byang chub ni sems snyoms pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yin gyi/ sems mi snyoms pa'i ma yin no/ /byang chub ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yin gyi/ log pa'i sbyor ba'i ni ma yin
305b3(dkon brtsegs): no/ /byang chub ni tha dad pa med par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yin gyi/ tha dad du spyod pa'i ni ma yin pa ste/ spyo ba gsum po de dag gis rang gi sems la spyos nas bu de la mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /
305b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni mi sdug pa ste/ bdag gi snying du sdug pa ma yin/ gang bdag gis de'i don du bu de la ni lhag par sdug pa skyong la/ sems can gzhan la ni de lta ma yin na/ sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba'i bslab pa
305b5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang gnod par byas/ srog la yang bag med de gnod par gyur bas 'di ni bdag la gnod pa byed pa'o/ /bdag de'i phyir byang chub kyi lam dang mi
305b6(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i lam la spyod pas 'di ni bdag la phyir rgol ba'o snyam du 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /des bu de rgyur byas te/ ji lta ji lta bur bu de la sdug par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du sems
305b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byams pa bskyed pa dang / bdag phangs par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du byams pa bskyed pa de lta de lta bur des sems bskyed par bya'o/ /des yang 'di ltar 'di yang gud nas 'ongs la bdag
305b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang gud nas 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can thams cad kyang sngon bdag gi bur gyur la bdag kyang sems can thams kyi bur gyur te/ 'di la ni bdag gi 'am/ gzhan gyi 'am/ su'i sems can gang yang med do snyam
306a1(dkon brtsegs): du tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi mthun pa'i phyir te/ 'gro ba lnga rnams su mdza' ba las kyang mi mdza' bar 'gyur bas bdag ni ji ltar su dang yang mdza' ba 'am mi 'dza' bar mi 'gyur ba de
306a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi mdza' ba bzung na ni thams cad kyi thams cad du byed mi 'dod par 'gyur/ mdza' ba bzung na ni ha cang byed 'dod par 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba'i sems gnyis kyis ni
306a3(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi mnyam par spyod pa ni mi mnyam par 'gro bar 'gyur/ mnyam par spyod pa ni mnyam par 'gyur ba'o/ /de la bdag gis ni mi mnyam par
306a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mi bya'i sems can thams cad la mnyam par spyod na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dngos po gang la yang bdag gis snyam du yongs su
306a5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar mi bya/ chags par mi bya'o/ /g.yo dang sred pa'i bag la nyal mi bya'o/ /khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'i drung du slongs mo pa 'ongs la dngos po zhig bslangs pa las gal te des
306a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma btang na des 'di ltar dngos po 'di btang yang rung / ma btang yang rung ste/ bdag ni dngos po 'di dang gdon mi za bar 'bral bar yang 'gyur/ mi 'dod bzhin du 'chi bar yang 'gyur zhing dngos po 'dis kyang
306a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'dor/ bdag gis kyang dngos po 'di 'dor gyi/ dngos po 'di btang la yid dga' ba dang / snying po blangs te 'chi ba'i dus bya'o/ /'di yongs su btang na bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems kun nas zin te
306a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas par mi 'gyur/ 'dis ni bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa skye bar 'gyur snyam du sems nges par bsam par bya'o/ /gal te de ltar bsams
306b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang dngos po de gtong ma nus na/ des slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis go bar bya ste/ bdag ni da dung du mthu chung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin te/ theg pa chen po la las dang po pa dang / bdag ni mi gtong ba
306b2(dkon brtsegs): la sems kyi dbang du gyur pa dang / bdag ni nye bar len pa'i lta ba dang bcas pa dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la gnas pa lags kyis/ skyes bu dam pa bzod par mdzad cing yongs su gdung
306b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi mdzad du gsol/ ji ltar khyod dang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o/ /de ltar bsgrub po/ /de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam mo zhes khyim bdag de ltar byang
306b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis go bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas
306b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ gal te de ston pa 'das pa'i gsung rab yod la sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang med/ chos ston pa yang med/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang phrad pa yang med par gyur na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
306b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyag byas te/ gang de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub thob pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
306b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su grub pa de des rjes su dran par bya/ rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /des yang 'di ltar nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag
306b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsam pa dag pa dang / byams pa bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang / gos gtsang ma dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pas legs par brgyan pa dang / bsod nams
307a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / mdzes pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la rab tu dga' ba dang / nges pa dang / 'grogs na bde ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang /
